[\[30b.6\]]mod kho nar char du 'bab par 'gyur ba the tshom med do/ /chu'i phyogs su 'dug nas dris kyang rung ste/ char pa 'bab par blta bar bya'o/ /byi la dang / sre mong dang / sbrul rnams dang / gang yang gzhan dag tu gan du gnas pa dag te drod mi mthun par rgyug par byed na mdo la char 'bab par ston pa
[\[30b.7\]]yin no/ /byis pa lus 'jim pas byugs pa dang / mgo me tog phreng bas dkris pa gang na 'dug pa dar ni/ 'phral du char pa mngon par 'bab par byed do/ /lus rdul byis byugs pa'i byis pa dag rdul gyis rtse bar byed pa dang / yur ba 'gengs par byed na phral du char pa 'bab pa'i rgyu yin te/ char pa
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'bab pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa rnams kyis de ni 'phral du char 'bab par bshad pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sprin kyang med/ kha ba yang med par rlung shin tu bsil ba dag 'byung zhing / lus can grang bar byed pa ni der 'phral du nges par char pa 'bab par byed pa'o/ /chu
[\[31a.2\]]nas skyes pa'i bya shing gi yal ga la zhon pa dag nyi mas 'dab ma skems par byed pa ni shin tu char pa 'bab par yang ston pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe shing la gnas pa'i bya 'dab ma skems par byed pa de ni char pa 'bab par byed pa'i rgyu yin par bstan bcos mkhas pa rnams kyi bstan bcos las brjod pa
[\[31a.3\]]yin no/ /grong gi byi'u khrus byed cing 'dab ma sbrug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni char pa 'bab pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa rnams kyi char pa'i rgyu yin par brjod pa yin no/ /char ltas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i ltas la bram ze rig pa can gyis dus tshigs kyi
[\[31a.4\]]'od chags pa bsgrims te brtags nas dus bstan par bya ste/ gang gi tshe nang nub tu dus tshigs mdog snum zhing / ldong ros lta bu'i 'od dam pa bla'i 'od lta bur mthong na zhag gsum gyi bar du char pa 'bab par ltas shes pa dag gis brjod pa yin no/ /dus tshigs kyi kha dog dung dang / gur gum dang /
[\[31a.5\]]ba lang gi gcin lta bu'i 'od 'byung ba de dag ni 'phral du char pa 'bab pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dbyar ka dus tshigs gnyis kar yang kha dog snum pa dang / gur gum lta bu dang / gnag pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mtshal gyi 'od lta bu 'byung ba dang / kha dog khrag gi rgyun dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang / de
[\[31a.6\]]bzhin du rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bu dang / de bzhin du zangs ltar dmar bdag gis dus tshigs 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro/ dus tshigs kha dog rtsub pa dag tu dmag dang mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / khrag gi chag chag btab pa'i sa rnams 'byung ba ni shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /dus
[\[31a.7\]]tshigs kyi chags pa shin tu dmar ba ni nyin gsum du char pa 'bab par bstan to/ /yang na mtshon gyis 'debs pa mtshon gyis 'tsho ba'i skye po zad par yang 'gyur ro/ /gang du dus tshigs gnyi gar phyogs su rdo yi char pa 'bab pa der ni mkhris pa'i nad la sogs pas lus can 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]gal te dus tshigs kyi chags pa yang dang yang du byis pa dag dmag 'gyed pa na rnam par skrag par 'gyur zhing rab tu rgyug par byed pa der ni yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i nyi zla gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung zhing / kha dog gi 'od dmar ba dang / rtsub
[\[31b.2\]]pa ma yin pa ni lo legs pa dang bde ba'i rgyu yin no/ /dus tshigs gnyi gar 'od shin tu gnag cing mun pa dang 'dra bas gang na de'i dmag dpon rnams 'khrug pa dang / gsod par yang bstan par bya'o/ /gang dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin grang ba dang / dro ba dang / 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa
[\[31b.3\]]rnams phyin ci log tu gyur pa der ni nad dang / 'chi ba dang / rgyal po la 'jigs pa 'byung ba'am/ yang na nges par bdag po 'chi bar bstan pa yin no/ /de'i nye 'khor du chom rkun dang / sbrul dang / srin po rnams kyi dbang yang 'gyur ro/ /dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i le'u ste bcu
[\[31b.4\]]pa'o// //dri za'i grong khyer gyi ltas la/ gal te shar phyogs su dri za'i grong khyer byung bar nub phyogs na 'dug pa'i rgyal po la mchog tu 'jig pa 'byung bar bstan pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe nub phyogs su za'i grong khyer snang bar gyur na/ de'i tshe na shar phyogs na gnas pa rnams la
[\[31b.5\]]'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar brjod par bya'o/ gang gi tshe byang phyogs su dri za'i grong khyer snang bar gyur na de'i tshe ni lho phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung ngo / /gang gi tshe lho phyogs ku dri za'i grong khyer snang bar gyur na de'i tshe ni byang phyogs na gnas pa rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung bar
[\[31b.6\]]brjod pa yin no/ /dri za'i grong khyer chags pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig ba'o// //gal te gang du 'jig rten pa'i lha'i gzugs gar byed pa dang / rab tu g.yo bar gyur ba dang / smra bar gyur pa dang / mig mchi mas gang ba dang / rtul bar gyur pa dang / gas par gyur pa dang / dum bur
[\[31b.7\]]gyur pa dang / thams cad zhig pa la sogs pas ni 'jigs rnam pa du ma 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /de la yang gar gyis ni dmags mang po 'byung ngo / /rab tu g.yo bas zla ba bzhin dmag byung ba dang / zla ba drug gis rgyal po kun du zad par 'gyur ba dang / ring po mi thogs par yul 'jig par
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'gyur ro/ /gom pa 'dor bas ni yul bor te 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /glu len pas ni yul 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /dum bu las ltung na lus can rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung la sogs pas phul ba dang / ltos pa med par lha'i gzugs kyi mgo dag las me tog gi phreng ba
[\[32a.2\]]lag par gzhag pa lhung bar gyur ba ni rgyal po dang yul 'khor dang bcas te 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang gang du rgyal po rtag tu phan tshun 'khyam par byed pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / /rdeg 'chos pa dang / rab tu gyur pa dang / yid mi dga' zhing du bar gyur pa
[\[32a.3\]]dang / gzugs la mi snang bar srog chags rnam pa tha dad pa dag gis sgra shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur pa dag thos par gyur pa de'i tshe ni rang gi yul 'khor dang yul du bcas te rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur la/ yul 'khor de'i skye bo yang mu ge dang gnon pa dag gis gzir ba dang / bu smad dang yang bral
[\[32a.4\]]bar gyur ba ston pa yin no/ /gang du bstan pa med par byis pa glu dang spel te/ tshig gis glu len par byed cing / mi mthun pa'i don brjod pa der ni rgyal po'i 'chi bar rjod par byed do/ /lha rten dang gzugs 'gyur ba'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //lam du 'jug pa'i ltas la
[\[32a.5\]]gang gi tshe rgyal po dang / blon po dang / brab ze dag lam du 'jug cing 'gags pa na gnam grum pa dang bcas pa'i skar mda' 'byung ba dang ser pa 'bab pa ni de dag mi mthun par brjod pa yin te/ de dag dgos pa yang dag par mi 'grub pa tsam du ma zad kyi lus 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi dus su nyi
[\[32a.6\]]ma 'char ba'i tshes phyogs gang dag tu 'gro ba bya rog dang / ngang ba dang / bya ka ra N+Da ba dang / krung krung dag snang ba der ni dge bar blta'o/ /sprin dang / 'ja' dang / de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang / chu sbyin par byed pa'i 'brug mi gsal ba 'byin pa dag ni 'jigs pa bden par rig par byed pa yin
[\[32a.7\]]no/ /lam du 'jug pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //gang du ltas sna tshogs bstan pa de dag gi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshad bstan pa gza' skar dag la mig dmar gyi ltas 'byung ba ni zhag bdun nas 'bras bu 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du gza' lag ni zhag bcu tshun chad kyis so/ /phur
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]bu ni lo gcig gis rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /pa ba sangs ni zla ba drug tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur bar bstan par bya'o/ /gnam grum pa dang / sa g.yo ba ni zla ba brgyad du brjod do/ /grong khyer dang / mchod rten dang / shing dang 'brel ba ni zla ba gcig nas smin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo gseg ma'i
[\[32b.2\]]char 'bab pa dang / de bzhin du sprin sgra 'byung ba dang / gza' rnams 'khyams pa ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur ro/ /nyi zla'i yang 'phral du 'bras bur 'gyur bar bsten par bya'o/ /'ja' zug pa ni zla ba bcu gnyis su brtag go/ /ser ba 'bab pa las ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis
[\[32b.3\]]gyis 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /me med par me 'bar ba lta bur snang ba ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung bar mkhas pa dag gis bshad do/ /de bzhin du 'byig 'gyur ba dang / mngal dag phyin ci log pa dang / dus ma yin par lo tog 'bras bu chags pa thams cad kyi yang zla ba drug par brjod do/ /sprin med
[\[32b.4\]]pa'i sgra dag zer ba ni zla ba gcig gis so/ /'ja'i ltas lta bu ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis 'byung ngo / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sngon por gyur pa ni zhag bdun tshun chad kyis 'bras bu 'byung ngo / grong dang / grong khyer dang / de bzhin du glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / glang po che la sogs
[\[32b.5\]]pa'i ltas 'byung ba ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung / de bzhin du sngon ma byung ba las glo bur du 'byung ba rnams dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra byung ba rnams kyi yang 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung bar brjod do/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan 'gyel ba dang / gzhi dang / rta babs dang / khang ba rdib pa dang / mjug
[\[32b.6\]]rings 'char ba ni zla ba gcig gis 'bras bu 'byung ngo / /mi rgod pa dang / skyin gor dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang bu rnams ni zhag bcu tshun chad kyis so/ /stag dang / byil dang / lba dang / bya rnams dang / bar snang las sgra byung ba rnams kyis ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung ngo / /yang bya dang / grog
[\[32b.7\]]spur dang / phye ma leb rnams kyis ni zhag bcu tshun chad kyis so/ /yang byi ba dang / sbrul dang / de bzhin du sbrang bu mang po'i ltas bstan pa las ni zla ba gcig tu shes par bya'o/ /ri dgas kyi rigs rnams dang / bya dag gi skad byung ba ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byin to/ dus tshigs kyi mtshan
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]ma rnams ni zhag bdun tshun chad kyis so/ /dri za'i grong khyer chags pa ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byung bar bshad do/ /las sna tshogs bstan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //gnod pa'i ltas ngan rnams kyi rgyu bstan pa
[\[33a.2\]]dang / de dag ngo lon gyi cho ga bstan pa/ yong gi srid pa ma yin pa phyin ci log tu snang ba gang yin pa de dag ni phal cher mi dga' ba'i 'bras bu'i dbus su 'byin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi rgyu ni 'di ltar nyes par spyod pa mang po la sogs shing bsags pa las byung ba'i phyir te/
[\[33a.3\]]de dag yang kha cig las ngan pa'i dbang gis yul log par snang bar grub pa yang yod/ kha cig mi ma yin pa dag gis sbran pa'i phyir ched du bstan pa dag yod pas na gang dag mi ston pa ltar snang ba de dag kyang 'dir thub pa lha'i mig can de dag gis bstan pa bzhin nges can du gzung bar bya'o/ /gang dag
[\[33a.4\]]kha cig tu dngos po mi srid pa lta bu zhig tu brgyal snang na/ der yon tan zhig na dge zhing bzang ba dang / phyin ci log cig na'ang mi dge ba'i don du rig par bya'o/ /de ltar mi dge bar gyur ba'i mtshan ma de dag ni gnyen po so sor brten pa dag gis zlog par 'gyur srid de/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ bsod
[\[33a.5\]]nams la rab tu gnas ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / rnam par dag pa la rten pa dag dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod la brtson par bya ba dang / ser sna bcom pa dang / lha dang bram ze dag la mchod pa dang / zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ba dang / bsam pa
[\[33a.6\]]dri ma med pas nor rab tu sbyin pa dag gi mtshan ma ngan pa dag gis mi chugs shing rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /gal te gnyen po byed pa'i stobs dag gis kun du zlog par gyur na yang rgyal po 'chi ba las rab tu bcad de tshe nur/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor de dag rgyug cing rnam par 'jig pa
[\[33a.7\]]yang yun ring du gnas pa tsam du 'gyur bar bstan to/ /thub pa'i tshogs mchog gar ga la/ /b+ha ra d+ha dza gau ta mas/ /lha yul bar snang sa bla dang / /gza' skar srog chags rnams kyi ltas/ /sa bdag mi yi rgyal po dang / /grong dang yul 'khor gnas pa la/ /gnod par gyur ba'i ltas
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'byung la/ /cho ga gang dang gang dag gis/ /zhu bar 'gyur ba zhus ba las/ /thub pa gar gas lung bstan pa/ /phan par 'gyur ba'i cho ga gad/ /gau ta mas nyan par gyis/ /dang por sbyin pa gtang bya ste/ /lha dang bram ze mngon mchod na/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod sbyin gyis/ /
[\[33b.2\]]gtong ba'i ngo lon bya bar bstan/ /de la thog mar ba lang dang / /dbyig dang gos la sogs pa dag /bram ze rnams la sbyin byin nas/ /so sor khyim du rgyal po la/ /gtso bo dag la ci rigs par/ /dbang sgyur ba ni legs par bya/ /mdun na 'don zhing mnyam gzhag pa/ /zhag bdun smyung ba
[\[33b.3\]]byas gyur pas/ /lha la gtor ma rab phul te/ /u dum bA ra'i yam shing sreg /shing mar btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad nang par zhing bsngags rig pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na bram ze gtsang ma zas su mar za zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba spangs te/ zhag gsum smyur ba byas pa'i sngags mkhan
[\[33b.4\]]gyis rig sngags tra ta ra ma zhes bya ba 'dis a pa ma rga'i yam shing bsreg shing mar la btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang rgyal po'i pha brang ngam/ grong khyer ram/ yul gyi phyir rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyi lha la zhag bdun du gtor ma phul la/ mar bre do'am/ yang na breg dmar la
[\[33b.5\]]btags pa'i nas bre'u chung gnyis kho nas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga zin nas bram ze rnams brgya'am/ de las lhag pa dag la'o thug blud pa'am/ yang na zhag bdun du chos ston bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu bram ze dag la yon sbyin pa ni gser dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang dang / gos
[\[33b.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dag sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na bram ze rnams la glang gcig dang bcu sbyin pa ste/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na ltas las 'byung ba'i gnod pa thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /ltas las gnod par 'gyur ba'i ngo lon gyi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //thub pa chen po drang srong
[\[33b.7\]]skar ma'i ltas kyi gtsug lag rma bya'i ltas sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ltas ji snyed pa rdzogs so/ //A r+ya byA ka ra Na'i nang nas 'byung ba gza' dang rgyu skar gyi rang bzhin bshad pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni 'di lta ste/ smin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang / nab so dang / rgyal
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]dang / skag dang / mchu dang / gre dang / dbo dang / me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lha mtshams dang / snron dang / snubs dang / chu stod dang / chu sman dang / byi bzhin dang / gro bzhin dang / mon gre dang / mon gru dang / khrums stod dang / khrums
[\[34a.2\]]smad dang / nam gru dang / tha skar dang / bra nye dang / 'di rnams ni rgyu skar nyi shu brgyad dang do/ /de las rgyu skar ni du/ dbyibs ni ji snyed yod / yud tsam dang ldan pa ji snyed/ zas ni ci/ rus ni ci/ lha rnams ni gang / kyi bram ze pad+ma'i snying po can smin drug ni skar ma drug ste/ dbyibs ni spu gri lta bu'o/
[\[34a.3\]]yud tsam sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha drug dang bcas pa'o/ /zas ni zho'o/ /lha ni me lha'o/ /rus ni rje'u rigs kyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar snar ma ni skar ma lnga ste/ dbyibs ni shing rta lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni zho dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'o/ /lha ni skye dgu'i bdag
[\[34a.4\]]ba'o/ /rus ni go ta ma'o/ /rgyu skar ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni ri dgas kyi mgo lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum bu dang ldan pa'i cha dang bcas pa'o/ /zas ni ri dgas kyi sha'o/ /lha ni zla ba'o/ /rus ni b+ha ra d+h+wa dza'o/ /rgyu skar lag ni skar ma gcig ste/ dbyibs ni sog le lta bu'o/ /yud tsam bco lnga
[\[34a.5\]]dang ldan ba'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni khrag go/ /lha ni drag shul can no/ /rus ni dmar po'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar nab so ni skar ma gnyis te/ dbyibs ni khang pa'i gdung lta bu'o/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni mar dang khur ba'o/ /lha ni nyi
[\[34a.6\]]ma'o/ /rus ni dbang byes do/ /rgyu skar rgyal ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni ril ba lta bu'o/ /yud tsam sum cu dang ldan no/ /kha zas ni sbrang dang spos so/ /lha ni phur bu'o/ /rus ni rtsa shun gyon pa'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar skag ni skar ma drug ste/ dbyibs ni sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka lta bu'o/ /yud tsam
[\[34a.7\]]bco lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas ba'o/ /kha zas ni sbrul gyi sha'o/ /lha yang sprul lo/ /rus ni dma' ba'i rgyud do/ /pad+ma'i sting po can rgyu skar 'di bdun ni shar sgor gtogs so/ /rgyu skar mchu ni skar ma drug ste/ dbyibs ni chu po lta bu'o/ /yud tsam sum cu dang 'brel ba'i mtshan yin
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]no/ zas ni til dang sbyar ba'i thug pa'o/ /lha ni spen pa'o/ /rus ni ser skya'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar gre ni skar ma gnyis te/ dbyibs ni rtsig pa'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni zhag drug cus smin pa'i 'bras sam til gyi tshigs ma za'o/ /lha ni khyab
[\[34b.2\]]mjug go/ /rus ni gzhon rtsi mo'i khyim thab kyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar dbo ni skar ma gnyis te/ dbyibs ni khri lta bu'o/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ kha zas ni khre'o/ /lha ni nyi ma dang gshin rje'o/ /rus ni e ti'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar me bzhi ni skar ma lnga ste/ dbyibs
[\[34b.3\]]ni lag pa lta bu'o/ /lha ni ra skyes la zhon pa'o/ /yud tsam sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /zas ni bya sna tshogs dang sre da'o/ /ras ni 'od srungs kyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar nag pa ni skar ma gcig ste/ dbyibs ni pad+ma'i snying po 'dra'o/ /lha ni nyi ma'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan
[\[34b.4\]]pa'i cha dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni shing tog sna tshogs za'o/ /rus ni sA la'i shing drung ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar sa ri ni skar ma gcig ste/ dbyibs ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o/ /yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni phye dang til thug sbyar ba dang / ba la sran sde'u btags pa
[\[34b.5\]]za'o/ /lha ni rlung lha'o/ /rus ni yid chen gyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar sa ga ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni ra'i rten mgo lta bu'o/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni til dang / rgya sran smug po za'o/ /lha ni dbang po dang me lha'o/ /rus ni mtshan mo zhes
[\[34b.6\]]bya ba'i rgyud do/ /kye pad+ma'i snying po can rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni lho phyogs kyi sgor gtogs so/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni glang po che'i mgo dang sna lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha dang bcas pa'o/ /zas ni chang dang / sran chung dang / sbrang rtsi'o/ /lha ni
[\[34b.7\]]nyi ma'o/ /rus ni spen pa dang rgyud 'gro'o/ /rgyu skar snron ni skar ma gsum mo/ /dbyibs ni them skas lta bu'o/ /yus tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i cha dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni 'bras sA lu dang / /mar dang / 'bras thug go/ /lha ni dbang po'o/ /rus ni legs byed kyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar snubs ni skar ma
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dgu ste/ dbyibs ni skar ma gsum dang ldan pa'i ri dgas kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba'i ral pa lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni 'o ma dang / nags kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras za'o/ /lha ni sdong bu can no/ /rus ni ka ta ya na'i
[\[35a.2\]]rgyud do/ /rgyu skar chu stod ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni mchod rten lta bu'o/ /yud tsam sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa can gyi rgyud do/ /kha zas ni n+ya gro d+ha za'o/ /lha ni chu lha'o/ /rus ni ka t+ya zhes bya ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar chu smad ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni gom pa g.yon pa lta bu'o/ /yud tsam
[\[35a.3\]]ni bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang ldan pa'i chu bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni sbrang dang spos so/ /lha ni thams cad ces bya'o/ /rus ni stag dgu zhes bya ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar byi bzhin ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni glang mgo lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni drug dang ldan pa las yud tsam cig la thog mar las byed do/ /
[\[35a.4\]]kha zas ni rlung za'o/ /lha ni tshangs pa'o/ /rus ni gso ma can gyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni rnga lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ kha zas ni mar sar bsrubs ma thag pa dang bya sha za'o/ /lha ni khyab 'jug go/ /rus ni mo+od gal gyi bu'i
[\[35a.5\]]rgyud do/ /kye pad+ma'i snying po can rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub skor gtogs so/ /rgyu skar mon gre ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni bya lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni byi la'i sha la reg par byed pa dang / rgya sran smug po za'o/ /lha ni nor lha'o/ /rus ni
[\[35a.6\]]gnas bzhes bya ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar mon gru ni skar ma brgya ste/ dbyibs ni skar ma gcig dang 'brel pas me tog gi phung po 'dra'o/ /yus tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni ra sha za'o/ /lha ni chu lha'o/ /rus ni skar ma'i bu'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar khrums stod ni skar ma gnyis
[\[35a.7\]]te/ dbyibs ni shing rta 'dra'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni lug gi sha dang khrag go/ /lha ni 'bab zhig 'tsho zhes bya'o/ /rus ni skye bo'i las kyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar khrums smad ni skar ma gnyis te/ dbyibs ni shing rta 'dra'o/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni ba la sran no/ /lha ni sbrul dang gza'o/ /rus ni nor rgyal gyi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar nam gru ni skar ma sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ dbyibs ni skar ma gcig dang ldan pas gru lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /de'i zas ni
[\[35b.2\]]phye dang sha'o/ /lha ni nyi ma'o/ rus ni bskyes pa'i bu zhes bya ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu skar tha skar ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni rta mgo'i mgul pa lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ /kha zas ni sbrang rtsi dang sha za'o/ /lha ni dri za'o/ /rus ni rta 'jig gi rgyud do/ /rgyu skar
[\[35b.3\]]bra nye ni skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni mo mtshan lta bu'o/ /yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan no/ /kha zas ni til dang 'bras so/ /lha ni gshin rje'o/ /rus ni brga'i rgyud do/ /pad+ma'i snying po can rgyu skar bdun po 'di rnams byang gi sgor gtogs so/ /le'u bcu drug go// //nam mkha' las
[\[35b.4\]]'byung ba brtag pa'i le'u las 'byung ba gshen rje dang / chu lha dang / dbang po dang / lus ngan las dbyug pa lta bu shar shar ro mtshan mo 'am nam phyed kyi dus na yud tsam mam/ yud tsam gsum gyi bar du nam mkha' las phal cher rab tu snang ba yal ga mang po rgyal chen drang po shin tu ring ba rab tu 'phros pa
[\[35b.5\]]byung na zla ba gcig gis de'i yul 'khor du 'thab pa dang / lo la/ mi'i dbang po dang / char pa la gnon par byed do/ /le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //ljang sngon dang / rtsub po dang / bar chad pa dang / ljang ser dang / 'od 'tsher pa dang / dung pa lta bu dang / sbrul 'dra ba dang / dbyug pa 'dra ba
[\[35b.6\]]brgyad snang na char mi 'bab pa dang / lo zas dang / bkres pa dang / srog chags la sogs pa la 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /shing ta la phyed tsam snang ba'am/ /shing ta la gnyis sam/ gsum mam bzhi'am/ /lnga tsam gyi dbyibs ltar snang na 'phral du smon no/ /yang na zla ba bcu gnyis sam/
[\[35b.7\]]zla ba brgyad brgyad ni lo nyes dang / mi'i dbang po'am/ chu skam pa dang / 'chi ba dang / 'thab mo'i g.yul dang / nor stor pa'i rnam par smin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang mod la char bab na gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu rnam par smin pa bstan pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du shar phyogs sam/ /
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]nub phyogs su dbyug pa lta bur snang na rgyal po gzhan dang / bram ze 'chi bar byed do/ /byang phyogs dang / lho phyogs nas dbyug pa lta bur snang na de'i 'khor gyi mi la gnod pa dang / me'i 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /shing rings ltar thad kar byung ba'am/ chu rlung sa mang po ltar snang ba'am/ /
[\[36a.2\]]mig mang sa ris lta bu'i dbyug par 'dug nas rkun po'i dpung skye ba dang / yul 'khor ngan zhing mi rigs pa 'byung ngo / /rtsub po dang / dum bu dang / 'jam po ma yin pa dang / /glog dang skar mda' dang / gnam lcags dang skar ma mjug rings dang / mes 'gag pa ltar snang ba la thog gam/ /skar
[\[36a.3\]]mda' 'bres na mi'i dbang po dang / yul khor du 'jig par byed de/ legs par gyur pa'i tshes grangs dang / byed pa'i yud tsam la 'byung ba'i dbyug pa ltar snang ba ni gnod par mi byed de/ rgyal po'i srid che ba dang char 'bab pa dang / yul la phan par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs na
[\[36a.4\]]dbyug pa ltar snang ba de'i phyogs nas dbyug pa la gnod do/ /phyogs mtshams nas dbyug pa ltar snang na bud med dang / ba lang sbrum ma rnams 'jig go/ /kyog kyog dang / mi mnyam pa la sogs pa rgyal mtshan dkar po ltar gyen du byung na rgyal po dang / yul 'khor 'jig pa nga / skran nad dang / 'chi
[\[36a.5\]]bar byed do/ /nyin mtshan kun du dbyug pa rtse mo gyed pa ltar snang na yul gyi rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyug pa lta bu'i rtse mo can du snang na yul thams cad kyi rgyal po 'chi ba dang / de'i yul 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu dbyug pa lta bu snang na yul 'khor de
[\[36a.6\]]'jig pa dang / de'i yul phyogs su nad dang / me dang / char pa 'bab po/ /le'u bco brgyad pa'o// //skar mda'i mtshan ma bshad pa'i le'u la skar mda' 'ja' 'dra ba dang / gdugs dang / shing gi yal ga 'dra ba dang / rtsa grung po dang / dbyig pa 'dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor 'dra
[\[36a.7\]]ba dang / 'khor lo lta bu'i skar mda' snang na/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs gtso bo dam pa dang / rgyal po'i btsun po dang / nang mi dang / yul 'khor gyi mi dang / mi'i dbang po dang / bla mar bya ba dang / blon po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la skar ma snang ba las gyur na char mi 'bab po/ /skar
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mda' dus gnyis su byung ngam/ skar mda' phar phyir log na gnam gar song gnas der gnod par gyur ro/ /skar mda' dkar la dbyibs legs par snang ba ni bsngags par bya ba yin no/ /chu'i nang gi srog chags gya gyur 'gro ba dang / mtshon sha kati dang / skar ma de'u dang / rta lta bu dang / byi la lta bu dang /
[\[36b.2\]]sgra dang bcas pa phal cher snang na nyes pa mang po 'byung ngo / skar mda' 'bar ba bzhin du song ba las phyir log pa dang / skar mda' gzhan gyis phog ste zhig na yul de'i rgyal po la gnod pa'i dgra bskyed de/ nang par ram/ nub mo 'am/ de'i tshem tshems su skar mda' rtsub mo yon po snang na rab tu bsngags pa
[\[36b.3\]]ma yin no/ /skar mda' gnam gyi dbus su song la sprin gyi chu 'thung ba ltar zhugs shing / skar mda'i sgra med na/ skar mda'i dbus kyi tshams yod par snang ba/ 'jam zhing drang la shin tu yangs shing dkar ba/ logs g.yas g.yon du yang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu ba snang na skar mda' de dag dge ba ste/ /
[\[36b.4\]]'bras bu dam pa rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /skar mda' kha yod pa zhig snang na rgyal po la gnod pa dang / btsun mo la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /skar mda' rgyab kyis song la dud pas chog pa lta bu sgra can du byung na yul de'i 'khror ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /srod la skar mda' byung ba ni bkra shis so/ /skar mda' ri
[\[36b.5\]]bong gi khrag ltar snang ba 'bar ba lhung na rgyal po dang dmag dpon la gnod do/ /skar mda' mtshan mo zla ba la phog gam nyin par nyi ma la phog na ni'i bdag po zla ba'am skar mda' la mos par byed pa de'i chi'o/ /skar mda' rab tu 'bar bas gza' 'am rgyu skar la mngon par phog na de la mos pa rnams la mi rung
[\[36b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/ /nye bar skar mda' me'i 'od lta bur lhung na yul 'khor gyi dbang po dang yul du bcas pa rnams par 'jig go/ /yul gyi sa gang du skar mda' sgra grags pe lhung na yul der rgyal po dang / blun po dang / rkun po'i drag shul snang bar 'gyur ro/ skar mda'i le'u ste bcu dgu
[\[36b.7\]]pa'o// //nam mkha' las sgra byung ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa/ rlung gnyis phan tshun nas phrad pa las gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste/ de yang sa la babs pa dang / gyen du 'byung ba dang / thad du dang / rgyang ring po khong du chud par bya'o/ /nyi ma rtse la sgra byung na rgyal rigs la gnod do/ /snga
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dro sgra byung na dmangs rigs la gnod do/ /nyi ma phyed pa'i che sgra byung na bram ze'i sde la gnod do/ /nyi ma nub pa'i tsha sgra byung na rde'u rigs kyi tshogs la gnod do/ /nyi ma nub ka'i dus su sgra byung na rigs ngan rnams la gnod do/ /nam gyi bzhi thun gyi tho rangs sgra byung na lo thog la gnod
[\[37a.2\]]do/ /mtshan gyi gung la sgra byung na srin po mang po phung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' phan tshun na sgra byung na glang po che dang / rta ma rung bar byed do/ /nam langs nas sgra byung na 'gron po mang po la gnod do/ /sgra byung ba dal la thung na gnod pa chung ngur 'gyur ro/ /sgra ring du byung na 'jigs pa 'byung ngo / /
[\[37a.3\]]dus gsum gang yang rung ba'i mtshams su sgra chen po byang phyogs su lhung na bram ze dam pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gang gi nyi ma la sgra byung na de la brten pa'i bram ze gang yin pa la gnod do/ /bden bral gyi phyogs nas sgra byung na drag shul gyi las byed pa la gnod do/ /rlung gi
[\[37a.4\]]phyogs nas sgra byung na mtha' 'khob kyi lho bral la gnod do/ /me'i phyogs nas sgra byung na mes 'tsho ba la gnod do/ /phyogs ring du sgra 'byin pa der dpa' bo rnams dang / sbrul po che la gnod do/ /sgra ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// //nyi ma dang zla ba 'khyim pa'i ltas kyi bye brag bstan pa/ /
[\[37a.5\]]nyi ma'am/ /zla ba'i 'od dang / rlung gcig tu 'dres pa las byung ba ni 'od 'khyims pa zhes bya ba'o/ /de la mar dang / til mar dang / chu dang / dngul dang / 'o ma dang / thi ba lta bu'i kha dog tu 'khyims na char 'bab po/ /bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / shing rta bu'i 'od 'khyims pa la rab tu zhig
[\[37a.6\]]ste/ /rnam par gyes shing kha dog ngan pa snang na mi dge bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis ka'i nyin mtshan du 'od 'khyims par rtag tu 'gron bcing ba dang / mtshon dang nad 'byung ngo / /me 'bar ba zhin du 'khyims na mchu mngon par skye'o/ /'ja' 'dra ba'i dbyibs su 'khyims na mtshon mang po
[\[37a.7\]]'byung ngo / /rdul 'dra bar 'khyims na mu ge 'byung ngo / /sum rim du 'khyims na grong dang / rgyal po la mi dge'o/ /rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / zho'i mdog 'dra bar 'khyims na 'thab mo dang g.yul 'byung ngo / /ser por 'khyims na yul 'khor gsum du 'jigs par ston/ /skya bo dang / ljang sngon du
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'khyims na sbrum ma 'chi'o/ /nor bu 'dra ba'i phyed dang sum cha'i dum bu gcig 'khyims na char pa 'phral du 'bab bo/ /mtshan dus gsum du 'khyims na grong mi dang / rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma gsum gyi bar du 'jam zhing snum par 'khyims na char pa 'bab po/ /rtsub por 'khyims na
[\[37b.2\]]char pa 'bab na zla ba gcig na 'jigs pa 'byung bar ston to/ /skar ma dang gza'i thog tu 'khyims pas non na rang gi mthu las byung ba'i 'bras bur bstan par bya'o/ /nyi zla 'khyims pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig go/ //'ja' zug pa'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa/ rlung dang / sprin dang /
[\[37b.3\]]nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba ni 'ja' zhes bya'o/ /'ja'i tshon sna tshogs su snang na char pa 'bab po/ /chu'i nang du zug na char rab tu che'o/ /tshon dkar po la sogs pa ni bram ze la sogs pa la gnod do/ /ser skya dang / me'i mdog dang / mar tog dmar zang zang rtsa ba ser ba lta bu'i 'ja' zug na yul du
[\[37b.4\]]'jigs pa 'byung ngo / /'ja' sngon por zug na lo ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /'ja'i dbus nyi tshe zhig na char mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal po la gnod do/ /nub phyogs su mtshan mo 'ja' zug na mi'i gtso bo la gnod do/ /char 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'chad do/ /char
[\[37b.5\]]mi 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'bab bo/ /shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na char 'bab po/ /lho phyogs la sogs pa phyogs gsum du 'ja' zug na bram ze la sogs pa la mchod pa mang po 'ong ngo / /de bzhin du lho phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
[\[37b.6\]]la gnod do/ /dus gsum gyi mtshams su 'ja' zug na yul 'jig par byed do/ /nyi ma'i rtse la lho phyogs su 'ja' zug mi la 'jigs pa 'ong ngo / /mtshams su 'ja' zug na bud med ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis su 'ja' zug na bde ba 'phel ba ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro/ /tshes
[\[37b.7\]]grangs bzang po dang / rgyu skar bzang po dang / yud tsam dang / byed pa dang / gza' bzang po dang / khyim pa dang / skabs bzang po'i tshe 'ja' zug ma dge ba ste/ rgyal po'i srid skye ste/ rkun po spa gong bar 'ong ngo / /de bzhin du nya 'dra ba dang / dbug pa 'dra ba dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]phyogs tsheg pa dang bcas par snang ba yang tshul gong mang dang 'dra tshas grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' la sogs pa bzang ngan gyi tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar gdon mi za bar rtogs pa'i mis shes par bya'o/ /de lta bur snang ba gyur ba'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du char babs na
[\[38a.2\]]zhi ba yin/ legs par 'gyur ro/ /'ja' ltas kyi le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //sa g.yo ba'i ltas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ de la chos ma yin pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dus su skar ma drug shul can dang / yus tsam dang / thang cig dang / tshes grangs mi bzad pa'i ches g.yos na skye bo
[\[38a.3\]]thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// //tshas grangs bzang po'i tshes g.yos na rab tu dge ba zhes bya'o/ /skar tshes grangs la sogs pa bzang ngan 'dres pa'i tshes g.yos na phan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang 'dren par 'gyur ro/ tshas grangs bzang po'i tshes g.yos na rgyal
[\[38a.4\]]po dang / skye bos tshos legs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa g.yos bzhin du yul gzhan du song na yul der gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ste/ de yang chos nyams pa'i nyes pa ma byas na sa g.yos kyang legs par gyur te/ /de dag tu char 'bab cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnam lcags rnon po lhung
[\[38a.5\]]ba'i sgra drag pos sa rab tu g.yos na skye bo 'thab cing 'khon pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas kyis zad par 'gyur ro/ /sa g.yo ba g.yas phyogs su 'gro zhing 'brug sgra ltar mnyen zhing zab pa'i sgra grags la/ /dus tshigs dang tshes grangs bzang ba lam 'khrul pa'i skabs su sa g.yos na dge bar 'gyur
[\[38a.6\]]ro/ /nam gza' skar drag po'i dus su sa g.yos pa'i dus na ri dgas dang bya rnams mar 'bar ba bzhin du 'gyur la/ gzhan yang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas dag snang na 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / gza' dge ba'i dus su yang de ltar gyur na de'i tshar 'bras bu
[\[38a.7\]]dge bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma byung la/ bya rnams kyang khrag khrig lang long med cing rab tu zhi ba dang / rlung yang zhi bar gyur pa ni dge bas rab tu dge ba zhes bya ste/ mi dge ba'i ltas ngan drag po zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sa g.yos pa'i 'og tu gal te char pa 'bab pa na de'i tshe bde ba
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]dang / lo legs pa dang ba/ nad med par 'gyur ro/ /sa g.yos pa'i rjes la skar mda' chen po lhung bar gyur na de'i tshe skye bo ltogs pa dang / mtshon dang / nad kyis zad par 'gyur ro/ /nam sa g.yos pa'i rjes la rlung drag po langs pas gseg ma khyer zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[38b.2\]]ro/ /da g.yos shing 'gro ba dang / rlung ldang ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od rnams dang / 'di rnams mthun par 'gro na bkra shis te dge'o/ /de lta bu dang mi mthun par 'gro zhing sa g.yos na mi dge ste smad pa yin no/ /zla ba phyed phyed cing lan gsum gsum g.yos ba zla ba gcig la spyir sa lan
[\[38b.3\]]drug g.yos par gyur na dgra'i tshogs 'ong bar ston to/ /yul gang du sa g.yo ba bstud pa der yang dang yang zhag gcig gam/ zhag bdun nam/ zhag bcu gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba re re zhing sa g.yo 'am/ /zla ba drug tu'am/ zla ba bcu'am/ lo gcig tu'am/ lo bcu'i bar du'am/ /
[\[38b.4\]]de bas kyang lhag par lan mang du g.yos sam/ de la sa nyis 'gyur du g.yos na yul phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang dmag dang 'khor du bcas pa ma rung bar 'gyur/ yul de rgyal po gzhan byed de/ de yang yul der rab tu 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pas yul de nyid dgon par gyur nas ri dgas
[\[38b.5\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshul gong ma bzhin du dpyid zla tha chungs las g.yos na gnod pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu nas 'byung ngo / /dbyar zla ra ba las g.yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu gnyis na 'byung ngo / /dbyar zla 'bring po las g.yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag nyi shu rtsa ldan 'byung
[\[38b.6\]]ngo / /dbyar zla tha chungs las g.yos na 'bras bu zhag bdun cu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo / /ston zlar ba las g.yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo / ston zla 'bring ngo las g.yos na zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo / /ston zla tha chungs las g.yos na 'bras bu zla ba gsum ma 'byung ngo / dgun
[\[38b.7\]]zlar ba las g.yos na 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo / /dgun zla 'bring po las g.yos na 'bras bu zhag lnga bcu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo / dgun zla tha chungs las g.yos na 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo / /dpyid zla ba las g.yos na 'bras bu ni zhag lnga bu na 'byung ngo / /dpyid zla 'bring po las g.yos na
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]zhag lnga bcu rtsa gsum na 'bras bu 'byung bar skar mkhan gyis shes par bya'o/ /de ltar sa g.yos pa'i 'bras bu ltar bstan pa yin no/ /de ltar zla ba'i ngor re zhing sa g.yo ba'i dmigs kyang yar gyi tshes gcig dang / mar gyi tshes bcu drug dang / mar gyi tshes nyi
[\[39a.2\]]shu gsum dag dang / yar gyi tshes bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / nyi shu dgu dang / sum cu ste/ dus tshigs 'di rnams lta bu'i dus su ma g.yos pa'i 'bras bu ni tshul de ltar blta'o/ /sa g.yos pa'i lhas kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //nam zla ba bcu gnyis kyi ngo kun
[\[39a.3\]]las rtag par g.yos te/ shing yang 'gul/ chu yang g.yos te/ mer mer byed cing / de ltar dus tshigs dang / dus tshigs ma yin par g.yos te/ rlung langs pas shing yang bcag /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / grong de na brten pa'i skye bo rnams med par gyur
[\[39a.4\]]te/ gcan gzan gyi gnon nas yul 'brog tu gyur te/ /de ltar g.yos pa ni gnod pa'i 'bras bu lo bco lnga nas yul phyogs der yang su yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar smin drug gi nyi ma las g.yos na grong dang grong khyer la me bstud par shor te/ /shing rtse yang tshig /
[\[39a.5\]]gos nag po gyon pa'i sde dang / nor bu mkhan rnams dang / mgar dang / bram ze me 'byin pa'i byed spyod pa byed pa 'di rnams la mi dge /'byung khungs nas nor bu byung ba rnams dang / 'phel ba rnams kyang subs par 'gyur/ yul de la brten pa'i ba lang dang / shing rta 'dren pa'i mi dang / bram
[\[39a.6\]]ze dang / 'dreg mkhan spu gri'i las byed pa dang / yul sin du zhes bya ba'i yul phyed kyi mi dang yul a ma bsta dang / yul chu grung lnga zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi dang / yul shi ba zhes bya ba dang / yul ba si ti zhes bya ba dang / yul ta sher gzhes bya ba dang / yul brta ba dang / yul rtal d+ha na zhes bya

[\[39b.1\]]dang / pha rol gyi dgra rnams kyis gnod pa drag po byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar snar ma'i nyi ma la sa g.yos na sa bon thams cad chud zos par 'gyur ro/ /sa la 'bru btab pa yang mi skye/ ded pa 'dra bar rtswa yang dkon/ /nags khrod nas cung zad ci 'khrungs pa yang dkon no/ /bud med sbrum ma
[\[39b.2\]]rnams kyi ru ma rab tu mi bde/ mu ge dang / mtshon dang / nad kyi zad de/ skye bo sum cha gcig gnas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i dbang po che ba'i bdag nyid can dang / dpal dang ldan pa'i mi mchog rnams dang / bram ze gzi brjid can mang po dang / ba lang phyug po dang / dbang dang ldan pa dang /

[\[41b.1\]]ral du thogs pas 'tsho ba rnams dang / lha don du gnyer ba rnams la mi smod ba'i mi rnams dang / bram ze'i lag brda kha don 'don pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi yo byed kyi tshogs sbyar ba dang / yul ha se na'i grong rdal nyams dga' pa dang / ri rma bya zhes bya ba'i drung na gnas pa dang / ri ba ri ya tra'i drung na

[\[42a.1\]]du zhes bya ba'i mi dang / sa twa ta zhes bya ba'i mi dang / 'di dag gi gnas rnams dang / mi'i sde d+ha sha na zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chu'i 'gram grong khyer rnam pa brgya dang / grong khyer rnams pa stong snyed du gnas pa de dag las g.yos na rab tu gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar sa ga las

[\[42b.1\]]'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar snon la sa g.yos na ri chen po bsnyil bar 'gyur/ 'jig pa'i rlung rab tu ldang / yul a mra ka zhes bya ba'i yul du yul ka sha'i mi dang / rkun po dang / mi ngas dang / than chen dang / ser ba dang / yang dang yang mtshon kar 'gyid pa yul de phyogs na mya ngan byed cing 'gro ste/

[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]dang / phug dang / rdzing bu na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / rkang bzhi pa sna tshogs dang / dka' thub can shing thog dang rtsa ba za ba rnams dang / yul ka sha'i byang phyogs kyi gnas yul sa btsan po la brten pa'i mi de rnams la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar chu ston la
[\[43a.2\]]sa g.yos na mi las skyes pa dang / 'gron po lam na gnas pa dang / tshong pa dang / rgya mtsho la rgyu zhing 'gro ba dang / kha zas las 'tsho ba dang / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / 'ug pa dang / chu srin na kra dang / chu srin na ma ka ra dang / rus sbal dang / rus dang / rigs dang / btsun pa dang / phyug po dang /

[\[43a.5\]]nas skyes pa'i mi dang / bya gag dang / bud med dang / chu chen po da k+Sha'i 'gram na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / gangs ri'i ri logs kyi ngos gnyig na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / ri rke dang / ri drung na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / ri rgyud chad pa na gnas pa dang / lung pa na gnas pa rnams la sa
[\[43a.6\]]g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar chu smad la sa g.yos na bzo bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur te/ lcags mgar dang / phya mkhan dang / tshon mo steng mkhan dang / shing mkhan rnams dang / 'dreg mkhan dang / phyug po rnams dang / rkun po rnams dang / bzo bo rnams dang / sna tshogs
[\[43a.7\]]rnams dang / thos zlos 'don pa'i gcam bu rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ yul ga na ra'i mi rnams dang / yul ke ka ya dang / yul kha sha ba rnams dang / gu zan yul dang / yul ba gur na gnas pa'i brags pa gtum po rnam pa stong snyed dang / bru sha yul la sogs pa dang / yul sa ga ra de'i
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin la sa g.yos na rgyal pos bkur ba'i mi rnams dang / bram ze rig byed slob pa'i mi rnams dang / bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i mi rnams dang / snyan dngags shes bya ba'i mi rnams dang / yul ga na da ra nas yul kau shA m+bA'i bar dang / yul me ta ra ste
[\[43b.2\]]na gnas pa rnams dang / si ni sa kyi yul gnyis dang yul du sbra sa ha dang / yul du me la rjed pa'i mi dang / yul sa ge ka'i mi dang / yul la ma ba ka'i mi dang / yul na ga ha ra dang / yul tsa ta bi sha ya dang / yul ga tsi ka na gnas pa ma rung ba du ma dang / yul la ba zhes bya ba'i ri la gnas pa
[\[43b.3\]]dang / mtha'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / yul ki sad ta dang / yul sa ba tir dang / yul ba ri ra ba dang / yul ba rna pu ri'i grong rdal dang / klu'i gnas rnams dang / 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar mon gre la sa g.yos na mi phyug po dang / ra lug dang / bong bu dang / rnga
[\[43b.4\]]mo dang / dre'u dang / lba dang / ri dgas kyi rnam grangs tha dad pa dang / ma he dang / 'phong dang / rtsal che ba dang / 'dun khang sna tshogs dang / grong khyer gyi tshong dpon rnams dang / yul kha ga dang / yul swa ti man ta dang / yul khi la dang / yul mun dang / yul ba tra kar dang / yul gon tha ma'i rnams
[\[43b.5\]]dang / yul bo za dang / yul sA la'i grong khyer bru sha yul dang / gu zan dang / yul tsid dra dang / chang zhim po sna tshogs dag la dga' ba rnams dang / ri sha sha'i ri logs na gnas pa'i mi sna tshogs la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar mon gru las g.yos na sa'i 'og tu gnas pa
[\[43b.6\]]rnams dang / rgya mtsho'i 'og na gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can gzhan yang chu la brten pa dang / de bzhin du rta dang / glang po che dang / khyi rnams dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / bya rnams dang / de bzhin du dmag mi dpa' bo dam pa dang / mtshon
[\[43b.7\]]shag ti dang / ral gri kyog po dang / ral gri thogs pa'i mi rnams dang / yul pral lha'i mi dang / yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud kyi rong la brten pa dang / lho phyogs kyi ri rgyud la drang srong thub pa gnas pa rnams dang / yul 'khor lo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i mi dang / bud med nu ma ya gcig pa rnams dang / /
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dmag dpon du bskos pa 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar khrums stod la sa g.yos na chu dang mes 'tshos pa'i mi rnams dang / de bzhin du ba lang gsod cing ma he la dga' ba dang / nor bu de sogs la tshor byed pa dang / yul su bi ra 'byor ba dang ldan pa dang /
[\[44a.2\]]lug gsod cing 'tsho ba'i mi dang / nags kyis 'tsho ba'i rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rol mo mkhan dang / mi dam pa dang / rta rnams dang / yul mal la dang / yul ma la la ba dang / sgo 'byed cing rku ba'i mi ngan pa rnams dang / 'di dag las g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu
[\[44a.3\]]skar khrums smad la sa g.yos na tshong ba dang / chu la brten pa rnams dang / 'gron lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / tshor ba rgyam tsho la gru bo ches 'gro bar chas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rnams dang / rang gi rigs rnams dang / chang 'tshong gi las byed pa dang / yul shi ba'i mi dang /
[\[44a.4\]]yul pa'i yo ta'i mi rnams dang / rgyal rigs a dzu ya na'i rgyud dang / yul sin d+hu dang / yul ha nu sma dang / kha che yul gyi mi dang / ri khrod zab mo na gnas pa'i mi dang / rtse rgod na gnas pa'i yul dang / yul rnam pa du ma dang / yul ta ga la dang / bar nang ga la'i mi dang / lha'i bu gang
[\[44a.5\]]gi gnas me tog sna tshogs bye bas rgyan pa yul ri can brgyad ces pa na skye bo du mas gang bar/ gos dang rgyan rnams pa sna tshogs dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs dang ldan par gnas pa las g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nam gru las g.yos na 'thab mo'i g.yul drag shul cher
[\[44a.6\]]'byung / grong phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / grong mi rnams dang / ri khrod na gnas pa rnams dang / 'dun khang rnams dang / yul de ta la'i mi dang / yul a na sha dang / tsa ga dang / yul dzi ba ra dang / yul ma tha dang / yul ka sha dang / yul ban kan zhes bya ba na dpung gis
[\[44a.7\]]snyems pa'i nga rgyal mchog dang ldan pa na rlom par gnas pa gar byed cing glu len pa dang / smad 'tshong mas 'tsho ba dang / yul sha na ka dang / yul a pir ra dang / yul nan ti dang / yul tsa ra ma nan ti na gnas pa'i mi dang / dmag mi dang / dmag dpon dang / yul mi ti la'i grong rdal gyi mi
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dang / bal yul nas shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi gzer mtshams kyi yul 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar tha skar las gsos na rta rnams la nad 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong du mi gsod pa 'byung ba dang / mi spun nad gsod pa 'byung / tha skar gyi ngo la rum du
[\[44b.2\]]bu cha gas ba la mi dge'o/ /tha skar gyi dus su btsas pa la mi dge ste/ de phan chad lo gsum na mi bde ba 'byung ngam/ de nas lo bcu na 'chi bar 'gyur/ yul la rid dang / yul ti gar ta dang / yul ba na tsa la'i skye bo rnams dang / yul ardzu na'i mi rnams dang / yul da ru dang / yul
[\[44b.3\]]da na bya dang / yul sa ti na'i mi rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar pra nye la sa g.yos na rkun po rnams la gnod pa cher 'gyur/ rgyan po byed pa dang / mdud ba dang / sgo lcags 'byed cing rku ba dang / me long 'tshong ba dang / dbyig dug sbyor zhing sdud pa'i mi dang / 'khor lo byed pa
[\[44b.4\]]dang / btson srung dang / gtum po sdig can rnams dang / rkun po rnams dang / g.yo byed pa rnams dang / mi srun pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / gdol ba dang / rigs ngan la sogs pa'i yul gyi mtha' g.yas pa rnams dang / rgya yul na rgya rnams dang / rgya dam pa rnams dang / yul dga'
[\[44b.5\]]ba bzang po zhes bya ba rnams dang / yul s+ya ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / chu bo chen po si ta zhes bya ba'i 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang / mtsho ma dros pha yid bzhin zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten rnams la grags pa de la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rig
[\[44b.6\]]'dzin gyi tshogs rnams dang / drang srong thub pa rnams kyi kyang bsnyen par bya ba shing 'dzam+bu'i skye bo mang po gnas pa dang / ke la se ti sa'i gangs dang / gangs mangs te nor bu can gyi ri dang / spos ngad ldang pa gangs ltar go dang / de bzhin du su ri pa sha zhes bya ba'i ngos bzang pa dang / ri dang ri sa bar ni
[\[44b.7\]]zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs ngos dang / gling rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang / ri rad rod dag na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / 'byung bo dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / srin po'i tshogs mang po dag dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / klu rnams dang / de bzhin du sman rnam pa stong snyed la
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du sa la pa na ba'i sprin sngo gnag 'jam po mig bsku ba'i sman gyi mdog ri chen po 'dra ba las 'brug sgra zab mor sgrog cing nye bar 'brug sgra la glog rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyu zhing / nam mkha' la sngon
[\[45a.2\]]pho shur shur po lta bu snang ba'am/ /sgra 'byung ba'am/ skar mda' lta bu mang la rlung me drag pa ldan zhing tshub ma lta bu mi sdug pa ni med/ /sprin gyi gzugs bkra shis kyi ri mo sna tshogs dang / dbang po rdo rje lta bu snang ba dang / nad par nyi ma 'char ba dang / nyi ma nub nas zla ba 'char pa'i tshe sprin gyis
[\[45a.3\]]mchog par char pa dang / man mkha' sprin dal la snyoms pa 'jam po'i gzugs rgyang ring por song ba glog phan tshun du 'phro ba'i sprin de lta bu ni dge ba'i mtshan yin no/ /sprin 'jam la dal snyoms te/ bar chad med cing sprin gyi gzugs lag pa mi snang ba de lta bur snang na sprin mtshan ma de lta bu da
[\[45a.4\]]ldan pa ni lha'i dbang po'i sa g.yos bar bstan pa yin no/ /de ltar gang dang gang du sa g.yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'i dmigs ni 'jigs shing dang ngas pa med par yid rten la sa bon thams cad thob shig /las dang mtshon ma rnams kyang gyis shig /rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur bar yang bstan
[\[45a.5\]]to/ /tshong pa yang de'i tshe kun du song yang 'jigs pa med do/ /yang sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du nam mkha' la sprin gyi sa khebs te/ thar chags su sprin pa la ltar dal snyoms par song la/ nub phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / sbal pa rnams dang / nya dang /

[\[45a.7\]]ri ngos dang / zhing dang / mtsho 'gram dang / de dag tu sa bon thob shig dang / sa dma' ba dang / ha cang chu che ba'i sa dang / 'dam rdzab can du btab na ni ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul de lta bur sa g.yos pa ni bkra shis te chu'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /yang sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tshun chad du rlung drag po langs la/ nang bar dang nub kar nyi ma dang zla ba dmar ser du snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma snang bar mthong na de ni rlung gis g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu bstan pa nyon cig /de'i tshe shes rab can bdag gang yang mi 'gro bar go ste/ 'dug la mtshon cha bskyab
[\[45b.2\]]pa'i gcan rtsig pa dang / 'ongs brko ba gyis shig /rgyal po pha rol po dang / mtshams gcig tu 'dug pa dang rtsod par 'gyur te/ skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sa g.yos pa thams cad ni lhag par mi rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar bsgrags te/ de lta bu ni rlung gis g.yos
[\[45b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba'o/ /yang sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du de'i tshe skar mda' shin tu drag po ltung ba dang / nang nub kyi tshe dmar por gyur la/ nyi ma dang zla ba yang dmar por snang ste/ tshul de ltar mthong na de ni me'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ khyim rnams bsrungs kyang mes tshigs bar 'gyur ro/ /

[\[45b.5\]]dpon dang / blon por bcas pa la mi dge'o/ /nyi ma gung la sa g.yos na nad kyi 'debs so/ /phyi ma red sa g.yos na ba lang dang / phyugs dang / dmangs rigs dang / de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /nad par dang / nyi ma nub pa dang / nam gyi gung du sa mtshams su sa g.yos

[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]dang zla ba'i 'od dang / gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan pa/ yul gang du nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma dang 'dra bar nam mkha' la snang na de'i lho byang gi phyogs kun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rab tu gsal ba yang ma yin/ /'or zer yang mi gsal la/ sprin gyis kyang nam
[\[46a.2\]]kun chod na de ni char 'bab pa yin te/ dbyar gyi tshe ni nyi ma 'dra ba rtag par yang 'byung ngo / /dus 'di ma yin pa dus gzhan gyi tshe nyi ma 'dra ba snang na 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar po shar na yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo / /nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha dog dmar po
[\[46a.3\]]shar na rgyal rigs rnams dang / mtshon cha thogs pas 'tsho ba la gnod par shes par bya'o/ /nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog ser po 'am kha dog sngon por 'gyur na rje'u rigs rnams dang / ba lang dang / phyugs kyis 'tsho ba'i mi rnams la gnod par shes par bya'o/ /gal te yul gang dang gang du nyi ma 'dra ba
[\[46a.4\]]kha dog nag por shar na dmangs rigs rnams la gnod pa dang / char pa cher 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyi ma'i g.yas rol du nyi ma 'dra ba byung na lho phyogs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung / zhag bdun tshun chad char 'bab par bshad do/ /nyi ma'i byang phyogs ni nyi ma 'dra bar kha dog dkar por snang ba byung na de ni byang
[\[46a.5\]]phyogs kyi rgyal po la 'jigs pa cher 'gyur/ char mi 'bab/ mu ge 'byung / /phan tshun du 'thab par 'gyur/ gal te yul gang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar snang na btsod kyi kha dog ltar dmar la/ gal te sngon po yang snang na zla ba lnga na rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu byung na de'i rjes la ltas
[\[46a.6\]]ngan drag po 'byung ste/ rgyal po 'thab cid gsod pa dang / khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me skyes pa'i gzugs 'dra ba go dang bcas pa gsal bar snang na zla ba bzhi tshun chad du rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der rgyal po sde dang bcas
[\[46a.7\]]te ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na zhags pa sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po shar ba rnams snang ba'i tshe zla ba bzhin mi'i dbang po ma rung par 'gyur ba dang / yul du mi nad kyang 'byung ste/ 'jigs pa chen po shes par bya'o/ /nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ral gri gyen du 'greng
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]pa/ ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma dang 'dra ba char zung dang bcas pa gsal bar snang ba dang / gang du zhags par snang ba de nyid kyi 'bras bu yang 'dir bstan te/ khyad par du mi mang po mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na ril ba spyi blugs lta bu'am/ reng reng po'am/ /

[\[47a.1\]]blta zhing bag yod par yid la bzung zhing shes par bya'o/ /yang zla ba'i mdog thal ba 'dra ba dang / sngo reng 'dra ba dang / zangs 'dra ba'i mdog dang / mdog ser po dang / skya bo dang / byi ru'i mdog tu snang ba dang / zla ba'i mdog mi gsal ba snang na mig nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung

[\[47a.5\]]spen pas non te song na bkris pas 'jigs pa dang / khon drag shul can du 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba la phod mjug rings kyi non te song na mu ge dang / mtshon gyis 'gyed par ston to/ /zla ba la gza' lag gis non te song na lo legs pa dang / bde bar
[\[47a.6\]]'gyur ro/ /de ltar zla ba'i steng na phar gza' rnams kyis non cing phug ste song ba'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no/ /gza' rnams kyis zla ba phug ste song ba de'i 'bras bu ni zla ba gzas phug pa las zla ba'i gzugs cher skyes la 'od lhag par chen de ni rgyal ba zhes bya'o/ /gal te pham par gyur te/ mthu
[\[47a.7\]]rtsal bri ba na zla ba 'dar zhing g.yon pham pa zhes bya'o/ /de la pa ba sangs kyis phug ste phug ste song na yul man tra dang / yul ba na tra cal dang / yul ma ga d+hA dang / yul da mo tra dang / yul ku ba ra dang / mar gyi yul dang / yul sa ra ga ra dang / yul kha sha dang / yul bu lin tra dang / yul ke ke la
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]dang / kha che'i yul dang / par sig gi yul dang / ri khrod na gnas pa rnams dang / bud med rgyal mo byed pa'i yul dang / yul u ba tri tra dang / yul ang ga dang / yul u tu kur tsa dang / yul su tsa dang / yul su shi na ra dang / yul pu ru sha dang / yul pu li na ta dang / bal yul dang /
[\[47b.2\]]ba lang rji la sogs pa rnams dang / yul pra ta na dang / yul sta la da na dang / bcu la gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas pa'i mi rnams la zla ba bdun tshun chad kyi gnyen dang bcas pa rnams ma rung bar 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam zla ba 'od gsal ba la phur
[\[47b.3\]]bus phug ste song na yul ba sa ta dang / yul sa ni d+ha dang / yul ga na d+ha ra dang / ri khrod na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / bag le'i yul dang / sog le'u yul gyi lung pa'i s+jon nas ri khrod pa brgya stong snyed dang / kha che yul gyi mi la zla ba bcu tshun chad kyis gnod par the tshom med par 'gyur ro/ /
[\[47b.4\]]nam zla ba'i 'od gsal ba mig dmar gyis phug na rgyal po yul gzhan du 'gro ba'am/ rgyal srid bya bar brtson pa'am/ rgyal srid byed par zhugs pa la ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhon pa'i rta rnams zad par 'gyur/ /phan tshun du dbye zhing gnod pa dang / dug dang mtshon mang pos ma rung bar
[\[47b.5\]]'gyur / yul a yo dang / yul pu lin dang / yul ka ling ka'i rgyal po rnams dang / yul pu ri dang / yul sha ka ti mi ta'i skye bo rnams ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul te ga ra ta dang / yul ma la ya ba dang / yul ku ra dang / yul pa tad tsa ra dang / yul shi ba ya'i mi rnams dang /

[\[48a.1\]]a bi sha ha'i mi dang / yul ga shu da tra'i mi dang / yul ma la ba dang / yul a bir dang / mya ngan rnams dang / yul mang ba rnams dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / 'di rnams rgyal mtshan du byed pa'i yul rnams ma rung ba dang / yul rus pa can du 'gyur

[\[48a.5\]]gza' gnyis kyi 'od zer phrad pa dang / gza' zla ba'i thog na yar non te reg par song na gsar du zhugs pas sdan gnas pa rnams pham par byed do/ rgyal pos skye bo rnams 'joms shing za bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba me tog pad+ma dang me tog ku mu da dang 'dra/ tshes grangs bzhin du zla ba skye zhing shas

[\[48b.1\]]dmar zhugs pa de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig dmar tshul de lta bur zhugs pa ni skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /yang gza' mig dmar yon par 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang / phyir yang 'khor zhing zhugs pa dang / mig dmar gyi 'od dang mdog nyams pa dang / gza' mig dmar
[\[48b.2\]]rgyu skar dang nye zhing 'od 'dres pa dang / mig dmar las dud pa 'thus pa dang / 'bar ba dang / mig dmar gyi rtse mo lus 'od zer dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / phan tshun du 'pho zhing 'gro ba'am/ lam gcig tu 'dug la 'od dmar po'am/ yang na dud pa mi sdug pa cher 'thul na gnod pa byed 'dod pa de ni rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/

[\[48b.6\]]ka nas mig dmar rtag tu rgyal ba bzhin du 'dug la/ /nag gu ring ring po zhig tu gyur na rims nad kyang 'byung / rab tu dga' ba med par byed/ gang dag mi'i las kyi 'tsho zhing btso ba dang / sreg par byed pa de dag kyang mar shor zhing thar pas skye ba zad par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar bcu gcig gam lar na rgyu skar bcu'am yang na bcu gnyis kyi nang du

[\[49a.1\]]rten du mi rnams lan dmar po 'byung 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar bcu gsum mam yang na rgyu skar bcu bzhi'i nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa las slar log na de ni yon po sbrul zhes bya ste/ glang po che rnams dang / sbrul po cha dang / sbrul rnams kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis smas pa rnams mi 'tsho/ /sman dang 'bras bu rnams

[\[51b.7\]]ba ste/ /'gro bas ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /gnas pa la ni the tshom 'gyur/ /lam lnga rnam par rgyu ba las/ /dge dang mi dge mkhas pas brtag /chu dang sa dang me dang ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba las/ /zhe rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang / /gsad dang bskrad sogs shes par bya/ /lam
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]lnga'i de nyid mi shes bar/ /bya ba thams cad ma 'grub ste/ /de yi spyor ba mi shes par/ /de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /rlung ni thams cad byed pa ste/ /rtog ge ba yis mi shes so/ /lha mo 'di rnams legs bzung la/ /dge dang mi dge bshad par gyur/ /lha mos gsol ba/ dbang
[\[52a.2\]]phyug chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /lha yi lha mchog thams cad mkhyen/ /lam lnga legs par khyed kyis gsungs/ /da yang bdag la cung zad tsam/ /zhu ba mchis pas gsan du gsol/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed 'char ba ci/ /dbyangs kyi grangs ni du zhig mchis/ /de bzhin gsal byed grangs ni
[\[52a.3\]]du/ /ring thung bye brag ji ltar 'char/ /dkar nag phyogs la gang 'char legs/ /bdag gis mi shes lha khyod la/ /nges par the tshom med par yang / /ma lus pa ni bdag zhu bas/ /de rnams mthar thu gang bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ji ltar khyod kyis bdag zhus pa/ /
[\[52a.4\]]thams cad bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed bzang bo rnams/ /ji ltar 'char ba'i nges pa ni/ /dpyid zla 'bring sogs zla ba yi/ /bcu drug nas bzung stong gi bar/ /dkar phyogs zhes bya ri sras mo/ /de yi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ /nya yi bar ni nag phyogs 'dod/ /de
[\[52a.5\]]la dpyid 'bring zla bar grags/ /de ltar rim bzhin shes par bya/ /de la dpyid 'bring la sogs pa'i/ /tshes la 'char ba'i dbyangs rnams ni/ /a yig dang ni i yig dang / /de bzhin gsum pa u yig ste/ /e yig lha mo yid 'phrog ma/ /e yig dang ni lnga ru 'dod/ /de ltar nga yis dbyangs su
[\[52a.6\]]brjod/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rim bzhin du/ /sa dang chu me rlung dang ni/ /nam mkha'i sbyor bas shes bar bya/ /dri dang ro dang gzugs dang ni/ /reg bya sgra rnams rim bzhin dran/ /dbyangs lnga zhes bya lha chen ma/ /bya ba kun la shes bar bya/ /ring ba lnga rnams dkar phyogs la/ /lan gsum du yang
[\[52a.7\]]'gyur ba yin/ /ka nas ha yi mthar thug pa/ /nga nya Na gsum spangs ba yis/ /gsal byed phyogs gnyis dag las 'char/ /dkar phyogs nag phyogs dag la yang / /mdzes ma yi ge sum cur 'gyur/ /gsal byed ka nas nga yi bar/ /dkar po'i phyogs la rim bzhin 'char/ /dkar phyogs
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ring ba lan gsum ste/ /ka sogs rnams dang lan gcig 'gyur/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / /nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes la yang / /dga' ba nas ni brtsams nas su/ /lan gsum du yang 'char ba yin/ /r-i r-I l-i l-I spangs pa yi/ /dbyangs yig thung ngu lnga bo rnams/ /nag po'i phyogs
[\[52b.2\]]la 'char ba ni/ /ng+ha sogs rnams dang lhan cig 'char/ /so so'i tshes kyi byed pa rnams/ /bdag por lan gsum du yang 'gyur/ /dza na ma ha ni an taka /dza na ma ha ni rim pa bzhin/ /byis pa gzhon nu lang tsho rgan/ /smin te shi ba rim pa bzhin/ /a sogs dbyangs kyi bye brag dang / /tshes ni lnga la
[\[52b.3\]]rim pas sbyar/ /byis pa rgan pa la sogs la/ /dar rgud las kyi bye brag byed/ /tshes la 'char pa'i dbyangs rnams dang / /ming gi dbyangs rnams sbyar bar bya/ /dpyid 'bring dkar phyogs sogs brtsams nas/ /dbyangs rnams 'char ro lha mo kye/ /nyin zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la/ /dbyangs ni re re 'char
[\[52b.4\]]bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zhag ni bcu gnyis la/ /dbyangs ni re re 'char ba dang / /de bzhin zhag lnga dag la yang / /dbyangs rnams 'char bar 'gyur ba dang / /nyin re bzhin du dbyangs re 'char/ /thung dang ring pa'i dbyangs lnga po/ /nyin lnga mtshan lnga 'char ba'ang dran/ /lnga dang sum cu bdun cu gnyis/ /rags
[\[52b.5\]]pa phra ba'i dbye ba yis/ /'char bar 'gyur ro dkar mo kye/ /dkar nag phyogs kyi so so la/ /gsal byed re re 'char ro kye/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla phyed la/ /ri bong can dang dus drug dang / /drag po'i tshes grangs rnams la yang / /dga' ba dang ni a yig dag /nag po'i phyogs la thung rnams 'char/ /
[\[52b.6\]]mig dang thub pa nyi ma la/ /bzang po'i ming can tshes dang ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /so sor skye zhing 'char bar byed/ /me dang bkra shis 'dod tshes la/ /rgyal ba zhes byar grags pa dang / /u zhes 'byung ba'i dbyangs yig 'char/ /bzhi yi nyin zhag bu ga dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag
[\[52b.7\]]la/ /stong par brjod pa'i ches dang ni/ /e yi yi ge dbang bye brag/ /mda' dang phyogs zhes bya ba dang / /de bzhin bco lnga tshes grangs la/ /rdzogs pa zhes pa'i tshes dang ni/ /dbyangs yig o ni nges par 'char/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes grangs la/ /a sogs lnga ni 'char bar dran/ /sngar bzhin brjod
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa'i ches rnams la/ /lha mo ring bor shes par gyis/ /dga' ba bzang bo rgyal pa dang / /stong ba rdzogs pa'i bye brag la/ /mig dmar gza' lhag phur bu nyid/ /pa bsangs spen pa rim bzhin sbyar/ /dkar nag phyogs kyi bye brag la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed 'char ba la/ /rang bzhin
[\[53a.2\]]dbang gis dge mi dge /ra ya ma'i 'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i chas la mig dmar dang / /rgyu skar smin drug a yig rnams/ /'dzom na dang po'i ming yig a/ /na 'chi rma 'byung 'bras bu med/ /bzang po'i tshes dang gza' lhag ces/ /rgyu skar mchu dang a yig dbyangs/ /'char tshe i yig
[\[53a.3\]]cing can rnams/ /nyon mongs 'gyur te snga ma bzhin/ /rgyal bo'i tshes la bla ma'i gza'/ /rgyu skar skag 'char u yig dbyangs/ /u yig ming can srog mthar byed/ /bag ma la sogs 'bras bu med/ /stong ba'i tshes dang pa bsangs/ /rgyu skar mon gru de bzhin te/ /dbyangs ni e yig 'char ba la/ /e
[\[53a.4\]]yig sngar bzhin 'bras bu med/ /rdzogs pa'i tshes la spen pa dang / /rgya skar bra nye nyid 'byung ni/ /dbyangs yig o 'char dus su ni/ /ming ni o can myur du brlag /dga' ba'i tshes la nyi ma'i res/ /a dang ming can nad yun ring / /bzang por zla ba'i nges la ni/ /i dang de ming de bzhin no/ /rang sa
[\[53a.5\]]nas ni lnga pa la/ /nus par gyur ro dkar zlog ma/ /a ni o la nub pa ste/ /i ni a la de bzhin no/ /u yang i la rab tu nub/ /e ni u yi dbyangs la nub/ /u ni nub pa e zhes bshad/ /mdor na sa ni nam mkha' la/ /chu ni sa la nub par 'gur/ /de bzhin du mi shes par bya/ /rtsod
[\[53a.6\]]pa nad dang g.yul 'gyed dang / /bya ba kun la shes par bya/ /'char ba'i dus sa dge ba ste/ /nub dus mi shis par yang dran/ /byis gzhon lang tsho rgan dang 'chi/ /gnas skabs lnga ru brjod pa yin/ /rang sar byis par grags pa ste/ /gnyis pa gzhon nu gsum la 'tsho/ /bzhi pa rgan ta lnga ba shi/ /bye
[\[53a.7\]]brag so sor shes par bya/ /gsal byed nub na nad 'byung ste/ /dbyangs ni 'chi ba ster bar byed/ /lus dang srog gi dbye ba yis/ /gsal byed dbyangs la shes par bya/ /gzhan yang phyogs kyi bye brag ni/ /shar du i yig lho phyogs su/ /e yi yi ge 'char bar 'gyur/ /u yig nub tu 'char ba ste/ /byang du
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]e ni 'byung zhing 'char/ /dbus su o yig zhes byar grags/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed 'char phyogs su/ /'gro ba bya ba kun la spang / /de ltar dbyangs rnams gang 'char ba/ /bltas na yid la rab tu bzung / /rags pa dang ni phra ba yi/ /gnas skabs bye brag la 'char ba/ /bdag gis ji ltar bshad
[\[53b.2\]]pa bzhin/ /shes par gyis shig gangs ri'i bdag /g.yul las rnams par rgyal ba dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las 'am snga dang dbyangs 'char ba nges par bsten pa chen po ste le'u dang po'o// //lha mos gsol pa bcom lda 'das/ /lha chen khyod kyis dbyangs 'char ba/ /shin tu
[\[53b.3\]]bdag la rgyas par gsung / /yang ni bdag la zhu ba mchis/ /rA shi'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba las/ /'dri byed rnyed dang mi rnyed dang / /rgyal dang pham pa thams cad ni/ /mdzes dga' khyod la ji bzhin zhu/ /shin tu gsang ba bshad du gsol/ /lo gcig gi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /cha shad dum ma'i
[\[53b.4\]]mtshan nyid dang / /gtso bo stobs kyi bye brag dang / /dus sbyor phyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /dus sbyor ji ltar yin pa dang / /de la 'dri byed dge mi dge /gza' yi rigs la sogs pa las/ /la sogs bye brag shes pa dang / /dus gsum bye brag shes pa rnams/ /dbang phyug gtso bos bshad du gsol/ /
[\[53b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /nyon cig mdzes ma ma lus ba/ /rA shi'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang / /gza' rnams khyim la 'khod pa dang / /zhag gcig gi ni cha shas la/ /bgos pas dus spyor bcu gnyis te/ /dus sbyor dkyil 'khor mnyam par sbyor/ /dus sbyor gza' bdun gnas pa
[\[53b.6\]]yi/ /'bras bu dkar bo yum khyod nyon/ /lug glang 'khrig pa kar kaT/ /de bzhin seng ge bu mo dang / /srang sdigs gzhu dang chu srin dang / /bum pa nya yi khyim rnams su/ /mig dmar pa bsangs gza' lhag dang / /zla nyi gza' lhag pa ba sangs/ /mig dmar phur bu spen pa yi/ /phur bu zhes bya khyim bdag
[\[53b.7\]]gza'/ /lung glang 'khrig ba ka ra ka Ta/ /shar lho nub byang rim pa bzhin/ /seng ge la sogs brgyad rim bzhin/ /khyim gyi phyogs kyi stobs su brjod/ /nyi ma pa sangs mig dmar dang / /rA hu spen zla gza' lhag phur/ /shar nas dpal ldan mthar thug par/ /g.yas bskor lam gyi 'khor lo ste/ /nyi
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ma shar dge chu bdag ngan/ /de bzhin kun la shes par bya/ /lug la nyin mtshan dbyu gu ni/ /nam mkha' me zhes yongs su grags/ /sum cu so gcis nyi shu brgyad/ /glang gi nyin mtshan las shes bya/ /'khrig par nyin mo sum cu bzhi/ /nyi shu rtsa drug mtshan du drang / /kar ka
[\[54a.2\]]nyin mo sum cu drug /mtshan la nyi shu rtsa bzhi zer/ /seng ger nyin mo sum cu bzhi/ /nyi shu rtsa drug mtshan mo'i tshad/ /bu mor grags pa'i nyin mtshan la/ /sum cu so gnyis nyi shu brgyad/ /srang ni lug dang 'dra ba yin/ /sdig pa'i nyin la nyi shu brgyad/ /mtshan mo sum cu rtsa gnyis zer/ /gzhu yi
[\[54a.3\]]khyim la nyi shu drug /nyin mo'o mtshan mo sum cu bzhi/ /chu srin nyin mo nyi shu bzhi/ /mtshan la sum cu rtsa drug grags/ /bum pa'i nyin mo nyi shu drug /sum cu rtsa bzhi mtshan la'o/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad nya yi nyin/ /mtshan mo sum cu so gnyis zer/ /de ltar chu tshod shes par bya/ /'pho ba gang la
[\[54a.4\]]gnas pa yi/ /'das pa'i zhag grags ji rnyed pa'i/ /gnas gnyis steng ma chu yis bsgyur/ /chu srin nyi shu rtsa lnga yis/ /'og ma bsgyur la drug cus bgo /rnyed pa steng du sbyin par bya/ /phyed pas lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /steng ma drug cus thob pa rnams/ /chu srin la sogs byang bgrod la/ /sbyin pa nyid
[\[54a.5\]]du bya ba yin/ /kar ka Ta sogs lho bgrod la/ /dor bas nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /steng mas drug cu la phri la/ /de la gcig phab lhag mas dbri/ /des ni mtshan mo'i chu tshod shes/ /'pho ba'i nyin mtshan chu tshod de/ /steng ma brgyad kyis thob pa ni/ /thun phyed chu tshod bya bar grags/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba
[\[54a.6\]]las/ /'og gi chu srang steng du gzhug /brgyad kyi chas rnyed thun phyed kyi/ /chu srang zhes kyang dkar zlog ma/ /skar mig dbyug tshes lug gi tshad/ /rig byed mkha' me glang du brjod/ /ro dang zhe lnga 'khrig pa'i yin/ /dgu dang nam mkha' kar ka Ta/ /drag dang bco lnga seng ge'o/ /bcu gsum sum cu bu
[\[54a.7\]]mor dran/ /tshes dang bzhi la srang yin zer/ /nor zla stong pa sdig par go /nyi shu bco lnga gzhu yin mnyam/ /zur mig sum cu chu srin mthong / /rgyal ba mda' chu bum par grags/ /'khor lo nya ru shes par bya/ /khyim gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa yin/ /mtshan nyid rnams ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]skar ma drug cus bsgyur/ /'og gi chu tshod steng du blangs/ /mda' dang yon tan zlas thob pa/ /'das pa'i khyim yin lhag ma la/ /sum cus bsgyur la chu srang ni/ /gnyis kyis bgos thob gzhug par bya/ /mnga' dang yon tan zlas thob pa/ /gang nas khyim gyi 'das zhag yin/ /de la dbyu gu chu srang
[\[54b.2\]]dang / /dbugs kyi don du go rims bzhin/ /bsgyur bas thob pa dbyu gu dang / /chu srang dbugs su rim bzhin 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chu dang zla ba la/ /cha bdun thur ma grib mar bcas/ /bgos pas thob pa chu tshod yin/ /chu srang dbugs kyang rim bzhin sbyar/ /lug dang srang ba drug sbyin bya/ /
[\[54b.3\]]glang dang bu mo rang sar gzhag /'khrig pa seng ger brgyad dor ro/ /kar ka Ta ru bco brgyad dbri/ /sdig pa nya la bcu ba sbyin/ /gzhu dang chu srin bum pa la/ /bcu gnyis dag ni sbyin pa las/ /snga dro 'das pa'i phyi dro las/ /de yis 'das pa'i dbyu gur bro/ /lhag ma lus dang 'das pa
[\[54b.4\]]shes/ /nam mkha' mkha' zung lug gi tshad/ /nam mkha' rig byed mcho ma glang / /stong pa nor lha zung 'khrig pa/ /mkha' so ka ra kaT ru dran/ /mkha' dus me rnams seng ge la'o/ /nam mkha' mkha' mtsho bu mo dran/ /rim pa'i rim pa smin pa las/ /srang sogs bzlog go gangs ri'i bdag
[\[54b.5\]]thams cad nyi ma'i rjes 'brangs te/ /zhag gcig la ni las kyang byed/ /lug sogs khyim rnams res 'jog tu/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par shes/ /mi mnyam pa ni pho yin te/ /mnyam pa mo zhes bya bar dran/ /pho khyim rnams ni drag po ste/ /mo khyim rnams ni zhi bar brjod/ /g.yo dang rtan
[\[54b.6\]]dang gnyis rang bzhin/ /lus sogs rim bzhin du gnas/ /dus sbyor rjes su 'bras bu rnams/ /thob par 'gyur ro lha mdzes ma/ /khyim gyi dus spyor dum bu drug /bshad kyis lha mo chen mo nyon/ /dus spyor gcig dang phyed pa dang / /sum cha dgu cha bcu gnyis cha/ /sum cu'i cha shas bye
[\[54b.7\]]brag rnams/ /shes par gyis shig lha mdzes ma/ /dus spyor gyi ni chu tshod dang / /phyed dang sum cha dgu cha dang / /bcu gnyis cha ya chu tshod dang / /sum cu'i cha shas rab grub pa'i/ /dbyu gu'i grangs rnams bshad pa ni/ /zhag gcig la ni bcu gnyis te/ /de yi gcig gi longs spyod pa/ /mkha'
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]dang nam mkha' brgyad dang gzugs/ /dus sbyor gcig gi tshad du brjod/ /phyed pa la sogs bye brag rnams/ /lha mo dus sbyor nyid las phye/ /mkha' mkha' bug mkha' mkha' ro/ /mkha' mkha' mig dang mkha' dang tshes/ /nam mkha' ro rnams rim pa bzhin/ /
[\[55a.2\]]shes par bya'o bzang mo kye/ /dus sbyor phyed sogs mtshan nyid bshad/ /skal ba chen po'i bdag mo nyon/ /lug la sogs pa'i 'pho ba yi/ /'das pa'i zhag grangs ji snyed pa/ /rang gi chu srang dag gis bsgyur/ /sum cus bgos bas rnyed pa ni/ /khyim de'i 'das pa'i chu srang yin/ /
[\[55a.3\]]de yis khyim gyi chu srang la/ /phri ba'i lhag ma ma 'ongs pa/ /des ni 'pho ba'i 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs pa ni shes par byed/ /dus sbyor gang yin ngos gzung phyir/ /de yi dus kyi chu tshod ni/ /'das rnams drug cus bsgyur bar bya/ /de la ma 'ongs chu srang gis/ /phri bas ma ldang de nyid
[\[55a.4\]]yin/ /ldang na so sor rim bzhin dbye/ /lug sogs drug la rim pa ste/ /srang sogs drug las bzlog pas dbyi/ /gang tshe ma ldang thig le shar/ /de tshe dus spyor tad kA la/ /phri ba'i lhag ma sum cus bsgyur/ /de la tad kal chu sang gis/ /bgos pas thob pa cha shas yin/ /lhag ma
[\[55a.5\]]drug cus bsgyur pa la/ /chu srang gis thob dbyu gu ste/ /yang lhag drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu srang gis thob chu srang yin/ /yang lhag bsgyur bgos da thob dbugs/ /tad kA la cha shas dbugs srang dbugs/ /dus sbyor gyi ni gnas lngar bzhad/ /dus sbyor thog mar gzhag pa'i phyir/ /tad

[\[55a.7\]]gzhug /mkha' mkha' bu gas bgos pa las/ /phyed pas lhag nag cig sbyin bya/ /gnyis bsam mang ba mi srid de/ /gcig ni bdag po nyi ma ste/ /gnyis kyi zla ba bdag po yin/ /de nas dus sbyor sum cha brtag /sngar bzhin cha shas drug cus bsgyur/ /chu tshod steng gzhug drug brgyas
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bgo /ji srid lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /rnyed pa gsum las mang pa min/ /gcig ni tad kA la yin te/ /gnyis ni tad kA la nas bgrangs lnga/ /gsum byung dgu pa'i dus sbyor te/ /gang yin bdag po'i 'bras bu 'byung / /de nas dgu cha brtag par bya/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /
[\[55b.2\]]rgyu tshod steng gzhug mkha' stong mig /bgos bas lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /de ni dus sbyor dgu cha ste/ /thog mar tad kA la gang yin nam/ /bzung la dgu cha gang yin blta/ /gang yin bdag po'i 'bras bu 'byung / /lug seng gzhu rnams lug nas bgrang / /chu srin bu mo glang rnams
[\[55b.3\]]ni/ /chu srin nas ni thog ma bya/ /'khrig pa bum pa srang rnams ni/ /dang por srang nas grags bzung ngo / /kar kaT dang sdig pa nya/ /kar kaT nyid thog mar gzhag /bcu gnyis cha ni blta ba la/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu tshod steng gzhug mkha' chos kyis/ thob la

[\[55b.5\]]lhag pa bsangs rim pas bzhag /lnga dang lnga dang brgyad bdun lnga/ /gnas gnyis dag la dgod par bya/ /lug sogs mi mnyam pa yi khyim/ /rim pa bzhin du bsrangs ba yi/ /dbus kyi bdag po'i 'bras bu 'byung / /glang sogs mnyam la rim min te/ /de ltar shes bya mdzes ma kye/ /

[\[55b.7\]]pa yi/ /dus sbyor gnas stobs nye bar shes/ /mi rnams la ni yongs su grags/ /'khrig pa bu mo srang bum pa/ /shar du stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /lug glang seng ge gzhu rnams ni/ /lho ru de bzhin stobs su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i dus sbyor gcig bu ni/ /nub tu stobs cher 'gyur bar
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]grags/ /kar ka chu srin nya ni byang / /phyogs kyi stobs su bshad pa yin/ /lug glang 'khrig pa ka ra kaT/ /gzhu dang chu srin mtshan mo la/ /seng ge bu mo srang sdig pa/ /bum nya nyin mo stobs dang ldan/ /tad kA la yi dus sbyor gyi/ /mthong ba'i sa na bdag po'i
[\[56a.2\]]gza'/ /yod na shin tu bzang ba ste/ /de yi grogs po yod kyang bzang / /btang snyoms la ni btang snyoms 'gyur/ /nya yi khyim bdag phur bu ste/ /de yis mthong ba'i sa rnams la/ /de dang grogs po yod na bzang / /dgra rnams yod na mi dag ste/ /bdun la dgra yod 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
[\[56a.3\]]dge sdig gang yod stobs che ste/ /dran pa'i stobs su rab tu grags/ /de nas gzhan yang dus sbyor gyi/ /dum bu sum cu'i cha shas bshad/ /lug tu nyi mar cha shas bcu/ /glang la zla ba cha shas gsum/ /ka ra ka phur pa lnga yang dge /bu mo gza' lhag bco lnga'o/ /srang du

[\[56b.1\]]'gyur te/ /nyin dang mtshan la stobs che ba/ /gza' lhag ces byar yongs su grags/ /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /dkar po'i phyogs la stobs che ste/ /nyi ma dang ni spen pa dag /nag po'i phyogs la stobs su 'gyur/ /gnyis ka la ni stobs byed pa/ /zla ba mig dmar gza'
[\[56b.2\]]lhag go /zla ba dang ni pa ba sangs/ /glang sogs mo rnams stobs ldan te/ /lhag ma'i gza' rnams pho khyim la/ /stobs dang ldan 'gyur mthong dga' ma/ /byang du bgrod tshe stobs che ba/ /nam mkha'i nor bu'i ri bong can/ /de las gzhan pa'i gza' rnams ni/ /lhor bgrod stobs
[\[56b.3\]]byed yid 'dren ma/ /nyi ma zla ba bzhi pa la/ /stobs 'gyur mdzes dga' snying 'dren ma/ /rgyas par gza' lhag de bzhin te/ /pa ba sangs kyis dbang la stobs/ /mig dmar dgug pa phur bu bskrang / /gsad la stobs che spen pa'o/ /de rnams dbang byed khyim rnams la'ang / /

[\[57a.1\]]brjod/ /nag chad ga la dbang byed pa/ /zla ba nyi ma mig dmar dang / /srin pa'o dkar cha dbang byed pa/ /zla ba de bzhin phur bu dang / /pa sangs dge'o rje btsun ma/ /gza' lhag gnyis ka'i mtshams la dbang / /nyi ma mig dmar phur bu rnams/ /skyes ba'i

[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]dang / /gar dang rtse dang 'khrug pa rmi/ /khyim dang gza' ni so so ste/ /khyim bdag min pa'i gza' shar na/ /rmi lam 'dren ma 'byung pa'am/ /yang na rmi lam mi shes so/ /khyim bdag gza' yi dgrar gyur pa'i/ /gza' rnams shar na ngan pa rmi/ /nyi ma gnas pa nas bgrangs pa'i/ /
[\[60b.2\]]bdun na zla ba yod pa'am/ /zla gnas bdun la nyi ma yod/ /de tshe 'dri na rmi lam yod/ /de las gzhan pa 'dri ba la/ /rmi lam med par sher bar bya/ /rmi lam rmi ba'i dus bstan pa/ /tad kAl cha shes sum cu yi/ /rang bzhin yin pas de la blta/ /cha shas bcu shar sum cha na/ /bco
[\[60b.3\]]lnga shar na nam phyed na/ /sum cu yod na tho rangs te/ /de la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams/ /mkhas pas zhib tu brtag par bya/ /'pho ba'i rgyu skar tshes bsres la/ /spyod pa'i gza' yis legs par bsgyur/ /ming yig dang po'i gsal byed ni/ /rim pas bsres la gsum gyis bgo /
[\[60b.4\]]de yi lhag mas dkon mod dang / /rim gyi bye brag ston par byed/ /zang dkon rims mang ri bong can/ /dbu mar brjod pa gnyis lhag pa/ /ma lus ba la rims med mod/ /zla re bzhin du brtags te smra/ /skyes bu ji snyed snang gyur pa/ /mi rnams rgan pa'i rim pa yi/ /dbyangs dang
[\[60b.5\]]gsal byed ji snyed pa/ /re re bri la gsal byed sdom/ /gnyis kyis bsgyur la dbyangs kyis dbri/ /skyes bus bgos lhag rgan po nas/ /rim pa bzhin no gangs ri'i bdag /blo gsal yid gzhungs las shes bya/ /slar yang gzhan yang gsal byed rnams/ /rim pas bgrangs la re re
[\[60b.6\]]bri/ /de la sngar gyi cho ga yis/ /chom rkun the tshom med par shes/ /skyes pa bud med lhan cig las/ /lus dang yan lag so sor phye/ /lus ni rgya mtshos bsgyur byas te/ /yan lag mi yis bsgyur bar bya/ /gcig tu bsdoms la gsum gyis bgo /zung ni bu mo gcig mkha' bu/ /
[\[60b.7\]]gang tshe bud med 'ongs pa yis/ /dris pa'i dang po'i gsal byed gsum/ /sde tshan bgrang bsdam mig gi phye/ /pho mo zla ba stong pas shes/ /gsal byed rim pas blangs pa gsum/ /sdom la bcus bsgyur dgus thob pa/ /'das pa'i zla ba shes par bya/ /sbrum ma'i zla ba'o dga' byed ma/ /
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]de ltar nges pa ma mthong bas/ /yang nas yang du 'dri ba la/ /sngar gyis thob pas de dang ni/ /lhag ma bsres la dgu yis phye/ /lhag mas zla ba rtogs pa ste/ /thig le shar na zla ba bcu/ /yang ni 'dri bar byed pa la/ /rnyed dang lhag ma bsdoms la brtag /gzhan
[\[61a.2\]]yang sbrum ma'i gsal byed ni/ /dang po mi mnyam bu skye zhing / /gnyis dang bzhi sogs bu mor 'gyur/ /tha ma lnga la ma ning 'gyur/ /bud med ming gi skar ma'i grangs/ /de bzhin tshes dang gza' dang ni/ /dri tshig dang po'i yi ge'i grangs/ /bsres la bdun gyis bgos pa yi/ /lhag
[\[61a.3\]]ma mnyam na bu mo ste/ /mi mnyam pa ni bu ru mthong / /bud med sbrum mar gyur pa yi/ /ming gi dbyangs rnams ji snyed pa/ /gsang ba'i tshad pa gang yod bsre/ /thub pas bgos pas rnyed pa rnams/ /lnga yis bsgyur la lhag ma bsre/ /de la gsum gyis bgos thob pa/ /ri bong can nyid

[\[61a.5\]]ma gcig gis don rnyed cing / /gnyis lus dbu mar bstan pa ste/ /lhag ma med na 'dri byed kyi/ /don ni the tshom med par nyams/ /de ltar bzang ngan brtags nas ni/ /yid la sems pa shes par bya/ /skyes ba bud med gnyis kyi ni/ /ming gi yi ge ji snyed pa/ /a sogs dbyangs su shes

[\[61a.7\]]gyur na/ /mi mo de bzhin srog dang bral/ /'di ni khyo shug cho ga ste/ /gzhan du ma bshad ri sras mo/ /kyen du re khA dgu pa la/ /'phred la re khA gsum bris la/ /a ka tsaT ta pa ya/ /sha rnams steng dgod 'og ma la/ /klu mda' ro dang mtsho dang ni/ /zla me mig ring bzhin du

[\[61b.1\]]dgong / /ming gi yi ge ji snyed pa/ /'og mas steng la bsgyur bar bya/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed so sor bsdom/ /mtsho dang mig gis rim bzhin bsgyur/ /gcig tu bsdoms la me yis phye/ /lhag mar stong pa'i ri bong can/ /skyes pa gshin rjes sngon la khrid/ /gang tshe

[\[62a.1\]]bzlog nas gnas na dgos don med/ /gal te las ni byed par gnas/ /bsam pa'i yid la 'dod pa 'grub/ /skyes pa sgo nang g.yas 'jog cing / /de bzhin bud med g.yon 'jog pa/ /dge zhing shes par ston pa ste/ /bzlog na 'dri ba'i don nyams
[\[62a.2\]]'gyur/ /g.yas kyi yan lag g.yo ba dang / /snying nyid ngan pa rnam par spang / /nye 'khor shis pa'i bya ba byed/ /bsam mi dgos bas don mi 'grub/ /'dri byed mgrin pa 'gram pa dang / /rna ba sna mig brang dang ni/ /lce dang gsang ba snying dang so/ /skra dang dpral ba gsus pa dang / /nu ma
[\[62a.3\]]dang ni dgu rnams su/ /lag pa g.yas pas reg cing g.yo/ /gdong ni sngon du bltas pa'i tshe/ /dge ba'i las yin bzhin bzangs ma/ /g.yon pas reg cing g.yo ba ni/ /de las bzlog par shes par bya/ /'dri byed pho nya'i nye 'khor na/ /ba lang ra lug gsod pa dang / /'thab rtsod rdeg

[\[62a.6\]]dang / /dge slong bram ze bla ma lha/ /lha mchod pa dang dga' ston byed/ /nor rnyed tshong pa rnyed pa che/ /gang dag skyes bu ya mtshan can/ /gos bzang yan lag bzang ba dang / /rgyal bo bud med rgyan can mthong / /dkar phyogs dang ni mthun pa'i mdog /nyigs la 'bras bu me tog rgyas/ /

[\[62b.4\]]ltar khyod kyis bdag dris ba/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bstan te/ /ngo mi chog pas khyod la bshad/ /gang zhig dbyangs 'char zhes bya ba'i/ /bstan bcos bshad pa don yod pa/ /dgra dang rtsod par byed pa yi/ /dus ni ma nor nges bzung ste/ /'khrug pa la
