[\[64a.1\]]rA hu'i dgu ru dran/ /zla ba ri bu yi bdun yin te/ /de bzhin dkar pos lnga zhes bya/ /nyi ma'i mthong sa nor rnams zad/ /mig dmar rA hu spen pa yis/ /lus can rnams ni 'chi bar byed/ /phur bus gnyen rnams brlag cing 'chi/ /pa sangs las nyams don mi

[\[64b.7\]]gnas/ tha skar gal te spen pa 'ongs/ /nad 'byung grogs rnams 'chi bar dran/ /rgyu skar bdag po'i nus pa ste/ /rang gi bdag po'i 'khor lo yin/ /smin drug la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /bzhi bzhir yongs su phye ba las/ /sde tshan bdun du 'gyur ba ste/ /bzhi la re khAs bskor ba bdun/ /
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]nyi zla pa sangs phur bu dang / /mig dmar gza' lhag rA hu spen/ /rim pa bzhin bstan mtha' ma'i char/ /rA hu spen pa gnyis te bzhin/ /sde tshan phan tshun bsnol gnas las/ /mo de thad ka'i nus pa 'byung / /nyi ma mig dmar thad kar te/ /mig dmar nyi
[\[65a.2\]]mar gdong btsugs so/ /de bzhin zla ba gza' lhag ste/ /spen pa phur bu phan tshun bltas/ /pa sangs rA hu de bzhin du/ /thad kar bsnol bas stobs su 'gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer phyogs rnams su/ /phyugs dang rin chen lo tog sogs/ /thad ka'i skyon gyis brlag par ni/ /'gyur ro
[\[65a.3\]]lha yi dbang phyug ma/ /gza' rnams thad kar gdong btsugs pas/ /phan tshun chen po'i 'khor lor grags/ /smin drug la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /phyogs der bdun ni gnas pa las/ /rang gi phyogs su 'gro bar chas/ /dge'o dpa' mo dbang phyug ma/ /shar phyogs shar bzhin byang
[\[65a.4\]]du ste/ /byang yang byang bzhin shar du'ang bzang / /de bzhin lho dang nub phyogs kyang / /phan tshun mnyam par dge ba yin/ /me nas rlung dus ri g+ha/ /mtshams la rgal na mi shis pas/ /don nyams sdug bsngal ngal dub dang / /rmongs shing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /me dang rlung du
[\[65a.5\]]mtshams bcas pas/ /sa ri g+ha yi 'khor lo yin/ /dbang ldan dang ni zug pa'i dbus/ /mer ni skag dang mchu zhes brjod/ /bden bra las ga lha mtshams dbus/ /gro bzhin mon gre rlung de bzhin/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba ste/ /lha mo de ltar phan tshun gnas/ /phyogs bzhi phan tshun
[\[65a.6\]]mi mthun phyir/ /phan tshun rnam par spangs pa yin/ /rdzogs pa dang ni zug pa'i dbus/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bar dran ni/ /rdzogs dang thug pa'i dbus su ni/ /bzlog ste 'gro la bzang ba med/ /rdzogs dang zug pa'i chu tshod lnga/ /mi dge'i lhag ma skyon dang bral/ /sngar bshad thad ka'i
[\[65a.7\]]gdong tshugs kyis/ /'khor lo de ltar 'dir shes bya/ /de ltar ma 'khrul shes bya ste/ /skyon gyi 'bras bu rnams par spangs/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor lo ste/ /be ra mu ba'i 'khor lo yin/ /de ltar thur ma'i 'khor lo mchog /dge dang mi dge'i bye brag rnams/ /phye ste rgyas par bstan pa
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]ste/ /legs par rtogs sam skal bzang ma/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rkang pa brgya ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga bstan pa dang sha la ka'i 'khor lo bstan pa chen po ste le'u bzhi ba'o// //lha mos gsol pa/ lha chen 'khor lo mchog tu dge /
[\[65b.2\]]rkang pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /cho ga shin tu rgyas par yod/ /dbang phyug lha las nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /rkang pa brgya cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /mnyam pa'i 'khor lo rgyas pa 'dir/ /g.yul las rnam par rgyal pa yi/ /bstan bcos don kun ma
[\[65b.3\]]tshang med/ /sha la ka yi 'khor lo yang / /'di dang lhan cig mnyam par gnas/ /thig ni drang po cha bcu ru/ /mdzes ma mnyam par gnas par bya/ /de la re mig brgyad cu gcig /'byung bar nges so sdu gu ma/ /grwa nas grwar bzung re mig la/ /a sogs dbyangs kyi yi ge dgod/ /
[\[65b.4\]]smin drug nas ni bra nye'i bar/ /phyi yi re mig bdun la dgod/ /lnga las gsal byed nyi shu rnams/ /a wa ka ha Da sogs dgod/ /de bzhin thog mar glang la sogs/ /re mig gsum la dgod par bya/ /dga' ba la sogs tshes rnams ni/ /dbus kyi re mig lnga la dgod/ /de ltar skar ma
[\[65b.5\]]la sogs pa/ /g.yas bskor sbyor bas dkar mo kye/ /de ltar brgyad cu rtsa gcig la/ /dus kyi lha rnams thams cad tshang / /rang gi rgyu skar gsal byed dbyangs/ /khyim dang tshes la mche ba brtag /sdig gza' thal ka la ni ngan/ /gnyis dang gsum gyis brlag 'gyur te/ /gcig gi thad
[\[65b.6\]]kar song pa yin/ /don nyams nor rnams zad byed/ /ming la drag po'i gza' rnams 'joms/ /nges par 'chi bar mthong zhes dran/ /bsod nams sdig can ming la zin/ /rims 'byung nor rnams zad par byed/ /be na si kar drag po'i gza'/ /gsum 'dzom tshe ni 'jig par ston/ /
[\[65b.7\]]skyes pa las dang bi nA shar/ /a d+ha na la rims nad 'byung / /bsod nams gza' rnams shar nub tu/ /nyi ma la nub ngan par 'gyur/ /ming gi skar mar nyi ma song / /'chi ba la sogs 'byung ba'i phyir/ /phyogs gang nyi ma gnas pa'i phyogs/ /rgyu skar yi ge dus sbyor tshes/ /phyugs nyams
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'thab rtsod mya ngan 'byung / /bran g.yog longs spyod rnam par nyams/ /nyi ma dang bral phyogs gsum kar/ /dgra las rgyal zhing grogs bzang phrad/ /'dod pa'i don 'grub phun sum tshogs/ /rnyed dang grags pa de bzhin 'byung / /dbang po la sogs sde tshan gyi/ /lag
[\[66a.2\]]sogs dbus na gnas ba la/ /nyi ma gnas tshe nub 'gyur te/ /phyogs de'i ming gi rgyu skar dang / /tshes khyim gsal byed dbyangs rnams ni/ /bsregs nyams tshad pas gdungs ba yis/ /rnam par nyams par 'byung ba'i phyir/ /dbus su zla ba gsum gsum ngan/ /lhag ma'i phyogs gsum
[\[66a.3\]]dge ba ste/ /zla ba'i sde tshan de bzhin smra/ /gsal byed rgyu skar tshes khyim dbyangs/ /phyogs kyi bdag po mkha' 'gro'i phyir/ /gang gi phyogs na nyi ma gnas/ 'gro 'dug byed pa dge bar grags/ /da gzod dge dang mi dge brtag /sngon du bsam pa mkhas pa yin/ /shar du smin drug
[\[66a.4\]]skrag gi bar/ /nges gnas yi ge lnga po yang / /a wa ka ha Da la sogs/ /khyim ni glang 'khrig kar ka Ta/ /dga' ba zhes bya grwa nas dbyangs/ /dbyangs yig dang po lnga pa dang / /dgu pa dang ni bcu gsum yod/ /nyi ma shar du 'ongs tshe nub/ /mchu nas sa ga'i bar du yang / /ming
[\[66a.5\]]gi gsal byed lnga bo ni/ /ma yig la sogs ldan par gnas/ /de bzhin seng ge bu mo srang / /grwa ni dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang / /drug pa bcu ba bcu bzhir dran/ /bzang bo tshes te lho phyogs su/ /nyi ma gnas tshe nub par grags/ /lha mtshams la sogs gro bzhin mthar/ /na nas
[\[66a.6\]]kha yi mthar thug par/ /gsal byed yi ge lngar yang grags/ /sdig pa gzhu dang chu srin dran/ /rgyal po'i tshes so dbyangs yig rnams/ /mi thub drag dang dbang phyug gnas/ /gal te chu ru nyi ma song / /de rnams nub par bstan pa yin/ /mon gru la sogs bra nye gnas/ /gang nas la yi mthar
[\[66a.7\]]thug par/ /yi ge lnga ni gnas par bstan/ /khyim ni bum pa nya dang lug /tshes ni stong pa dbyangs ni chu/ /nor dang nyi ma rgyal bor dran/ /nyi ma drung nas nub pa yin/ /bsod nams gza' rnams dge zhes zer/ /rtsa ba yan lag tshes kyi gza'/ /nye ba'i gza' la sogs pa rnams/ /
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]nyi ma gnas pa'i rjes 'brang zhing / /de bzhin spro zhing sdud par byed/ /ji ltar glog ni lnga ba la/ /longs spyod yongs su rdzogs par shes/ /'di ltar brgyad la shu la gnas/ /bcu bzhi ba la 'brug tu dran/ /bco brgyad de bzhin mjug tu brjod/ /mkha' mig gtso zhes nges par mthong / /
[\[66b.2\]]thog ces ming dang lag par grags/ /sa g.yos gsum lhag nyi shu'o/ /de bzhin rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ /gtun shing dag tu grags pa yin/ /sgra gcan mig dmar spen pa rnams/ /mthongs sngon du dgu gsum brgyad/ /nye ba'i gza' yi sbyor ba rnams/ /rgyu skar la sogs shes bar bya/ /
[\[66b.3\]]rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun ni/ /thams cad tshang bar bskor ba yin/ /dus sbyor byed gza' 'char ba ni/ /sum cu'i tshes la'ang 'char zhing bskor/ /dang po'i thun la tshes kyi bdag /lan bzhi byi bzhin dus sbyor byed/ /nyin mo gza' rnams drug la bskor/ /mtshan mo lnga la bskor ba yin/ /
[\[66b.4\]]'di ltar lo dang lug sogs khyim/ /tshes dang thun mtshams rim pa bzhin/ /bdag po'i gza' rnams 'char bas na/ /skar ma las ni rtogs par bya/ /dza na ma hU ni a na d+ha ka /dza na ma hU ni rim pa bzhin/ /tshes la lan gsum 'char bar grags/ /dkar po la sogs tshes gcig la/ /
[\[66b.5\]]dus sbyor phyed la de ltar 'char/ /phyed gong phyed 'og dkar nag dran/ /mtshams yang de ltar dkar na brjod/ /drag po'i tshes dang dreg po'i gza'/ /skar ma drag po gsum 'dzom pa/ /shin tu mi shis ngan pa ste/ /ba ni sha ka zhes byar grags/ /rkang pa brgyal cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /'khor
[\[66b.6\]]lor gsum 'dzom gdong tshugs grags/ /glang chen myos ba'i mche ba yis/ /blangs te za bar byed dang mtshungs/ /g.yas g.yos mche bas 'dzin pa ste/ /sna yi mdun na sdod pa gsod/ /ji ltar grwa bzhir gnas pa yi/ /a sogs bzhi pos spang ba las/ /gal te dbyangs yig bcu gnyis
[\[66b.7\]]kyang / /mche ba nges pa ces mi spang / /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi phyir/ /brjod du mi btub gsang ste bzhag /re mig dang po dgu pa dang / /bcu bdun nyi shu lnga ba ste/ /rkang pa brgyad bcu rtsa gcig las/ /'dis ni mche ba rnam par spangs/ /gzhan yang rkang ba bcu gnyis kyi/ /u phyogs
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po/ /gal te 'di la gdong tshugs shar/ /grwa bzhir gdong tshugs ci ste med/ rkang pa drug la gang gnas pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig nyi shu lnga/ /brgya phyed gcig gis ma ldang ba'i/ /brgya yi phyed dang gcig lhag pa/ /re mig bdun cu rtsa
[\[67a.2\]]gcig bas/ /khengs pa rnams kyis de ma spangs/ /grwar gnas yi ge ji bzhin te/ /zla ba 'phel bar mi byed do/ /nyi zla'i bar mnyam bco lnga ste/ /cung zad bsnol bas 'grib par dran/ /des na gang ba'i tshes la ni/ /glang chen mche bas rgyab kyis phyogs/ /lo dang zla ba nyin zhag la/ /
[\[67a.3\]]rnam par 'char bar shes par bya/ /dkar nag phyogs kyi nyin zhag la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed stobs byed ngan/ /dkar phyogs las skyes dkar po ste/ /nag phyogs las skyes nag po la/ /stobs ni che bar 'gyur ba ste/ /zla ba phyed par yongs su grags/ /g+hang tsha dang Sha Na Tha/ d+ha
[\[67a.4\]]paD+ha dang tha dza nya/ /ka ba bzhi bor gnas ba las/ /gsal byed yi ge gsum gsum bstan/ /smin drug sdig can gnas pa las/ /bre nye g.yas song a dang glang / /dga' ba bzang bo srang dang te/ /sa ga g.yos te byi ba bzhin bdun/ /de bzhin rgyu skar kun la sbyar/ /snar ma u dang tha
[\[67a.5\]]skar g.yas/ /wa 'khrig o dang bu mo dang / /sa rig yon te gro bzhin mdun/ /mgo yi g.yon nas ka yig dang / /kar ka seng ge pa nag pa/ /mdun du chu smad ces bya ste/ /a dang la dang nam gru g.yas/ /bsod nams shar na zas med cing / /sdig can 'dag nyid rnam par
[\[67a.6\]]nyams/ /lag gi g.yon nas ha dang lI/ /Ta yig mi bzhi g.yas su wa/ /li tsa khrums smad mdun phyogs su/ /chu stod sdig can zas med cing / /sngon bzhin srog mthar byed pa yin/ /nab so'i g.yon du Ta bad bo/ /g.yas su ka yig glang lug dang / /khrums stod mdun du
[\[67a.7\]]snrubs zhes bya/ /sdig pas 'joms par ston pa yin/ /rgyal gyi don du u dang gre/ /g.yas su ha yig 'khrig pa o/ /nya dang sa yig mon gre dang / /mdun du snron te mche bas btab/ /skag nas g.yos du mchu zhes dran/ /Da dang kar ka dga' ba sdong / /bum pa ga yig mon gru
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]g.yas/ /lha mtshams mdun gnas sdig pas gdungs/ /mchu yi g.yas su skag bzung ste/ /g.yon nas ma yig seng ge dang / /bzang po rgyal ba chu srin kha/ /byi bzhin mdun du bre nye'o/ /sdag gnas bcom pa'i bdag nyed dran/ /gre yi g.yon nas Da yig dang / /bu mo i yig
[\[67b.2\]]gzhu dang dza/ /gro bzhin g.yas su u dang rgyal/ /mdun du tha skar sdig can 'joms/ /dbo yig g.yon du ba dang srang / /sdig pa 'ba' zhig chu smad rnams/ /g.yas phyogs ma Da nab so bzung / /mdun du nam gru sdig gza'i bdag /ra o ya dang chu stod rnams/ /me bzhi'i g.yon
[\[67b.3\]]du mche bas btab/ /Da li ha dang lag rnams g.yas/ /khrums smad mdun du sdig pas gnod/ /nag par sdig pas gnod pa la/ /tan snrubs ni g.yon du ste/ /pa dang seng ge ka ra kaT/ /ka dang mgo g.yas khrums stod mdun/ /g.yas g.yos mdun du gnas pa rnams/ /sdig
[\[67b.4\]]can bdag nyid gnod par dran/ /sa rer sdig gnas g.yon du ri/ /snron nog g.yas su de bzhin ra/ /bu mo o dang 'khrig pa ma/ /snar ma mdun du mon grer grags/ /sa gar sdig can lha mtshams g.yon/ /g.yas su ta yig srang bzang po/ /dga' ba glang dang a yig dang / /smin
[\[67b.5\]]drug mdun du mon gru bzung / /lha mtshams la gnas g.yas su ni/ /sa ga g.yon nas na sdig pa/ /rgyal ba stong pa lug dang la/ /bra nye'o de bzhin mdun du skag/ /snron la ya yig gzhu a:nya/ /tsa yig tha skar mche ba g.yon/ /g.yas su ri yig sa ri bzung / /rgyal ni mdun te sdig
[\[67b.6\]]pa'i bdag /snrubs nas b+ha yig chu srin dang / /bum pa da yig nam grub g.yon/ /na ta nag pa g.yas su ste/ /mdun du nab so sdig can gnod/ /gang zhig chu stod sdig can gnas/ /ja ai sha dang khrums smad g.yon/ /ya e ra dang me bzhin gnas/ /mdun na lag gi gnod can dag /
[\[67b.7\]]gal te chu smad sdig can gnas/ /khag khrums stod g.yon pas 'dzin/ /b+ha yig sdig pa srang la dbo/ /g.yas te mdun du mgo la gnod/ /gro bzhin la gnas g.yas su dza/ /gzhu dang a yig bu mo Ta/ /bre 'o g.yon pas r-i yig dang / /mon gru de bzhin mdun snar ma/ /byi bzhin
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]byi ni g.yas phyogs su/ /kha yig chu srin rgyal ba bzad/ /seng ge ma yig mchu rnams zin/ /g.yon du mon gre smin drug mdun/ /mon grer gal te sdig can gnas/ /g.yas su byi bzhin g.yon du ga/ /bum pa stong dga' ka ra kaT/ /Da ka g.yas so
[\[68a.2\]]sa ga mdun/ /mon grur bdag nyid chen po gnas/ /sa da nya khyim o 'khrig pa/ /ha rgyal g.yon bzung g.yas su ri/ /gro bzhin du ni sa rir dran/ /gnod pa khrums stod la gnas te/ /khag chu smad g.yas su 'dzom/ /g.yon du da yig lug glang ka /nab so'i mdun du
[\[68a.3\]]nag pa bcom/ /khrums smad dga' te sdig can 'ongs/ /tsa li wa lag g.yon pas 'dzin/ /sha o dza dang khrums stod g.yas/ /mdun du me bzhi rnam par 'joms/ /nam gru'i g.yas su da yig dang / /bum pa chu srin b+ha yig snrubs/ /g.yon du D+ha a rgyu skar mgo /mdun
[\[68a.4\]]du dbo zhes bcom par dran/ /tha skar g.yon du u yig dang / /snar ma g.yas su tsa yig nya/ /a tha gzhu dang ya dang snron/ /mdun du gre ni rnam par nyams/ /bre nye g.yon du smin drug ste/ /g.yas su la yig lug stong pa/ /rgyal ba sdig pa na yig dang / /lha mtshams mdun du

[\[68a.6\]]bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad pa la/ /yin can zhes byar kun du grags/ /de ltar mche ba drug gnon pas/ /drug 'dzin zhes bya lha sras mo/ /rkang pa bcu dgu pa yi grangs/ /a d+ha na zhes de bzhin brjod/ /rigs dang yul dang dbang bskur gsum/ /gang la mche bas bzung
[\[68a.7\]]ba'am/ /gdong mjug med na dge ba ste/ /gdong mjug mche bas mi dge byed/ /skyes par gdon shar nad 'byung zhing / /nor zad ku co dgra dang rtsod/ /las la mche gnas grogs dang 'thab/ /bzo byas bla med las mi 'grub/ /rnam 'gres gnyen bshes pho mo bye/ /gal
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]te rgyan nam mche bas btab/ /bsam pa'i don rnams 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bi na sha ka rims nad 'chi/ /yid can gdong tshugs sdug bsngal 'thob/ /de ltar drug la mi dge byed/ /smin drug bram ze'i rigs yin te/ /rgyal rigs 'dzin pa rgyal zhes bya/ /nam gru rje'u'i rigs la

[\[68b.3\]]rim pa bzhin/ /lags sogs gsum la sdig can gnas/ /shar gyi rgyal bo tshogs rnams 'jig /smin drug sogs gsum yul dbus kyi/ /ma ga d+ha sogs rnams la ngan/ /skag sogs shar lho'i sems can skrag /dbo sogs lho ru mi dge ste/ /sa ri la sogs lho nub
[\[68b.4\]]pa/ /snron sogs sin d+hu sogs nub shes/ /nub byang hong sogs chu smad sogs/ /mon gre la sogs byang gi yul/ /nam gru la sogs byang shar yul/ /sdig gnas mi dge dbang phyug ma/ /snying ga bshang lam de bzhin kha/ /yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ /dbo gnyis
[\[68b.5\]]mnyam par gsum gnas la/ /rus sbal 'khor lor yongs su grags/ /lha mo skar ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu thob/ snying gi dbus kyi yul rig cing / /yan lag bzhis ni mtshams kyi yul/ /kha yi shar na gnas pa'i yul/ /bshang lam nub phyogs
[\[68b.6\]]btsun mo kwa /dbo gnyis lho byang yul du ni/ dbyangs 'char rgyud las yongs su grags/ /bsod nams sdig can gang sbyor ba/ /dge dang mi dge nges bar mthong / /de nas se bI tsa kra bshad/ /legs bar nyon cig lha chen ma/ /'di ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /dgos pa
[\[68b.7\]]thams cad 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /rang gi skye bar 'dzin pa yi/ /skar ma dang por gzhag pa las/ mgo bor 'dun bzhag mdzes dga' ma/ /de bzhin rgyab tu bdun nas brjod/ /snying gar bdun ni gnas par bstan/ /rkang par bdun bzhag dbang phyugs bdag /rang gi skar mar
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]gang brjod pa/ /mgo bo'i dbus song mchog tu dge /mgo bor gnas pas dga' bskyed cing / mchog 'gyur legs ster rjes 'dzin 'gyur/ /rgyab kyi skar ma la sogs ngan/ /ji bzhin pa yi bcu cha snyed/ /gal te snying ga'i skar mar song / /bdag po'i
[\[69a.2\]]dbang song ci bgyid byed/ /ji snyed rkang pa'i skar ma la/ /zhu ba don med nyon mongs 'gyur/ /mig gis mi mthong re drag 'char/ /bden par nges dran ri sras mo/ /de ltar brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /'khor lo zhes grags bzhin bzang ma/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba gsang
[\[69a.3\]]ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rkang pa brgya cu rtsa gcig pa'i 'khor lo sbyor ba bstan pa chen po ste le'u lnga pa'o// //lha mos gsol ba/ lha yi lha mchog bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la zhus pa/ /lus can skyes pa'i gnas skabs la/ /dge ba mi dge ji
[\[69a.4\]]ltar gnas/ /dus kyi 'khor lo ji lta bu/ /gnas dang 'chi ba'i khyad par las/ dge dang mi dge'i rim pa bzhin/ /lha chen bdag la cis ma gsung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i man ngag lha/ /dkar mo myur du nyan par gyis/ /lus
[\[69a.5\]]can kun gyi srog shes pa/ /dus kyis 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /mu khyud bzhi ba lte ba can/ /rtsibs ni bcu gnyis re mig ni/ /sum cu bdun ldan 'khor lo ste/ /rim pa gsum du bris nas ni/ /tshe dang srog rlung zhag grangs dang / /lo zla nyin zhag rim bas bri/ /nyi khyim 'pho ba
[\[69a.6\]]zhes bya ba/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lam las ni/ /rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid rig par bya/ /'di la dge dang mi dge brtag /nag po'i ches gcig nas gzung ste/ /nyin zhag gsum du 'phag gcig la/ /zla ba'i 'grod pa rgyu ba ste/ /de nas nyin gsum nyi bgrod 'gyur/ /de bzhin bco
[\[69a.7\]]lnga'i bar du yang / /zhag ni gsum gsum shes par bya/ /dkar bo'i chos gcig nas brtsams te/ /nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni/ /nyi ma'i bgrod ba rgyu ba ste/ /de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga'i bar/ /dus sbyor gcig la rgyu bar 'gyur/ /dus sbyor re rar rgyu ba las/ /phyin ci log tu nges
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]par rgyu/ /rtsod ba la sogs nges 'gyur pa/ /nyin zhag lngar ni log par rgyu/ /rtsod pa la sogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed kyis nad 'byung zhing / /zla ba gcig gis gnyen rnams brlag /zla phyed gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes bya mdzes ma kye/ /zhag gcig

[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]rang dang rang gi dgra bo yi/ /ming gi gsal byed rtogs pa dang / /ming gi dbyangs ni ngas byas la/ /gsal byed bzhi yis bsgyur byas te/ /dbyangs ni gnyis kyis bsgyur byas la/ /gcig tu bsdoms par byas nas kyang / /bdun gyi cha yis bgo bar
[\[74a.2\]]bya/ /de yi lhag mar gang gyur pa/ /gnyis ka mnyam na 'dum pa ste/ /mi mnyam stobs la bltas pas shes/ /ming gi yi ge ji snyed pa/ /gcig gis gcig la dbri bar bya/ /lhag ma gang yod rgyal ba ste/ /ma ldang ba ni 'pham par 'gyur/ /lhag med mnyam pas 'dum
[\[74a.3\]]bar byed/ /de ltar shes bya dka' bzlog ma/ /ming gi dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams/ /so sor phye ba legs par brtag /zung gis pham par shes bya ste/ /kha yar bas ni rgyal bar ston/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed ji rnyed pa/ /so sor mnyam na 'dum par ston/ /lha mo
[\[74a.4\]]de ltar 'khor lo mchog /so sor shes par bya zhes grags/ /de nas shin tu gsang ba yi/ /rma brtag 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /skyes bu'i gzugs kyi 'khor lo la/ /rgyu skar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /lus kyi cha shas gang du rma/ /byung zhing ji tsam 'byung ba zhes/ /nyi
[\[74a.5\]]ma gnas pa'i rgyu skar nas/ /bye brag phye la rim bzhin bri/ /mgo bor gsum la kha la gsum/ /snying ga lnga ste lag par brgyad/ /rkang pa dag la brgyad yin te/ /de ltar gzugs la dgod par bya/ /rang gi skar ma'i dus sbyor las/ /mthong bar sdig can gang yod pa/ /
[\[74a.6\]]rma byung che chung mthong dang stobs/ /bdun par the tshom med par 'gyur/ /zla ba gnas pa'i cha shas la/ /rma rnams 'byung bar shes par bya/ /rma rnams che chung lta ba ni/ /dgu cha'i dum bu blta bar bya/ /de yi grangs kyi sor gyis bcal/ /sdig can gnas bar rma 'byung bshad/ /
[\[74a.7\]]nyi ma mthong na rma log 'gyur/ /rA hu mthong na rma zer thebs/ /spen pa mthong na skyes bu yi/ /rma la khrag ni med par 'gyur/ /mig dmar mthong na khrag dmar 'byung / /gal te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'ang srid/ /gza' yi 'khor lo gnas pa las/ /sdig can gnas
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]pas shes par byed/ /de ltar bden pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /so sor bye brag phyed par bye/ /'di yi nyi ma mgor bstan pas/ /rma 'byung drang srong gis shes 'gyur/ /de nas mdor bsdus mnyam pa ni/ /tri shU la yi 'khor lo bshad/ /gang zhig shes pas g.yul 'gyed
[\[74b.2\]]tsha/ /rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /tri shU la ni gsum bris te/ /rim pa bzhin du skar ma dgod/ /nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma dang / /rtse mo nas bzung bri bar bya/ /nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma nas/ /mgo bzung rtse mor skar ma gsum/ /tri shU la yi yu ba la/ /rgyu
[\[74b.3\]]skar drug ni rim bzhin bri/ /de nyid phyi rol 'thon pa yi/ /mdung rtse gsum la rgyu skar gsum/ /tri shU la yi yu ba la/ /rim pa gsum gsum brtsegs mar bri/ /de nas steng du brtsegs pa yi/ /dbu ma'i rtse mo'i yu bar yang / /g.yas pa'i rtse mor gsum yin te/ /yu ba
[\[74b.4\]]gsum gsum brtsegs mar bri/ /mdor na rtse mo rnams la gsum/ /yu bar gsum gsum brtsegs mar bri/ /dbu ma 'khrug pa'i tri shU la/ /g.yas pa nang du 'jug par brjod/ /g.yon pa phyi rol mthon pa ste/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las de ltar mthong / /zla ba gang na gnas
[\[74b.5\]]pa brtag /rang gi skar ma gang nas gnas/ /rang gis brtags la shes par bya/ /gdug pa'i gza' rnams gar yod ngan/ /phyir 'thon pa la phyir log 'gyur/ /nang 'jug skar mas nang du chud/ /dbu ma 'khrug par 'gyur pa ste/ /'og ma gnyis la rtsod pa chung / /bar
[\[74b.6\]]ma gnyis la 'bring por 'gyur/ /steng ma mnyam la 'thab rtsod che/ /rtse mo gsum la shin tu che/ /mdung ni dbu mar gang yod pham/ /rang dang dgra yi skar ma dag /'di la srung ba shin tu gces/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tri shU la/ /nang 'jug phyi rol 'thon pa las/ /
[\[74b.7\]]rtsod pa che 'bring gong ma bzhin/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las bshad pa yin/ /'di ltar rang gi rgyu skar la/ /sdig can mi dge zhi ba dge /tri shU la gsum zhabs bsdus dgod/ /nyi ma gnas pa'i skar ma ni/ /tri shU la bar ma'i rtse mo nas/ /rim bzhin du dgod bar
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bya/ /tri shU la yi rtse mo na/ /rgyu skar gsum gsum bri bar bya/ /yu ba'i thad ka'i bar rnams su/ /rgyu skar drug drug bri bar bya/ /mdor na bar dang rtse mo la/ /rgyu skar dgu dang bco brgyad dang / /tri shU la ni gsum po la/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis
[\[75a.2\]]yongs su bskor/ /ming gi skar mar nyi ma song / /de la nad rnams 'byung bar grags/ /dbu ma gsum la nor nyams byed/ /nyi ma med pa'i rtse mo la/ /'thab rtsod 'byung bar bstan pa yin/ /mdor na rtse mo'i rgyu skar gyis/ /don nyams phyugs rnams brlag pa
[\[75a.3\]]dang / /gnyen bshes rnams ni myur tu nyams/ /yul gzhan 'pho zhing rgyal po'i 'jigs/ /dbus kyi drug gis bde bar byed/ /bcu gnyis kyis ni phun sum tshogs/ /bu rnams skyed cing dga' skyed dang / /skal bzang bde ba skyed par mthong / /g.yul gyi dus
[\[75a.4\]]su legs par gnas/ /rtse mor gal te zla ba song / /nad dang sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung / /tri shU la yi 'khor lo ni/ /de ltar lha mo khyod la bshad/ /nyi mas 'khyud ba'i skar ma de/ /mgo bo nas brtsams rim bzhin bre/ /g.yas su bskor ba sbyor ba yis/ /
[\[75a.5\]]mgo bo'i mthar thug bri bar bya/ /mgo bor dgu la rna bar gnyis/ /lag pa dag la drug drug ste/ /rgyal tu brgyad du bstan pa yin/ /rkang pa dag la gnyis yin te/ /de la rang gi skar ma ni/ /mgo dang rkang bar 'chi ba ste/ /lag pa dag la rnam par rgyal/ /rgyab ni
[\[75a.6\]]rgyal pham med par 'thab/ /rna ba dag la rnam par nyams/ /zla ba'i skar ma de bzhin no/ /g.yul du rgyal dang pham pa yi/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo gangs ri'i bdag /ming gi rgyu skar 'khor lo ni/ /gang gis shes ba tsam gyis kyang / /'khrug pa gnyen dang las rnams
[\[75a.7\]]kun/ /byed na 'dir rtogs dka' bzlog ma/ /rim pa gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /re mig bcu bzhi mnyam par dgod/ /sbyang khu ni le byi ya stag /khri snyan ma he seng ge rnams/ /re mig steng gi rim bar bri/ /lug sprul byi ba khyu mchog dang / /spre'u rta dang glang po che
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'og tu thad drang rnams la dgod/ /lug gi smin drug rgyal yin te/ /de bzhin sbrul ni snar ma mgo /byi ba dbo dang mon grer brjod/ /khyu mchog mchu dang chu stod yin/ /spre'u gro bzhin chu smad dran/ /rta ni tha skar mon gru'o/ /glang po bra nyin ma grur brjod/ /de nas spyang
[\[75b.2\]]khu yag dang snrubs/ /byi bzhin khrums stod ne'u le/ /byi la de bzhin nab so skag /stag ni nag pas gar brjod/ /khri snyan snon dang lha mtshams bshad/ /ma he me bzhi sa rir bshad/ /seng ge khrums dang gre yin te/ /'og dang gong gi re mig la/ /lug sogs
[\[75b.3\]]sbyang sogs rim bzhin dgod/ /de ltar rta dang ma he dgra/ /glang dang stag dag mi mthun te/ /sbrul dang ne le mdza' ba med/ /lha mo glang chen seng ge dgra/ /lug dang spyang khu mthun pa med/ /mdzes ma byi ba byi la yang / /de bzhin spre'u khri snyan dran/ /g.yul du shes bya
[\[75b.4\]]lhas mchod ma/ /ji ltar ming gi skar ma ni/ /mchu dang chu stod khyu mchog ming / /seng ge'i ming la khrums smad gre/ /de ltar thams cad shes par bya/ /gang gi rigs ni shes pa las/ /stobs kyi che chung shes par 'gyur/ /ming gi skar ma'i ming shes par/ /mdzes
[\[75b.5\]]dga' g.yul sogs ji ltar byed/ /rgyal dang tha skar nag so mgo /nam gru lha mtshams sa ri dang / /gro bzhin me bzhir bcas ba rnams/ /lha yi rigs su shes par bya/ /chu stod khrums stod khrums smad gro/ /dbo dang chu stod bra nye lag /snar ma'i ming gi bye brag
[\[75b.6\]]rnams/ /mo yi rigs yin bzhin bzangs ma/ /mchu dang nag pa smin drug dang / /mon gre mon grus ga dang / /snubs skag snon dang bcas pa rnams/ /srin po'i rigs las grub pa yin/ /rang gi rigs rnams mnyam par mthun/ /lha dang min 'bring po ste/ /lha dang
[\[75b.7\]]srin po de bzhin no/ /mi dang srin po lhan cig 'chi/ /gal te chung ma srin por 'gyur/ /khyo ni mi yi rigs las skyes/ /de tshe khyo ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shin tu rgyal ring 'dug par bya/ /mi mdza' lhan cig 'chi ba ste/ /rang gi rigs mthun pa de bar byed/ /gal te lha yi
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rigs yin na/ /mi dang srin po kun las rgyal/ /mi dang srin po lhan cig pa/ /me dang chu bzhin 'gal bar 'gyur/ /de ltar khyo shug la sogs pa/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /gang gis shes pa
[\[76a.2\]]tsam gyis ni/ /mig gi mtshan nyid shes 'gyur pa/ /the thom med par bshad kyis nyon/ /tha skar mgo dang rgyal dang ni/ /me bzhi lha mtshams gro gzhin dang / /nab so gang dang lhan cig pa/ /re yi mig ni dge ba ste/ /bsam pa'i don kun 'grub pa yin/ /dro lam
[\[76a.3\]]brgya yi yul yang mthong / /lag dang snrubs dang mon gre dang / /sa ri gre dang chu stod dang / /khrums stod mig ni long ba dang / /don dang las kun 'grub pa med/ /mchu dang nag pa snron zhes bya/ /snar ma dbo dang chu smad dang / /khrums smad rnams la 'dri byed kyi/ /mig ni
[\[76a.4\]]shel lam g.yo bar 'gyur/ /bra nye de bzhin smin drug skag /mon grus ga byi bzhin dang / /nam gru gang yod mig dmar zhing / /nag por 'gyur zhing dge ba med/ /nor dang rnyed pa rab sbyor med/ /yid la 'dod pa rnam par spangs/ /de nas sde brgyad 'khor lo mchog /gang
[\[76a.5\]]gis shes pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /stobs dang gnyin bo'i bye brag rnams/ /bshad kyis lha yi bdag mo nyon/ /a yi sde tshan lha yin te/ /ka ste lha ma yin du brjod/ /tsa sde gang gnas klu zhes bya/ /bzhi yi sde tshan dri zar grags/ /ta sder gnas ba gnod sbyin dran/ /de
[\[76a.6\]]bzhin ba sde srin por smra/ /ya yi sde tshan sha za ste/ /sha yi sde tshan ni zhes grags/ /'di ltar lha min stobs gcig ste/ /klu la de yi nyis 'gyur bshad/ /de gnyis nyis 'gyur dri za ste/ /de gnyis nyis 'gyur gnon sbyin no/ /de gnyis 'gyur gyis srin po ste/ /srin mo'i
[\[76a.7\]]nyis 'gyur sha ba dang / /sha za'i 'gyur gyis lha la brtag /lha yi nyis 'gyur ni zhes grags/ /de ltar phan tshun nye ring du/ /grangs ni gang mang stobs cher 'gyur/ /phyogs mtshams thad kar mi mdza' ste/ /stobs chen rnams kyis chung ba gsod/ /g.yul gyi dus su
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bstan pa ste/ /'khor lo'i stobs ni nges bar mthong / /ming gi dang po gsal byed la/ /rnam par dpyod par yongs su grags/ /de ltar phan tshan nye ring du/ /grangs ni gang mang stobs cher 'byung / /de ltar stobs kyi bye brag 'di/ /tshangs pas rgyud du bshad pa
[\[76b.2\]]yin/ /g.yul gyi dus su 'khor lo 'di/ /stobs kyi cha yis rgyal pham ston/ /sde tshan ji ltar gnas pa dang / /stobs bskyed pa yi rim pa ni/ /dbang me gshin rje bden bral dang / /chu rlung gnod sbyin dbang ldan dang / /go rims bzhin du gnas pa ste/ /'di rnams
[\[76b.3\]]stobs la khyad par gnas/ /stobs chen rnam par rgyal 'gyur te/ /chung ba pham par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang la pha rol phyogs kyi stobs/ /srog chags rnams kyi lus kyis gsal/ /a sde 'di ltar bya khyung ste/ /ka yi sde tshan byi lar dran/ /tsa yi sde tshan seng ger
[\[76b.4\]]dran/ /Ta sde sbyar khur shes par bya/ /ta yi sde tshan sprul du gsal/ /sa sde byi lar yongs su grags/ /ya yi sde tshan glang po che/ /sha sde lug tu yongs su brjod/ /de nas 'dab chags 'khor lo mchog /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis kyang / /dus kyi stobs
[\[76b.5\]]kyis 'dod don kun/ /the tshom med bar 'grub 'gyur bshad/ /de ltar phyogs mtshams brgyad po la/ /shar nas brtsams te legs par gnas/ /shar phyogs bdag po nyi ma ste/ /mig dmar me yi phyogs gnas/ /gshin rje phur bu lhas mchod ma/ /gza' lhag
[\[76b.6\]]bden bral phyogs nag nas/ /pa sangs chu bdag phyogs zhes dran/ /rlung phyogs bdag po spen par grags/ /zla ba nor gyi bdag po'i phyogs/ /sgra gcan dbang ldan sbyod yul lo/ /bya rgod khra dang gong ma sreg /de bzhin ne tsi khrung khru dang / /rma bya 'ug pa 'phrin bya ste/ /'dab
[\[76b.7\]]chags brgyad du yongs su grags/ /'di ltar rim bzhin a sde dang / /ka sde tsa sde de bzhin te/ /Ta sde ta sde zhes bya ba/ /ba yi sde tshan bcas pa dang / /ya tshan sha tshan bri bar bya/ /ya yi sde tshan bcas pa dang / /sha yi sde tshan tshang mar ni/ /re mig brgyad la legs
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]par dgod/ /sde tshan brgyad bo rang rang gi /dus kyi stobs ni 'dis shes 'gyur/ /bya rgod dang ni khra hor ba/ /nyin mo'i lhag la stobs cher 'gyur/ /rma bya dang ni khrung khrung dag /tho rangs dus tshe stobs su 'gyur/ /srin bya dang ni gong ma sreg /
[\[77a.2\]]nyi ma'i gung la stobs cher gsal/ /ne tsho dang ni 'ug pa dag /mtshan ma'i dus la stobs cher grags/ /'ug pa dang ni ne tsho dag /dgun zla gsum la stobs cher 'gyur/ /rma bya khrung khrung zhes bya ba/ /dpyid zla rnams la stobs cher gsal/ /gong ma sreg ces grags pa
[\[77a.3\]]yang / /dbyar zla gsum la bde legs byed/ /khra ni ston zla gsum la stobs/ /bya rgod dang ni srin bya dag /zla ba kun la stobs cher brjod/ /gcig dang dgu pa bya rgod stobs/ /gnyis dang bcu ba de bzhin khra/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu gcig la/ /gong ma sreg kyang
[\[77a.4\]]stobs cher byed/ /de bzhin bzhi dang bcu gnyis la/ /ne tsho'i stobs ni 'byung bar gsal/ /khrung khrung zhes byar grags pa ni/ /lnga dang bcu gsum tshes la dran/ /drug dang bcu bzhi'i tshes grangs la/ /rma bya'i stobs ni che ba yin/ /bdun pa dang ni bco lnga ba/ /'dab
[\[77a.5\]]chags 'ug pa stobs skyer 'gyur/ /brgyad la srin bya stobs 'phel grags/ /bla ma brgyad pa'i rim gyis so/ /de ltar dus kyi stobs bshad pa/ /lha mo 'dri ba rnams la brjod/ /dbang por bya rgod nyi ma'i ris/ /a yi ming can stobs cher 'gyur/ /de ltar gza' dang sde
[\[77a.6\]]tshan rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun la shes par bya/ /nyin mtshan cha dang tshes grangs dang / /zla ba'i bye brag rab shes bya/ /de ltar ming gi sde tshan las/ /stobs kyi bye brag shes par bya/ /gang gi rigs yin bye brag byed/ /de la stobs dang stobs min shes/ /ne tsho la ni
[\[77a.7\]]stobs gcig ste/ /hor ba'i khra la stobs gnyis byed/ /rma bya la ni stobs gsum ste/ /gong ma seg la bzhi 'gyur ro/ /khrung khrung la ni lnga zhes dran/ /de bzhin 'ug pa drug 'gyur gsal/ /'ug pa'i bdun 'gyur srin byar brjod/ /bya rgod brgyad 'gyur bstan pa yin/ /
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'dab chags 'khor lo 'di lta bu/ /legs par zung shing dbang mo che/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo chen po de/ /lha yi yul na sngar med pa/ /'phral du phan 'dogs byed pa yin/ /smin drug nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /rgyu skar dgu tshan gsum la
[\[77b.2\]]bri/ /rim pa gsum du bkod pa la/ /gdong tshugs zhes bya ri sras mo/ /rim pa gsum gyi rgyu skar la/ /bsod nams sdig can gang gnas blta/ /skyes pa phun tshogs ma tshogs dang / /so so'i de bzhin bsgrub bya dang / /nges sbyin byams pa de bzhin du/ /pha rol byams
[\[77b.3\]]dgod mdzes ma kye/ /skar ma gsum la gdod tshugs ni/ /the tshom med par rtogs par bshad/ /g.yas g.yon gyi ni sdug bsngal zhing / /rims dang nor nyams la sogs byed/ /gsum dang gnyis gcig 'jom pa las/ /che 'bring bye brag gshes par bya/ /bsod nams
[\[77b.4\]]gza' yis dge zhing bzang / /sdig can rnams kyis mi shes byed/ /bsod nams sdig can 'dren mar gnas/ /'bras bu'i stobs ni 'dren mar gsal/ /gza' rnams skar mar gnas bltas te/ /de yi stobs kyis 'bras bu skyed/ /nyi ma sgra gcan mig dmar dang / /spen
[\[77b.5\]]pa song ba'i skar ma rnams/ /gal te skar ma gsum la 'dzom/ /de yi srog ni 'dzoms par dran/ /bsod nams can gnas bde bar mthong / /'dren mas 'bras bu 'dren mar gsal/ /'di la bsod nams sdig can ni/ /gang gnas 'bras bu stobs cher 'gyur/ /de nas
[\[77b.6\]]klu yi 'khor lo mchog /nyon cig lha yi gzugs can ma/ /nyin zhag skar ma nas brtsams te/ /kha nas mjug ma'i bar du bri/ /kha dang mdun dang gsus pa dang / /dpyi dang mjug ma mgul pa dang / /dpung ba lte ba gsang gnas te/ /klu yi 'khor lo rim pa bzhin/ /
[\[77b.7\]]gsum gsum mnyam par dgod pa las/ /'di yi 'bras bu rnam par ston/ /mgul pa gsus pa dbyi dang ni/ /'jug ma mdun la mi dge ba/ /'chi la sogs shes bya ste/ /nad pa rnams la bstan pa yin/ /kha dang lte bar skyes skar yod/ /nor rnyed na ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]phrag par rnam par rgyal 'gyur te/ /gsang par don nyams nges par mthong / /gdengs ka'i 'khor lo gang bshad pa/ /ming gi rgyu skar las shes bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /sbrul byi 'khor lo btsun mo nyon/ /sbrul gyi gzugs ni bri bar
[\[78a.2\]]bya/ /de yi rtsa gsum gnas pa la/ /tha skar la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /nam gru'i mthar thug bri bar bya/ /rtsa gsum brgyad pa'i 'khor lo la/ /gar gnas gza' yi 'bras bu brtag /nyi ma mig dmar song ba'i rtse/ /spen pa rA hu gang gnas pa/ /gal te 'og ma dag
[\[78a.3\]]la song / /nad med nad 'byung nad can 'chi/ /bzhis 'chi gsum gyis nor nyams byed/ /gnyis kyis gnyen brlag gcig gis ni/ /nor nyams gnyen rnams rims nad 'byung / /bud med sdug cing rang dbang med/ /rang gi skar ma gnas pa las/ /bsod nams yod na bde
[\[78a.4\]]las byed/ /gal te rtse ni gcig la song / /de la dpon g.yog dge bar dran/ /nor rnyed thams cad mthun par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan par shes par bya/ /par ma'i rtsa la song ba na/ /grong dang yul khyim bde bar gsal/ /rtsa gcig la ni song ba la/ /bdag nyid bde zhing
[\[78a.5\]]skyid pa yin/ /chung ma khyo dang lham cig tu/ /rtsa ni gcig la song ba na/ /myur du khyo ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /chu ma ring du spang bar bya/ /rang gi rtsa la bsod nams snang / /shis pa'i 'bras bu mdun na sdod/ /de nas gzhan yang bzhin bzangs ma/ /gdugs kyi 'khor lo
[\[78a.6\]]bshad kyis nyon/ /tha skar la sogs nam gru'i mtha'/ /rtsa bzhi la ni brgyan par bya/ /rtsa rnams legs par gsal ba la/ /rgyu skar rnams ni nyams par dgod/ /mgo dang nag pa mon gru la/ /gdugs kyi yu bar yongs su grags/ /nyi ma sgra gcan mig dmar dang / /spen
[\[78a.7\]]pa mgo dang lhan cig la/ /gal te phur bu yang dag gnas/ /shar gyi rgyal bo srog dang bral/ /brgya la phur bu med sreg na/ /nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar nag par gza' lag gnas/ /dbus kyi rgyal bo de bzhin no/ /mon gru zla ba yang dag gnas/ /nub kyi
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rgyal bo sngar bzhin dran/ /de nas gzhan nas gsungs ba yi/ /shin tu gsang zhing bden byed pa/ /seng ge'i gdan rab grags pa yi/ /'khor lo bshad kyis dkar mo nyon/ /gang gis shes pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /bstan bcos mthar thug rtog par 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams kyi
[\[78b.2\]]byed pa po/ /sems kyi rgyal bo 'di shes 'gyur/ /tha skar la sogs dgu rnams dang / /de bzhin mchu la sogs pa dang / /snrubs la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams/ /ngos rer dgu dgu bri bar bya/ /de la nor bu nas brtsams te/ /chos kyi bar du dgu pa dgod/ /yul dang yul du rgyu
[\[78b.3\]]skar tshogs/ /de dang de yod lha chen ma/ /mon gru de bzhin mgo dang ni/ /nag pa rnams ni dbu ma la/ /seng ge'i gdan gyi ngos rnams su/ /lha mo de ltar grags pa yin/ /mon gru byang gi yul du brjod/ /dbus kyi yul du mgo zhes grags/ /lho phyogs nag pa zhes bya ba/ /'di ni

[\[83a.3\]]gal te 'dren mar gnas pa las/ /phan tshun 'khrug pa 'dum pa yin/ /rdzong ni 'joms dang srung ba las/ /'di yi cho ga bshad pa yin/ /rigs bzang rigs ngan yang dag shes/ /nag pa sa ga snron dang ni/ /chu stod gro bzhin smin drug mgo /tha skar mchu rnams rigs bzang yin/ /bre nye snar
[\[83a.4\]]ma nab so skag /sa ri lha mtshams chu smad dbo/ /chu stod nam gru me bzhi rnams/ /rigs ni ngan par ston pa yin/ /lag dang snrubs dang mon gre dang / /byi bzhin rnams ni 'dren mar dran/ /rigs skyes rigs min skyes ba las/ /nyi ma zla ba phur bu spen/ /rigs skyes zhes skyes zhes bya skal ldan ma/ rigs
[\[83a.5\]]mi grags pa slar yang nyon/ /mig dmar pa sangs rA hu la/ /gza' lag rnams ni rigs min skyes/ /mdor na rdzong gi bya ba dang / /pha rol 'joms bar byed ba la/ /'di yi cho ga shes bya ste/ /bdag nyid rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo mi shes bar/ /gzhom 'dod mun pa'i mda' bzhun
[\[83a.6\]]dran/ /don 'grub rgyal bar bshad pa ni/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo yongs su grags/ /de ltar mchog tu sgrol ba ni/ /mdzes ma yis ni gus bas nyon/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dbyangs 'char ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo las rdzong gi 'khor lo rnam par phye ba chen po ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //lha mos
[\[83a.7\]]gsol ba/ /bcom ldan 'das ni lha yi mchog /zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan pa/ /pha rol dgra rnams 'joms pa la/ /shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ /rA hu'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /g.yul du rgyal dang pham byed pa/ /bdag nyid g.yul du chas ba'i tshe/ /gang gi phyogs su rA hu 'jog /rA
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]hu'i spyod yul ji ltar lags/ /dus dang phyogs la ji ltar 'char/ /'dri bar byed pa'i skyes bu la/ /ma lus bar ni bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'di ltar rA hu'i 'khor lo la/ /nges ba'i gdams ngag bshad par bya/ /bdag gzhan 'chi ba thams can ni/ /rgyal bo
[\[83b.2\]]rA hu byed par bya/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis ring bo nas/ /rA hu mthong par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mdun du bstan na nyi zla yang / /thal ba bzhin du 'joms par byed/ /mthong bas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /rA hu rgyab tu gzhag par bya/ /nyi ma sgra gcan mig dmar dang / /spen pa g.yul du mdun gnas spar/ /
[\[83b.3\]]gang gi mgon po zla ba ni/ /mngon sum mthong bar byas la 'gro/ /khyim gyi 'khor lor 'gro ba ni/ /dpal ldan rA hu sngar bshad rig /gru bzhi dum bur bcad pa la/ /tshes kyi rA shu'i char ba dang / /yud tsam la 'char rA hu dang / /thun phyed la 'char rA hu dang / /zla ba phyed pa'i rA hu dang / /de bzhin zla ba'i
[\[83b.4\]]rA hu mchog /nyi ma mig dmar spen rA hu/ /rA hu gdong gi 'khor lo ste/ /rA hu thams cad mdor bsdus yin/ /zla ba gcig la nyin re bzhin/ /tshes kyi rA hu shes par bya/ /'di ltar rA hu dpe chung la/ /ka sogs gsal byed dgod par bya/ /re khA bdun ni gyen du dgod/ /drug ni 'phrod la bri bar bya/ /
[\[83b.5\]]rlung nas me yi mthar thug pa/ /dbus nas re khA bri bar bya/ /srin po dbang ldan de bzhin te/ /kA li rnams ni rim bzhin bri/ /de la me yi phyogs gnas pa/ /de yi yi ger yongs su grags/ /ha yig rlung gi grwa ru ste/ bden bral mtshams kyi glu ru yang / /dz+ha yi yi ge mnyam par gnas/ /dbang
[\[83b.6\]]ldan grwa ru ma yig ste/ /nub nas brtsams te rim bzhin du/ /kA li rnams ni legs par dgod/ /gnas ja yi mthar thug par/ /g.yas bskor dang po'i phyogs las dgod/ /de khA bdun du drangs pa la/ /nga nya Na rnams rnam par spangs/ /Ta nas Tha yig mthar thug pa/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su de
[\[83b.7\]]bzhin dgod/ /d+ha nas ma zhes shar du ste/ /de bzhin ra nas sa yi bar/ /drug nas bdun bdag phyogs mtshams su/ /tshes la rim pa bzhin du bri/ /dang po ka la sogs pa yi/ /zung gi drug nas yi ge rnams/ /zla ba lha yi bar du yang / /dkar phyogs dag la gnyis gnyis yin/ /sha
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]nas d+ha la sogs pa dang / /da yig zung du dgod pa ste/ /ma yig ra yig bar du yang / /shar nub gnyis la re khA bdun/ /phyogs gnyis la ni drug tu 'gyur/ /ha sogs yi ge bdun pa gnyis/ /ya yig gnas pa'i phyogs gnyis su/ /de bzhin du yang 'gyur ba
[\[84a.2\]]yin/ /nag po'i phyogs gnyis dag la yang / /d+ha la sogs pa rim bzhin du/ /mgo drangs nas ni ha yi bar/ /phyogs gnyis la ni dgod par bya/ /'di ltar dkar po'i phyogs la ni/ /ka nas thog drangs 'char bar 'gyur/ /ka yig ma yig thad kar ni/ /shar nub phyogs la gnas pa na/ /ming
[\[84a.3\]]can rA hu 'char ba'i sar/ /'gro bar byed pa nyams par 'gyur/ /de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyi/ /kha yig thad kar 'gro mi rung / /'di ni grwa bzhi'i yi ge yang / /phan tshun thad kar rung ma yin/ /nag po'i phyogs la yod pa rnams/ /dkar po'i phyogs su dge ba de/ /dkar po la yod ming can
[\[84a.4\]]rnams/ /nag po'i phyogs la dge ba yin/ /de ltar tshes la 'char ba ni/ /rA hu'i mtshan nyid par pa ti/ /tshes kyi rA hu'i 'khor lo la/ /sa gzhi rab mnyam yid 'ong la/ /gyen du re khA bdun pa la/ /de la re khA brgyad pa gri/ /re khA'i rtse mo rtse mo la/ /ka nas ha yig mthar thug bri/ /nub kyi phyogs
[\[84a.5\]]nas brtsams nas ni/ /byang gi bar du bri bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /tshes kyi rA hu bzang po ni/ /lha dang lha cig thams cad mkhyen/ /dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar mthong / /dbang mtshams mgo 'char lho mtshams nub/ /de ltar legs par gnas pa yin/ /'di ltar tshes
[\[84a.6\]]kyi bye brag la/ /ming la 'char bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gcig nas bdun kyi bar du ni/ /dbang bo chu yi phyogs gnas pa/ /dbang po phyogs gnas pa/ /dbang po phyogs grangs dgra nyid de/ /phyogs gnyis mnyam par bstan pa yin/ /brgyad nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug par/ /gshin rje lus ngan phyogs su gnas/ /lus ngan rA
[\[84a.7\]]hu 'char ba'i tshe/ /phyogs de stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /dkar phyogs dang pos thog drangs te/ /brgyad la 'char zhing nub pa yin/ /nub tu rA hu gnas gyur ba/ /stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ /dgu ba dang ni dang po yang / /de yis thog drangs 'char ba yin/ /lho phyogs rA hu gnas ba las/ /
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]de bzhin lho nyid stobs cher 'gyur/ /shar nas rA hu gang dag gnas/ /nub tu stobs chung 'joms par byed/ /de ltar me la sogs pa yi/ /phyogs mtshams kun la shes par bya/ /phyogs la gza' brgyad 'char ba ni/ /nag phyogs gsum la dbang bo'i phyogs/ /bdun la dum bu rtsa gsum pa/ /
[\[84b.2\]]'dzin pa'i phyogs nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /bcu ba nor gyi bdag po'i phyogs/ /bcu bzhi rlung gi gnas zhes dran/ /dkar po'i phyogs su grags pa la/ /bzhi la chu bdag phyogs zhes bya/ /de bzhin bden bral brgyal du grags/ /bcu gcig gshin rjer shes par bya/ /bco lnga'i tshes la me
[\[84b.3\]]mtshams pa/ /brgyad po zla ba gcig la 'char/ /sher nas nub tu mi dge byed/ /dbang ldan phyogs gnas bden bral 'joms/ /byang phyogs lho ru de bzhin bsnun/ /rlung gnas 'char tshe me mtshams brlag /chu bdag phyogs nas dbang bor 'joms/ /bden bral la gnas dbang ldan spyod/ /lho
[\[84b.4\]]nas byang du 'joms pa ste/ /me nas rlung du rnam par sbyod/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /yud tsam la 'char rA hu ni/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /'thab rtsod dmag chas shags las rgyal/ /dbang ldan gshin rje rlung dbang po/ /srin po nor bdag me nas chur/ /nyi ma dbu ma'i
[\[84b.5\]]yud tsam bar/ /g.yas bskor lha yi dbang phyug ma/ /nyi ma dbu ma'i mtha' nas ni/ /chu nas g.yas skor gnyis la 'char/ /mgo nas mjug ma'i phyogs su 'char/ /mchan mo de nyid 'char ba ni/ /chu me nor bdag srin po nas/ /dbang bo rlung dang gshin rje'i gnas/ /drag po'i phyogs nas chu
[\[84b.6\]]bdag tu/ /de ltar so sor 'chang bar grags/ /nyin bzhin mtshan mo dbyu gu gnyis/ /yud tsam rA hu zhes byar brjod/ /drag po tso ta i tra dang / /swA ra b+ha To sa bi tra/ /lnga bo rnam par snang mdzad dang / /rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /byi bzhin ra ma med pa ni/ /'ba' lam dang ni rnam rgyal dang / /

[\[85a.1\]]dang ni spen pa 'dzom/ /spen pa drag po'i sbyor ba dang / /nyi ma dang ni spen pa dag /byi bzhin lhan cig sbyor ba dang / /sa ra b+haTo mig dmar 'joms/ /gza' 'pho'i mtshams su stobs cher 'gyur/ /de ltar drag po'i yud tsam lnga/ /gang gnas phyogs ni stobs dang

[\[85b.1\]]dkar mo so sor 'char bar 'gyur/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi thun phyed la/ /ji ltar 'char bar brjod par bya/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i nyin zhag la/ /shar nas rA hu 'char bar 'gyur/ /de yang shar du nyi ma la/ /chu tshod bzhi ni yang dag gnas/ /de rjes shar gyi phyogs nas ni/ /bden bral phyogs su

[\[87a.1\]]hu song ba'i skar ma ni/ /kha yi nang du bri bar bya/ /mche ba la gnyis sna bu ga gnyis/ /sna sgang gnyis dang mig la gnyis/ /rna ba g.yon bzhi g.yas la bzhi/ /dpral bar lnga ste spyi bor gcig /ko sko la gcig mgrin par bzhi/ /kha yi nang nas

[\[87a.7\]]ka khag g+ha nga / /rA hu ta tha pha ba b+ha ma/ /phur pa pa pha ba b+ha ma/ /Ta Tha Da D+ha Na spen pa/ /tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya gza' lhag /a e ar o al ketu/ /sha Sha sa ha k+Sha dkar po/ /rags dang phra ba'i rim pa yis/ /gnas skabs la 'char rje btsun ma/ /de ltar cho ga ma lus bshad/ /
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]da gzod ci 'dod bshad kyis nyon/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba mchog tu gsang ba dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ /sgra gcan gyi 'khor lo rnam par phye ba chen po ste le'u dgu pa'o// //lha mos gsol ba/ /spen pa'i 'khor lo ji lta bu/ de
[\[87b.2\]]la rgyu skar ji ltar dgod/ /de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyan 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /khyod kyis ji ltar zhus pa bzhin/ /spen pa'i yan lag rgyu skar gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras
[\[87b.3\]]bu dang / /spen pa rgyu skar spyod pa las/ /sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /rnyed dang mi rnyed shes pa dang / /de bzhin 'chi dang 'tsho ba ston/ /sa gzhi rab tu yid 'ong la/ /spen pa'i gzugs ni mnyam par bri/ /'khyud pa'i skar ma kha la bri/ /lag pa g.yas la
[\[87b.4\]]bzhi dgod bri/ /rkang pa gnyis la skar ma drug /lag pa g.yon bzhi snying gar lnga/ /mig la gnyis te sbyi bor gsum/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i gnas su gnyis/ /de ltar rgyu skar bkod pa las/ /lha yi btsun mo 'bras bu brtag /kha yi skar ma la song na/ /sdug bsngal
[\[87b.5\]]sna tshogs 'tshe ba'am 'chi/ /g.yas pa bzhi yis rnyed pa dang / /rnam par rgyal zhing mi mthun 'dza'/ /rkang ba'i skar mas gnas nas 'pho/ /nad 'byung bu yang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon bzhis rgyal sa shor/ /nor stor rang gi mdza' bos gsod/ /snying
[\[87b.6\]]gas rgyal pa rnyed pa dang / /bud med thob cing chos rnams sdud/ /mig gnyis skar mas nor sdud cing / /mi mthun pa yang mdza' bor 'gyur/ /mgo bos bde zhing dgra yang med/ /gsang bas 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /yul mthon 'char nye'i sdug bsngal 'byung / /bu
[\[87b.7\]]smad dgrar 'gyur 'thab rtsod 'byung / /de ltar nyi ma'i bu la ni/ /rgyu skar gnas ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /kha nas gsang bar bgrod pa ste/ /gsang ba nas ni mgo bor 'gro/ /de nas mig la rnam par sbyod/ /mi gnas snying ga'i bar du 'gro/ /snying ga nas ni lag rkang g.yon/ /
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]de nas rkang ba lag pa g.yas/ /spen pa'i lus la gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar de ltar bskor ba yin/ /de ltar spen pa bshad zin nas/ /grogs mo gzhan gyi yan lag bshad/ /bya khyung 'khor los mngon sum du/ /'bras bu ston no lha chen ma/ /bya
[\[88a.2\]]khyung gzugs mdzes bris nas kyang / /rgyu skar rim gyis dgod par bya/ /nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma de/ /mchu nas ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /brgyad ni rkang par dgod pa ste/ /mig la gnyis ni legs par dgod/ /spyi bor gsum ni dgod par bya/ /snying ga dag la lnga
[\[88a.3\]]yin te/ /gshog pa gnyis la brgyad bris la/ /de las 'bras bu brtag par bya/ /mchu la song na lus nad 'byung / /rkang bas don med mi dge 'byung / /mig gnyis kyis ni don rnyed 'gyur/ /sbyi bo'i dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ /snying gas bud med mnyam par sbyor/ /
[\[88a.4\]]gshog pas 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /lha mo 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo yis/ /don ni nges bar rtogs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar lha yi gtso mo yis/ /zhus bzhin bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /lha mos gsol ba/ /bi Sh+Ti'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /boSh+Ti'i rnam pa ci zhig bshad/ /
[\[88a.5\]]las dang bya ba ji ltar lags/ /dbang phyug gtso la bdag nyan 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis ji ltar zhus pa bzhin/ /bshad kyis nyon cig rje btsun ma/ /biSh+Ti'i rnam pa brgyad du brjod/ /sna tshogs gzugs can stobs che ba/ /thams cad
[\[88a.6\]]'dus pas brgyad yin te/ /me ru 'bar ba can zhes bya/ /dbang po'i phyogs su ka rA lA/ /ma hA g+ho ra dbang ldan du/ /bkra shis byang gi phyogs su ste/ /ma hA dzi ka rlung gi phyogs/ /chu bdag phyogs na bA ta bA/ /ma hA ma ri srin po'i phyogs/ /dus kyi lce ni lho phyogs
[\[88a.7\]]su/ /biSh+Ti 'di rnams phyogs mtshams gnas/ /gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /gdon gyi sgrub thabs sna tshogs bsgyur/ /zla ba nya dang de bzhin gsum/ /bdun dang bcu dang 'byung bo'i nyin/ /bzhi dang brgya dang bcu gcig la/ /rim pa bzhin du 'char bar
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dran/ /de ltar zla ba nya ba la/ /me nas biSh+Ti 'bar ba 'char/ /dbang phyug gis kyang me mtshams su/ /de cho kha blta rung ma yin/ /de ltar gnas pa'i gnas skabs la/ /las dang bya ba'i bye brag kyang / /me nas rlung du 'gro ba dang / /brdeg brdung ma spar las rnams
[\[88b.2\]]bya/ /kA rA la yi sna tshogs mtshon/ /rengs ba'i las dge nub tu dge /ma hA g+ho ras rmongs dang srin/ /gnod ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /bkra shis dgra dang 'thab pa dang / /dgra yul bgrod pa'i las bsgrub bya/ /ma hA dzi ka drug spyor dang / /sna tshogs mthu ni
[\[88b.3\]]bsgrub par bya/ /ba ta bA la sngags dang dbang / /gsod pa'i las bsgrub shar du dge /dgra chen ma la 'khrul 'khor dang / /sgyogs kyi las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /dus kyi lce la gzhan sdud bya/ /sems can thams cad bsad la bsgrub/ /ci la bab kyang bdag
[\[88b.4\]]gis ni/ /biSh+Ti'i gdong ni spang bar bya/ /de nas beSh+Ti'i longs spyod bshad/ /biSh+Ti'i chu tshod sum cu ste/ /biSh+Ti'i gdong la chu tshod lnga/ /bar gyi cha la bcu bzhi ste/ /tha ma la ni brgyad du brjod/ /gzhug ma la yang gsum du dran/ /mtshan mo gdong gi mjug ma ngan/ /
[\[88b.5\]]mjug dge gdong gdug nyin mor dran/ /bar gyi cha la nor nyams shing / /tha ma la ni srog 'phrog byed/ /bdun brgyad nya dang bcu gnyis la/ /nyon mo'i biSh+Ti zhes bya ste/ /gsum bzhi bcu dang bcu gcig pa/ /biSh+Ti mtshan mor shes par bya/ /de ltar cho ga dbang
[\[88b.6\]]phyug ma/ /biSh+Ti'i 'khor lor yongs su grags/ /g+hu dzA Te Na dkar phyogs la/ /gu ts+tshe te d+ha nag phyogs brjod/ /gsal byed tshes su shes bya ste/ /de bzhin dbyangs ni thun mtshams nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa las/ /de ltar byas na g.yul las brgyal/ /
[\[88b.7\]]ring gi yi ge dang po ni/ /phyogs kyi dus la 'char bar dran/ /dbyangs sde mthar ni sde tshan lnga/ /yar la wa de bzhin te/ /sha Sha ma ha'i mthar thug pa/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad la rim bzhin dgod/ /ming gi yi ge dbyangs las so/ /gcig dang dgu la rang phyogs dge /ka sogs
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rang gi phyogs la ni/ /gnyis dang bcu la dge bar dran/ /tsa sogs rang gi phyogs la yang / /gsum dang bcu gcig dag la 'dzom/ /Ta sde rang gi phyogs gnas pa/ /bzhi dang bcu gnyis tshes la 'char/ /Ta sde rang gi phyogs la yang / /lnga dang bcu gsum pa yi
[\[89a.2\]]tshe/ /rang gi phyogs su pa sde rnams/ /tshe ni drug dang bcu bzhi la/ /ya ra la wa rang phyogs la/ /bdun dang bco lnga dag la 'char/ /de ltar sha Sha sa ha rnams/ /rang phyogs brgyad dang gnam stong ngo / /a nas ha yi mthar thug par/ /de ltar bdag nyid can du brjod/ /sde tshan brgyad
[\[89a.3\]]kyi rim pa bzhin/ /dang po nas brtsams phyogs mtshams dgod/ /de ltar rang gi dbyangs dang ni/ /gsal byed phyogs mtshams yang dag gnas/ /dbang por tshes dang yi ge'i gdan/ /tshangs ma zhes byar yongs su grags/ /de bzhin me ru yi ge dang / /chos kyi bdag mo gzhon
[\[89a.4\]]nu ma/ /gshin rjer ming gi yi ge la/ /dbang phyug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /srin por yi ge ches la yang / /khyab 'jug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /chu bdag lnga dang bcu gsum la/ /nya yi bdag mo phag yin no/ /rlung du drug dang bcu bzhi la/ /pa sde'i bdag mo dbang mo dbang mo 'char/ /
[\[89a.5\]]bdun dang nya la rnam thos bur/ /ya tshan rgan byed ma yang 'char/ /dbang ldan brgyad dang gnam stong la/ /sha sde sgeg mo chen mo 'char/ /de ltar phyogs mtshams thams cad du/ /dkar mo tshes ni so so la/ /ming gi yi ge dbang byed pa/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad 'char bar
[\[89a.6\]]grags/ /rang phyogs nas song rgyal ba ste/ /der 'jug rnams la zhe sdang byed/ /stobs chen nus med chas pa la/ /'khor lo bden par the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dus sbyor phyed ba'i 'khor lo mchog /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /las kun
[\[89a.7\]]the tshom med par 'grub/ /lha yi gtso mo zhag gcig la/ /dus sbyor phyed pa nyi shu bzhi/ /chu srang sum cu chu tshod gnyis/ /lug gi dus sbyor phyed par 'gyur/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod bcu gnyis kyis/ /bgos pas thob pa chu tshod yin/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]thob srang / /mtshan mo 'ang de bzhin shes par bya/ /de las dus sbyor phyed pa yi/ /longs sbyod rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /thog mar dang po nas brtsams te/ gang 'dod lngas bsgyur res gza' bsnan/ /bdun gyis phye ba'i lhag ma rnams/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i gza' ru
[\[89b.2\]]'gyur/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po ni/ /dang bo la sogs nges par mthong / /rangs nas bgrangs drug pa la/ /bskor ba dus sbyor che bdag gza'/ /nyi ma'i pa ngas zla ba'i spen/ /phur bu'i mig dmar de bzhin sbyar/ /drug gi grangs la bskor ba yis/ /dus sbyor phyed
[\[89b.3\]]pa'i bdag po 'byung / /drag pa bsod nams gtsigs pa can/ /brtan pa spangs pa spong byed ma/ /'chi ba dgra dang dge ba dang / /gdug pa gtum mo smin drug dang / /bdud rtsi'i dus mtshan drag byed ma/ /bi kram dang skrag byed ma/ /go'u ha ra zhes grags dang / /rgyu ma'i
[\[89b.4\]]'od zer chen mo dang / /srog 'phrog mya ngan 'char ba ma/ /da ha ni dang kun thos ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi rem pa bzhin/ /dus sbyor byed ba'i ming du dran/ /drag po dang ni gtsigs pa can/ /'chi ba de bzhin dgra dang ni/ /dus mtshan sgyu ma chen mo dang / /skrag byed ma dang srog
[\[89b.5\]]'phrog ma/ /mya ngan ma dang da ha ni/ /bcu bo rtsub par yongs su grags/ /de rnams kun la dge ba yin/ /las byas 'jig pa 'byung zhes smra/ /kha ni gyen bltas thur bltas dang / /'phred la lta ba yongs par snang / /nyi ma spyod pa'i rim pa yin/ /dus sbyor
[\[89b.6\]]phyed pa shes par bya/ /dus sbyor phyed la gcig yin te/ /de ltar byas pas nyi shu bzhi/ /gyen thur 'phred kyi mtshan nyid kyang / /nges par nyon cig ri sras mo/ /nyi ma gang la gnas pa yis/ /sngon ma'i phyed pa gyen bltas dran/ /nyi ma dang ni lhan cag pa'i/ /khyim ni
[\[89b.7\]]'phred la lta ba yin/ /nyi ma'i phye nas 'gro ba ni/ /thur bltas dus sbyor phyed pa yin/ /gyen thur 'phred kyi rim pa lta/ /dge ba'i las ni rung ma yin/ /de rnams spangs pa'i phyed pa la/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu nges par mthong / /'di ltar las dang bya
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]ba la/ /nyin mongs byed pa'i dus sbyor ni/ /'phred thur bltas pas nyon mongs par/ /byed 'gyur lha yi dbang phyug ma/ /kha ni 'phred bltas thur sbyor gyi/ /phyed pas 'khor rnams zad par byed/ /gyen bltas zhes byar grags pa yis/ /sde ba'i dgra
[\[90a.2\]]kun pham par byed/ /kha ni 'phred bltas dus sbyor gyi/ /phyed pas dgra yang pham par byed/ /rang gi dus sbyor bdag pa yin/ /phyed pas mthong na las kun 'grub/ /de ltar dus sbyor phyed pa'ang / /bshad zin dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma/ /za ba khyim ni gang la gnas/ /
[\[90a.3\]]de yi cha shas shes pa yin/ /thams cad las ni de bzhin du/ /'grub cing 'gyur bar byed pa yin/ /pra b+ha se dang rang lus gnas/ /'chi ba dgod par skye ba dang / /'bar ba dga' spyod pa dang / /mi mthun byed pa su pa ta/ /'byor pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ /
[\[90a.4\]]zla ba gang la gnas pa yi/ /lug la sogs pa'i khyim shes pas/ /de yi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /brlag pa bde legs 'chi ba dang / /ta Sh+Na'i nor thob gsod pa dang / /dga' ba nyams pa nges ba'i dgra/ /rgyal ba 'che ba legs 'ongs so/ /de ltar khyim gyi
[\[90a.5\]]cha shas kyis/ /'bras bu rim bzhin shes par bya/ /zla ba'i longs sbyod bzang ngan las/ /las dang bya ba nges par mthong / /cha shas bzang ngan gnas bltas te/ /dge mi dge las don 'grub 'gyur/ /thun phyed yongs su shes pa las/ /rigs ldan 'char bar shes
[\[90a.6\]]par bya/ /dgos 'dod thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /shin tu gzab la spang bar bya/ /rA hu dang ni rigs ldan gyis/ /thun phyed bya ba nyams par byed/ /gang gis rigs ldan longs sbyod pa'i/ /thun mtshams gang yin mi shes par/ zas zhim zos kyang nad 'gyur zhing / /nad
[\[90a.7\]]pas sman 'thungs dug tu 'gyur/ /sbrul sos btab la khyung gis min/ /de phyir rigs ldan sbyar ba spang / /thun phyed brgyad du rab brjod pa/ /nyi ma'i dus su rA hu dang / /de bzhin rigs ldan 'char ba dang / /zla ba mig dmar gza' lhag dang / /phur bu pa sangs spen pa dang / /rim gzhin de rnams
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]brgyad dang ni/ /bdun dang drug dang lnga dang ni/ /de bzhin bzhi dang gsum pa dang / /gnyis dang gcig ces bya ba rnams/ /gza' rnams so so'i thun byed min/ /ring thung mtshan nyid shes bya ste/ /mnyam dus chu tshod gsum dang ni/ /chu srang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar ldan/ /de yi thun phyed kun la sbyar/ /
[\[90b.2\]]gza' rnams kyi ni thun phyed brgyad/ /de la 'char ba nges par mthong / /lnga dang bzhi sogs sbyar zhes bya/ /thun phyed longs sbyod bdun gyis bsgyur/ /de la drug cus bgos thob pa/ /chu tshod du 'gyur lhag chu srang / /de ltar gza' rnams re re zhing / rang gi thun mtshams phyed du dran/ /zla ba la sogs drug la
[\[90b.3\]]sogs/ /de la rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur/ /drug la sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ /bya ba thams cad sngar bzhin rigs/ /nyi ma'i chu tshod nyi shu drug /chu srang bco lnga'i sras mo/ /zla ba'i chu tshod nyi shu gnyis/ /lha mo chu srang sum cur bzhed/ /chu tshod bco lnga mig dmar la/ /chu srang bzhi bcu zhe lnga
[\[90b.4\]]yin/ /gza' lhag chu tshod bco lnga ste/ /chu srang stong bar yongs su grags/ /phur bu'i chu tshod bcu gcig ste/ /chu srang bco lnga zhes byar grags/ /pa sangs chu tshod bdun yin te/ /chu srang sum cu spen pa la/ /gsum dang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar brjod/ /de rnams rigs ldan thun mtshams te/ /las dang bya ba
[\[90b.5\]]thams cad la/ /ci la bab kyang gza' bar bya/ /'di ltar dus sbyor phyed pa ni/ /mnyam tshe dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed/ /de la gza' rnams dbang byed pa/ /chug gi grangs la bskor bar dran/ /nyin mo de yin lhang tshun ma/ /mtshan mo dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po rnams/ /lnga la rim pas bskor
[\[90b.6\]]ba yin/ /sngon pa'i longs spyod dus su ni/ /rigs ldan ce nas spang bar bya/ /dge 'joms sdig pa can de ni/ /spangs bas rang gi las kun 'grub/ /nyi ma nas ni pa sangs dang / /nyi ma nas ni phur bu sogs/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi dus sbyor byed/ /drug dang lnga ru 'gyur ba yi/ /de ltar dus sbyor phyed shes pa/ /
[\[90b.7\]]legs par rtogs sam gangs ri'i bdag /nyi ma mtha' yas zla ba la/ /nor rgyas mig dmar 'jog por dran/ /gza' lhag stobs kyi rgyu zhes bya/ /phur bu pad+ma pa sangs ni/ /pad+ma chen por shes par bya/ /spen pa dung skyong shes par bya/ /glu dang gza' bdun rim pa bzhin/ /shes par bya'o ri sras mo/ /brgyad
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa rigs ldan nyid yin te/ /rA hu drag po'i gza' ru 'gyur/ /thun phyed longs spyod gza' rnams la/ /klu rnams 'char bar yongs su grags/ /chu srang bcu drug nyi ma'i dbus/ /spang bya gzhan la skyon med dran/ /pa sangs mtha' ma'i chu srang bzhi/ /gza' lhag sngon ma'i chu srang gnyis/ /
[\[91a.2\]]zla ba'i dbus su chu srang brgyad/ /spen pa'i mtha' mar chu srang bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa gsum phur bu'i dbus/ /mig dmar thog ma'i chu srang drug /bzang po'i gtam yin ri sras mo/ /rigs ldan 'char bra the tshom med/ /chu tshod phyed dang gsum la ni/ /dus sbyor phyed pa nges bar mthong / /drug dang lnga ni rim pa bzhin/ /
[\[91a.3\]]nyon mongs la sogs las shes bya/ /spen pa'i mtha' mar chu srang bzhi/ /gang yin rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur/ /bya ba thams cad nyams byed pas/ /ci nas 'di ni spang bar bya/ /gza' yi cha la ci rigs ma/ /klu rnams 'char bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgya mtsho drang srong mig dang ni/ /'byung
[\[91a.4\]]ba dang ni nor lha mo/ /ro ste nyi ma sogs rim bzhin/ /thun phyed sgra gcan drag po dran/ /'byung ba mig dang ro dang me/ /ri dang rgya mtsho zla ba ni/ /mig dmar rA hu zhes bya ba/ /gzhan gsad pa dang dug sbyor 'grub/ /de ltar thun mtshams bdun pa dang / /drug lnga bzhi gsum gnyis
[\[91a.5\]]gcig rnams/ /nyi ma la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /klu yi drug de ci nas 'dzem/ /ji ltar nyi ma la sogs pa/ /gang la khyim ni 'pho ba na/ /mtho ris la sogs bdag po rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du shes bar bya/ /'pho ba bcu gnyis bdag po ni/ /sdig can gyur na mi dge byed/ /
[\[91a.6\]]bsod nams kyis ni dge bar ston/ /'dren mas 'bring bor 'gyur ba ste/ /mang nyung las ni dge mi dge /'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lha mo dbyangs 'char zhes bya ba/ /dgos don ma tshang med pa yi/ /rgyud 'di bla ma'i man ngag las/ /the tshom med par shes bar 'gyur/ /
[\[91a.7\]]'khor lo'i mtshan nyid mang po rnams/ /gzhung gi mthar thug 'di las shes/ /gang tshe bla ma'i man ngag bral/ /de tshe bstan bcos gzhung 'di spangs/ /gang zhig thams cad ltas 'di las/ /'bras bu mang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i skye bos kyang / /
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]don med dga' bas 'dir zhugs na/ /bshad pa'i 'khor los 'dri phyed la/ /'bras bu phral du mthong ba yin/ /skyes pa'i gnas skabs 'khor lo dang / /dus kyi 'khor lo ri sras mo/ /a ba ka ha Da nyid dang / /sha ta pa ta seng ge'i gdan/ /de bzhin rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / /
[\[91b.2\]]mdzes ma mthong ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /de rnams 'bru yi bye brag kun/ /bshad do dba' bos phyag byas ma/ /rA hA'i 'khor lo mang po yang / /mdor bsdus brgyad bshad ri sras mo/ /khyad par yud tsam 'khor lo 'dis/ /'bras bu chen po sbyin pa yin/ /bzang
[\[91b.3\]]mo de snyed bshad pa 'dis/ /kun la dbyangs 'char nges ba yin/ /dbyangs 'char spong ba'i blun po ni/ /nor bu phyugs la ji ltar bur/ /kha yi nor bu dpal min bzhin/ /skyes bu blun pos mchog 'di smod/ /the tshom med cing 'jigs med pa/ /g.yul las
[\[91b.4\]]rgyal ba sed ge 'dra/ /rjes su bsngags pa'i stong grags cig /'di yi tshad mdzod lhas mchog ma/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud/ /lha mos gsang ba las kyang gsang / /mchog tu gsang bas rna bzhi ba/ /shin tu spas 'grub lha mo kye/ /sdig pa la
[\[91b.5\]]brtson g.yo sgyu can/ /khro zhing ma rungs las la dga'/ /med pa pa dang rgyud 'tshong ba/ /gus med rnams la sbyin mi bya/ /bla ma la gus sems zhi ba/ /bden smra rtag tu dge la brtson/ /bstan bcos dam pa rnyed dka' ba/ /'di la sbyin bya las mchog ma/ /dpal ldan khyu
[\[91b.6\]]mchog rgyal mtshan las/ /grub thob ut+la la dbyu gu des/ /dbyangs 'char bstan bcos 'di nyid ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo las lhag pa'i las sna tshogs bstan pa chen po ste le'u bcu ba'o// //g.yul las rnam par
[\[91b.7\]]rgyal ba zhes pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba N+Di ta dpal dza ya A nan+da chen po dang / /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rmongs pa'i gnyen po dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]{D4323}]@/ /tshe'i gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu gnod pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i las bzhugs so// @##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gza'i gnod pa spang ba'o/ /nyi ma la me ltar mchod par bya'o/ /zla ba la klu mchod par bya'o/ /mig dmar la khyab 'jig gi tshogs kyi bdag po
[\[92a.2\]]mchod par bya'o/ /lag la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ phur ba la lhag pa'i lha mchod/ /pa sangs la gzhon nu ma mchod/ /spen pa la lam mdo'i lha mchod/ rA hu la la dur khrod du tshogs bdag mchod/ ke tu ma mchod rten mchod par bya'o/ /nyi ma la zas/ zla ba la zas mi tig sbyin par bya'o/ /mig dmar
[\[92a.3\]]la gser sbyin par bya'o/ /gza' lhag dang phur bu la gser sbyin par bya/ pa sangs la lnga tul pa/ spen pa la nya/ rA hu la la 'char sbyin par bya'o/ /ke tu la rin chen sna tshogs sbyin par bya/ /nyi ma la sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya/ sems can la phan pa'i chog zla ba la bya/ mig dmar la gtor ma'i cho ga bya/ gza'
[\[92a.4\]]lag la 'chos pa'i cho ga bya/ phur bu la 'bri ba dang klog pa'i cho ga bya/ pa sangs la chu'i cho ga bya/ spen pa la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bya/ rA hu la la rab gnas dang zhi ba'i cho ga bya/ ke tu la rje btsun bzhengs ba'i cho ga bya/ kun la rig byed kyi cho ga rim gro dang / rdo rje rnam 'joms dang /
[\[92a.5\]]gdugs dkar po can dang / lhag pa'i lha'i bden pa dang / de rnams kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur ba la sogs pa'o/ /tshe'i gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i gnon pa zhes bya ba'i las rdzogs so// //rgya gar kyi mkhan po dpal tsha ya A na n+da dang / /lo tsA ba dge slong
[\[92a.6\]]rmongs pa'i gnyen po dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas lam bu'i grong khyer se lo gang bu'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /dus sbyor bdun pa'i dus su nyi ma 'char bar gyur pa de'i tshe nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ mig dmar 'char ba de'i tshe rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
[\[92a.7\]]spen pa shar na de'i nor nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir de rnams spang bar bya'o/ sgra gcan shar bar 'gyur pa de'i tshe dgra brlag par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba shar ba gyur pa de'i tshe rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gza' lhag shar bar gyur pa de'i tshe g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /pa sangs shar bar gyur
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]pa de'i tshe rdzes rnyed pa dang / /bde bar bcas te bud med dang lhan cig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yang dag pa'i dus thams cad 'char bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /paN+Di ta dza ya An n+da dang lo tsA ba shes rab Rin chen gyis 'gyur rdzogs so// //
[\[92b.2\]{D4324}]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsuDa ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kai lA sa ri'i gnas mchog tu/ /bstan bcos dbyangs 'char zhes bya ba/ /g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bshad de/ /de'i don shin tu gsal bar 'dir bshad de/ /la la
[\[92b.3\]]ni gzhung nyid kyis dkrugs shing / /rigs la sogs pa shin tu bsdus sa mgo yid rtogs pa dang / dum bu drug la sogs pa'i dus sbyor rnams dbyangs 'char ba'i rtsis de lta bu yin pas/ de dag lag len du dril te bshad pa dang / man ngag snying gtam du bshad pa dang / /snyan dngags dang sdeb sbyor
[\[92b.4\]]spangs te don khol bur phyung ba dang / bu rnams la yang ste bkag pa ni 'di'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas bshad du gsol zhes pa'i bar du bstod cing zhus pa'o/ /lam lnga zhes ba nas klu rnams 'char ba zhes pa ni lha mos 'khor lo rnams sdom du zhus pa'o/ /sngon tshe zhes pa nas mi dgos zhes pa yan
[\[92b.5\]]chad ni/ /rgyud 'di'i byung tshul dang / /grags phyogs dang / nyan par rna gtad bskul ba dang / /rgyud rnams kyi rtsa bar gdams pa dang / lta brtogs pa la ni dgos par bshad pa'o/ /lus gnas zhes pa nas ltas kyi mi dge bshad ces pa yan chad ni/ /rlung dang ltas kyi rim pa ste go bla'o/ /tshes zhes pa
[\[92b.6\]]nas tha mal zhes pa yan chad ni/ /zhag gcig la dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug ste drug brgya rgyu zhing / chu srang dang dbyu gu'ang des shes so/ /dbugs kyi grangs ni zhag gcig /chu srang ni zla ba gcig /dbyu gu ni lo gcig ste/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs la/ /bcu gnyis kyis bgos pas/
[\[92b.7\]]nor 'di dus sbyor kyi phung por 'gyur ro/ /brgyad kyis bgos pas nor ni thun du 'ong zhing / /rgyal mtshan la sogs pa yang 'char ro/ /de dag la lam lnga yod de/ sa dang / /chu dang / me dang / nam mkha'o/ /de dag kyang snam bug gi g.yas g.yon/ stong 'og /dbus rnams la
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]rim pa bzhin rgyu'o/ /sa la sogs pa 'byung ba re re la sum brgya bzhi bcu zhe dgu'i dbyug gi dbugs rgyu'o/ /sna bug g.yas rgyu nyi ma g.yon rgyu zla ba/ gnyis ka rgyu ba sgra gcan/ g.yos lho g.yon byang / khyim 'phrin las ring thung rnams gzhung nyid la gsal lo/ /mig dmar
[\[93a.2\]]me/ spen pa chu/ nyi mas/ sgra gcan/ lag pa nam mkha'/ gzhan rnams ni sgra gcan nam mkhar bzhed do/ g.yas pa'i 'byung ba dag gzhung na gsal lo/ /de dag gi lam lnga'i rim pa'o/ /sum cu gnyis kyi ming yig shar ba de byis pa/ de nas bgrangs pa'i gnyis pa'i gnyis pa gzhin/ gsum
[\[93a.3\]]pa lang tsho/ /bzhi ba rgan/ /dga' ba rim bzhin des go zhing / zhib par gzhung las shes so/ /le'u dang po'o// //gtso bor dus sbyor ston pas/ de yang lo 'di dus sbyor ston pas yin zhing / 'bras bus zhag gcig gi dum bu la 'byung bas/ de'i rtsis rlung grangs la lta ste/
[\[93a.4\]]zhag gcig rtsis pa nas/ khyim bdag yan chad ni/ dus bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi dang po ste rtsa ba yin no/ /khyim dbang ba yang 'dis shes so/ /dus sbyor kyi 'khor lo/ 'og ma rnams 'di'i steng nas lta ba yin no/ chu bdag ngan zhes pa yan chad ni/ dus sbyor gyi nus pa che chung
[\[93a.5\]]phyogs kyi stobs kyi tsa kra'o/ zla ba bcu gnyis kyi nyin mtshan gyi dbyu gu go sla'o/ /nyin mo du dbang ba'i chu tshod la brgyal kyis bgos pas nor gyi thun phyed do/ /mtshan mo yang nor lhas bgos pas thun phyed ces te/ 'di ni mtshon cha dar can lta bu sgra gcan lag la che/ chu srang ni blos sbyong
[\[93a.6\]]skar ma gnyis dang / dbyu gu bco lngas khyim gcig rdzogs/ des gzhan rnams shes so/ /gzhan yang zhes pa ni yan lag lnga rtsis kyi nyin skar dag pa la zer ro/ /'di phyogs ni zla ba la dbang ba'i khyim bcu gnyis kyi nyi ma'i 'pho ba'o/ /lug la sogs par 'phos pa'i 'das pa'i
[\[93a.7\]]zhag du lon gnas gnyis su bya ste/ nyi ma zhag re zhing chu tshod bgo zhing chu srang nyi shu rtsa lnga za bas steng bzhi 'og nyi shu rtsa lngas bsgyur ro/ /drag cus bgos lhag dbye/ nor steng du gzhug /phyed lhag na gcig sbyin no/ /steng du drug cus bgo bar bya zhing / nor gyis chu srin la sogs byang bgrod
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]drug yang bri/ ka ra ka sogs lho bgrod drug la bsnan pas 'pho ba'i chu tshod dag par 'gyur/ chu tshod du 'das lta ba de/ /rgya mtsho chu dang zla ba la/ /lug dang srang la drug sbyin bya/ /glang dang bu mo rang sar gzhag /'khrig pa seng ge brgyad dor bya/ /ka ra ka gnyis la bco brgyad dbri/ /sdig nya gnyis
[\[93b.2\]]la bcu sbyin zhing / /gzhu dang chu srin bum pa ni/ /gsum la nyi ma byin pa la/ /lug dang srang la drug sbyin bya/ cha bdun grib mar bcas pas bgos pas thob pa'i nor ni snga dro chu tshod 'das pa yin/ phyi dro lus pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'di dus sbyor bcu gnyis la sogs la ngos 'dzin na/ de'i dus
[\[93b.3\]]kyi chu tshod ni 'ongs pa drug cus bsgyur bar bya/ des ni dbyu gu yang chu srang gi phung por 'gyur ro/ /de la lug la nyis brgya lta bu khyim rang rang gis bgo'o/ /lug sogs drug la yas kyis dbri zhing / srang sogs drug la mas kyis dbri'o/ /ma ldang ba de ta t+kal yin no/ /de ni nyin zhag
[\[93b.4\]]gcig gi bcu gnyis cha'o/ /'phel ba de las gnas lnga byed na/ lhag sum cus bsgyur ba la khyim chu srang gis bgos pas/ nor ni cha shas yin bas tat+kal 'og tu bri'o/ /lhag drug cus bsgyur zhing / /thob pa dbyu gu yin zhing / de'i lhag drug cus bsgyur bas thob pa chu srang yin/ de'i lhag drug
[\[93b.5\]]gis bsgyur bas thob pa dbugs yin no/ /gnas lnga zhes ni de la zer/ dus drug dag gam lta ba dang / /dum bu drug gi don du yang / /tad+kA la chu srang sum cus bsgyur/ /de la 'og gi ca shas gzhug /de 'ang drug cus bsgyur zhing chu tshod gzhug /stong dang brgyad brgyas de la bgo bar bya/ /nor ni
[\[93b.6\]]dus sbyor gcig gi rang bzhin te/ /gong gi de dang mnyam na dag pa yin/ /dag par ma gyur mnyam pa'ang min no/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur chu tshod steng du gzhug /de ni dum bu lnga'i dgod bya yin no/ /de la dgu brgyas bgos nor dus sbyor phyed pa'o/ /drug brgyas bgos nor sum cha yin/ /
[\[93b.7\]]nyis brgyas bgos nor dgu cha yin/ brgya dang bcu yis bgos nor ni/ /bcu gnyis cha ru 'gyur ba lags/ /drug cus bgos ba'i nor ni sum cu'o/ /de ltar dum bu drug ste 'di rnams thams cad la phyed pas lhag la re re steng du sbyin par bya'o/ /'di rnams rgyud kyi bcud lta bu yin zhing /
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'o ma'i bcud mar lta bu'o/ /dum drug gis ni gsal ba'i mig dang 'dra ste thams cad mthong ngo / /dmag dang / rkun ma/ rdzas/ byed las/ bzang ngan/ chags ka thams cad la gnod drug rim gyis rdzas dang 'dra'o/ /dus 'di rtsis rnams kyi gzhi
[\[94a.2\]]ma yin pas sbyin par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gal che 'di bzhin rtsis te/ lug dang sdig pa'i mig dmar yin no/ /glang dang srad ni pa ba sangs yin no/ /'khrig pa bu mo lhag pa'i zhing yin no/ /ka ra kaT zla ba'i khyim yin pas/ seng ge nyi ma'i zhing yin/ gzhu dang nyi phur bu'i
[\[94a.3\]]zhing yin/ chu srin bum pa spen pa'i zhing lags pas bdag po rnams kyi 'bras bu bzhin brtsi'o/ /brtan g.yo/ zhi drag /pho/ mo/ sdig /bsod/ mnyam/ mi mnyam rnams zhig par rgyud nyid phag gsal zhing / tat+kal nas bgrangs ba'i bdun pa na mthong ba yod pa'o/ /rkang ba zhes
[\[94a.4\]]pa ni zhib rtsis so/ /stobs ni go sla'o/ /dgra grogs ni gal che bas rgyud nyid ji bzhin par blta'o/ /tad+kA lan mig dmar yod cing / bdun pa na phur bu yong na gza' gnyis ka'i 'bras bu 'bras bu 'byung ngo / /des gzhan yang 'gre'o/ /khams ni zla ba phur bu yin zhing / pa sangs mig
[\[94a.5\]]dmar rnams rtsa ba yin no/ /rtsa ba na shing dang / gos dang / ras dang / dar la sogs pa rdzas rtsa ba'i rigs so/ /lhag pa srog chags rigs yin no/ /nyi ma spen pa ni lha dang rkang ma ngas kyi rigs yin no/ /'di rnams rgyud nyid la 'khor yang bdag po gza' nad yin pas 'bras bu 'byung
[\[94a.6\]]pa la sogs pa med do/ /le'u gnyis pa'o// //bsam pa zhes pa nas don gsal tshig pa yan chad ni zhu ba po'i mtshan nyid ni gal che'o/ slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid go sla'o/ /'dri ba'i dus su zur gsum dang / gru bzhir zhi ba'i gza' shar zhing / gzhan rnams su sdig gza'
[\[94a.7\]]shar na/ 'dri byed kyi don 'grub ste/ u ba tsa ya 'di khyad par du don gnyer ba ring thung la shis so/ /tat+kA la zhes pa nas/ zhib tu brtag yan chad ni/ dus sbyor dum bu drug gi bzang ngan/ rigs/ rnyed/ mi rnyed/ rkun ma ngos 'dzin/ ma brjod lkog gyur gyi rtsis phyi nang rgyal pham/ 'dum/
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]mi 'dum/ tshe ring thung / 'ong mi 'ong / sbed ba'i sa/ kha dog /rmi lam rnams bshad pas/ rgyud nyid las shin tu zhib par gsungs te/ blos zhib par brtag go /smra shes pa yan chad zas dkon mod kyi rtsis so/ /rkun ma ngos 'dzin lo grangs kyis ngos 'dzin pa ni go sla'o/ /bu mo skye ba la
[\[94b.2\]]sogs pa gzhung nyid na zhib cing ma 'grig pas kho bos rgyas par bshad do/ /le'u gsum pa'o// //rkang pa brgya ba'i 'khor lo 'dis/ gshin rje lto ba'i tsa kra 'di dag byed pa yin no/ /gal che ba thams cad du ming gi skar ma shes shing mthong ba ni sgra gcan gyi rkang pa dgu dang nyi ma'i
[\[94b.3\]]nyi ma dang / mig dmar gyi me dang / phur bu'i drug dang / spen pa'i nor rnams dang / /lhag gi bdun dang / pa ba sangs kyi lnga pa rnams mthong ngo / /zla bas g.yon du bskor ba'i nyi shu gnyis mthong ngo / /'khyud pas lus la lan tsha sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing / stobs bzhis 'jigs zhes pa ni
[\[94b.4\]]'di kho nas yin pas ming spo/ gos bsgyur yul nas 'bros pa la sogs bya'o/ sol ba ni drang srong gi nad dang / /dug ro rnying pa dang / mdze nad dang / gcong nad kyis zin zhing / srog dang bral ba la nye'o/ /du bas ni blo'i sdug bsngal ba dang / gtam ngan 'byung ngo / /stong gis sna
[\[94b.5\]]khrag dang / khrag nad 'byung ngo / /'di dag kun la 'chi ba slu'i lugs bzhin/ lha dang rlung bzung ba dang / dbang phyug gi skyabs kyis 'tsho bar byed do/ /mthongs ni gzhung nyid la gsal lo/ /sha la ka yis bag ma brtsi'i/ stobs bzhi yis mi dang rta la sogs pa'i thug
[\[94b.6\]]dbye ba brtsi'o/ /nyi ma gar gnas pa las dang bya ba ci byed kyang ngan pas/ a ta mi ta yang brtsi'o/ /mdung chen chag kyang bag ma dang / don gnyer ba rnams la gal che'o/ /grong dang grong gi bya ba la/ phan yon chen po'i tsa kra gal che'o/ /ba ri g+ha'i tsa kra ni dgos pa chung ngo / /
[\[94b.7\]]be ra mu ba'i tsa kra ni/ lo gcig gi chags ka brtag pa la dgos so/ /le'u bzhi pa'o// //sngags la drag pa'i phyir a ba ka ha zhes bya ba'i tsa kra'o/ /glang chen mche ba'i tsakra 'ang zer ro/ /'di ni 'dis rgyal po bya ba dang / dmag dpon dang / gral dpon bya ba dang / /
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]lha khang brtsig pa dang / lha bzhengs pa dang / rngams che ba'i las la mig gi 'bras bzhin gal che'i/ /bel se ga'ang 'di'i nang na zhib bas ltad mo dang ston mo gal che'o/ /rus spal 'khor los yul gyi bde sdug dang / legs nyes shes pas zhi drag gi gza' la

[\[95a.3\]]rlung rgyu ba yun ring 'chi/ 'bring nan/ yun thung na kha smras 'ong ngo / /tshe tshad ni lo bdag dang skye skar dri ste/ /blo zhib na brtan no/ /gza'i lo bdag re re zhing yang dge mi dge gzhung nyid kyis bgo'o/ /skyes bu dus ji tsam na skyes pa'i dus kyi nyin skar kha la dgod/ de nas rtsi'o/ /'di nas skye
[\[95a.4\]]ba brtag pa'i chog ste/ gzhon pa kha byang gi rtsi'o/ /le'u drug pa'o// //lam gyi 'khor lo la sbrul gyi lus la rtsa gsum la sogs pa gzhung nyid kyis go zhing / de dag la zhi drag gi gza' gang gnas blta'o/ /lam du zhugs pa'i nyin zhag la dbang ba'i skar ma dang / rgyud gcig
[\[95a.5\]]pa'i rtsa la gza' dang gnas pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ngo / /sa tshigs ji tsam du 'byung na/ 'gro sar dpag tshad du yod pa de rtsa rgyud la gnas pa'i gza' de yis bsgyur/ 'khor los bgo nor ni 'gro la ma yin/ lhag ma bzhis bsgyur/ 'khor los thob pa ni/ mda' 'phen drug cu'am rkang pa
[\[95a.6\]]gcig yin no/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur cing thob pa ni mda' rgyad gang du 'gyur ba yin no/ /sa yul 'di nas brtses pa'i dro lam kyang la/ mda' 'phen rnams 'di'i 'bras bu 'byung zhes bya'o/ /rgyan gyi tsakra ni ming yig nyer gnyis rang gis bsgyur te/ brgyad kyis bgos ngas thob pa'i
[\[95a.7\]]lhag ma la ba lta'o/ rgyal mtshan la sogs 'char ro/ /'das pa'i dbyu gu la brgyad kyis bgo/ de ni rgyal mtshan pa 'char ro/ /re re zhing gza' bdun kyi bdag po yang yod do/ /ming yig mnyam na 'dum zhing / bza' mi 'ang 'grogs lugs yun ring ngo / /mi mnyam na gang mang rgyal lo/ /
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]ya dang zung gnyis gnyis ya rgyal bar bshad do/ skyes bu'i lus la skar ma bkod do/ zla ba gnas pa'i thog tu rma 'ong ngo / /dgu cha'i dum bu ni gzhung nyid nas gsal lo/ /tri shU la yi tsa kras ni 'khrug pa 'ong mi 'ong dang / /ming skar blta ste rgyal pham dang rtsed mo dang / bar dang yul rnams go
[\[95b.2\]]sla'o/ /zhabs skud kyi tsakra ni mang bkod do/ /brtag pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /nyin skar nas mgo btsugs te skyes bu'i la dgod do/ /de la rang gi ming skar gar babs blta'o/ /dge sdig gzhung na gsal lo/ /'di ni chags ka brtag pa'i 'khor lo 'ang zer ro/ /re mig bcu bzhi ba'i 'khor lo
[\[95b.3\]]'di/ smig rgyu lta bu la khyad par du gal che ste steng rnams rgyal zhing / 'og ma rnams pham mo/ /rigs gsum gyi 'khor lo ni lhan cig sdod pa rnams la brtag ste gza' mi dang dpon g.yog gshis ma log pa gal che'o/ /mig ni kha 'phos so/ /a ka la sogs pa sde brgyad kyi tsakra ni/ spyir rgyal
[\[95b.4\]]pham kun la dgos shing / /khyad par du / sho dang rgyan len pa dang / /thug 'gyed pa dang / glang po che 'thab pa rnams kyi las so/ /'dab chags brgyad ni las dang bya ba gang la 'ang dgos te/ zla ba zhag dus tshod rnams stobs che ba la bya'o/ /shar du rgod/ nyi ma 'phred zla thams cad
[\[95b.5\]]tshes gcig dang dgu 'di rnams a'i ming can shar du stobs che'o/ /tshangs pa'i tsakra 'di sdod la la brtag ste/ gnod pa bzhis ni srog dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / gsum gyis ni yun ring / gnyis kyis kha smras 'ong / gcig gis don nyams/ de bzhin du zhi gza' la
[\[95b.6\]]yon tan grangs mang ba bzhin che'o/ /'dri ba'i nyin par skar ma gang la gnas pa nas kha la dgod cing / klu'i 'khor los nad pa rnams brtags te bden pas brtag go /dpon g.yog dang bza' mi/ rje 'bangs/ dpon po rnams la zam pa/ mda' gcig gi stong la/ las tshur
[\[95b.7\]]thug pa bzhin te/ shin tu bden zhing gal che bas rtsa gsum la blta'o/ /gdugs kyi 'khor los ni phyogs kyi rgyal po ston te bden pa nyung ngo / /tha skar la sogs zhes pa nas/ rim bzhin du zhes pa yan chad ni/ yul de la skar ma dang zong rnams dgod pa'i lugs so/ /
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]spen pa gang la gnas pa nas mi rnyed cing dkon pa'o/ /'pho ba'i rgyu skar tshes bsres te zhes pa'ang 'di dang sbyar ro/ /seng ge brtan ni ming dang 'dra ste/ /bden pa bzhi brtan no/ /mda' gzhu ni skyes bu mda' 'dzin rnams la dgos te/ g.yas g.yon ni steng 'og go /rang
[\[96a.2\]]gi skyes skar dang ming skar/ stong la song na 'chi/ na/ 'pham/ rma 'bab po/ rtse la song na thams cad rgyal lo/ /ral gri ni go sla'o/ /ya tra na ltad mo ste/ 'di bum pa bzhis brtag go/ /nyi ma gnas pa'i phyogs ltad mo la sogs byas na 'chi zhing rma 'bab/ rta 'gyel/ lug 'chi/ glang chen
[\[96a.3\]]gum rtsed mo bsdums stong par 'gro'o/ /nyi ma dang bral na dgos pas rang rgyud gang ste bzang ngo / /byes su song ba rnams la pad+ma'i 'khor los brtag ste/ shin tu bden zhing gzhung nyid nam sbas pas gsal lo/ /bre'i 'khor lo ni/ thub pa'i tshogs rnams la gzhan du zhib par bshad do/ /

[\[96a.5\]]bo yin pas stobs che'o/ /gza' gzhan rnams blon po yin pas gzhung pa bstan to/ /rtsa ba'i sgra gcan la rnab g.yas pa bstan/ skar ma rnams zas kyis bcos shing / gza' bdun gyi gos chas su zhugs te/ dus sbyor gyi gnas brtse zhing nyi ma la rgyab bstan/ zla ba mdun du bzhag ste/ /

[\[96a.7\]]stobs las che'o/ /drag gza' nang du chud/ zhi gza' phyi ru gnas na/ 'bebs mi 'grug pa rnams kyi bsam pa 'grub/ de las bzlog na bsrungs mkhan rgyal lo/ /rigs kyi nus pa ni rtsis bde'o/ /le'u brgyad pa'o// //grub bzhi zhes pa nas/ rnam par phyed zhes pa yan chad ni/ /

[\[100b.1\]]yin brtan bya bar rung ma yin/ /rma bya yid 'ong sgra sgrogs par/ /zas su dug chen za ba bzhin/ /shes rab can gang dgra la yang / /mdza' bshes lta bur sgrub byed pa/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrugs te/ /skye bo ngan pas drod mi zin/ /phyir rjes su ni lta ba dang / /bag yod khong khro
