[\[100b.3\]]mthun byed pa/ /rgya mtsho che la rin chin bzhin/ /de la 'dod dgu phun sum tshogs/ /bya ba ma yin mi byed cing / /bshams pa mkhas su phebs pa dang / /yul la 'dod pa thag bsrings ba'i/ /skyes bu mkhas pa sus mi bkur/ /mthu rtsal lnga ba'i khengs sems kyis/ /lugs kyi gdams

[\[132a.1\]]bya/ /blo ldan smra mkhas shes rab che/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po dul/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs mthong ba/ /'di ni yi ge pa zhes bya/ /rigs dang ngang tshul yon tan ldan/ /bden dang chos la mchog tu gzhol/ /gzugs byad shin tu bzang ba ni/ /
[\[132a.2\]]rgyal po'i spyad mig yin par bshad/ /rang lugs ma 'chos rgyal la bsten/ /rin chen thams cad yongs rtogs shes/ /sma ma bab cing rtsol ba can/ /dmag can yin par shes par bya/ /brda la legs par byang gyur cing / /stobs ldan mthong na sdug pa dang / /bag yod nor ni che ba
[\[132a.3\]]dag /sgo dpon chen por de bshad do/ /blo ldan shes rab che ba dang / /gzhan gyi bsam pa rtog mkhas shing / /brtan la ji bzhin lan 'debs shing / /'di ni pho nyar shes par bya/ /g.yos kyi bstan bcos kun la mkhas/ /dge zhing snyan smra dbang po zhi/ /gtsang sbra che zhing yid
[\[132a.4\]]brten rung / /'di ni phyag tshang yin par bshad/ /zhar ba zha bo ma ning dang / /sgur po rgan po dbang po bsdams/ /'di dag btsun mo'i srung mar ni/ /rgyal pos nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /bran g.yog mchog dang tha ma dang / /bar ma mang po shes byas nas/ /de rnams las don gsum
[\[132a.5\]]po la/ /ci rigs par ni sbyar par bya/ /smra mang khengs dang le lo can/ /gdug dang g.yon can phongs chos ldan/ /chog mi shes dang sme sha za/ /bran g.yog rgyal pos spang bar bya/ /bdag po la 'khu spang bya zhing / /shin tu bkren pa'i mi srun yang / /bkren pas bye brag mi shes pas/ /
[\[132a.6\]]de bkren 'di gnod byed pa yin/ /mi srun brkam chags phongs chos can/ /mu cor smra dang gus pa med/ /zhe 'gras pa dang sdig las can/ /rgyal pos yongs su spang bar bya/ /skyon dang smra ba lce gnyis dang / /gdug cing gcig tu mi srun dang / /rang bzhin ngan dang 'tshe bar dga'/ /
[\[132a.7\]]gnod pa 'ba' zhig skyed byed yin/ /gal te rig pas brgyan gyur na'ang / /skye bo ngan pa spang bya ste/ /sbrul ni nor bus brgyan na yang / /'di na 'jigs pa mi skyed dam/ /gang zhig rtag tu brnags dka'i tshig ngan ni/ /smra zhing rgyu med par ni mi bzad khro/ /dug chen sbrul dang mtshungs
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]par byed pa yi/ /rang bzhin ngan la 'jigs pa su mi skyed/ /zab cing snyan dang ran par smra ba dang / /dbang dul bden la gzhol zhing rang dbang 'gyur/ /dngos don legs shes yang dag don la mkhas/ /bran g.yog phal cher rang dbang gyur pa yin/ /le lo med cing chog shes
[\[132b.2\]]la/ /legs par gnyid log rab tu sad/ /bde sdug ma mnyam brtan pa yi/ /bran g.yog 'jig rten na rnyed dka'/ /bzod med mgu bar dka' ba dang / /gtong dang bral zhing nor la dga' ba dang / /smod byed stobs chung rab tu gdug /rten mi bdag po spang bar bya/ /
[\[132b.3\]]g.yo dang zol la dga' ba dang / /smra zhing skal bzang dang bral ba/ /med par 'jigs shing skrag gyur pa/ /rgyal pos 'di ni spang bar bya/ /zla ba drug gam lo gcig nas/ /rgyal pos sdums ni bya ba yin/ /bdag nyid la ni dga' bsams la/ /dgra dang nye bar 'thab par bya/ /glen pa'i
[\[132b.4\]]las la sbyar ba ni/ /grags pa ngan dang don nyams dang / /dmyal bar ltung ba nyid dag ste/ /rgyal po la ni nyes gsum 'byung / /mkhas pa'i las la sbyar gyur na/ /grags dang tshe dang yon tan dang / /gnyen dang nor ni 'phel ba dang / /mtho ris gnas du skye bar 'gyur/ /dge ba'am
[\[132b.5\]]yang na mi dge ba'i/ /las rnams gang dag byed pa ni/ /legs spyod dang ni nyes spyod kyi/ /rgyal po de dang 'brel pa yin/ /de bas sa yi dbang phyug gis/ /chos dang 'dod don grub bya'i phyir/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag /rtag tu phan dang bde la sbyar/ /tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i
[\[132b.6\]]lugs kyi bstan bcos las le'u lnga pa'o// //yon tan ldan pa bsten bya zhing / /yon tan med pa spang bya ste/ /mkhas la yon tan kun yod de/ /blun po la skyon 'ba' zhig yin/ /rtag tu dam pa dang 'grogs shing / /dam pa rnams dang 'dra ba dang / /bya rtsom dam pa
[\[132b.7\]]dang bya yi/ /ci yang ngan pa dang mi bya/ /grog mkhar dang ni sbrang rtsi dang / /yar ngo yi ni zla ba dang / /rgyal po'i nor dang sprang po'i nor/ /cung zad cung zad tsam gyis 'phel/ /mig sman dag ni zad pa dang / /grog mkhar yang ni bsags pas mtho/ /'du las 'god pa chung bya ba/ /'di
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]nyid kho na mkhas pa yin/ /nags sam khyim na gnas kyang rung / /gzhan dang rang la phan 'gyur ba'i/ /sbyin dang klag pa'i las rnams la/ /nyid zhag don med mi bya'o/ /chags can nags na gnas kyang nyes pa 'byung / /dam pa khyim na gnas kyang dbang po dul/ /nags
[\[133a.2\]]na gnas pa'i gcan gzan khro ba dang / /khyim na gnas pa'i rta mchog dul ba bzhin/ /dam pas smad pa'i las la rab 'jug cing / /yul la chags pa'i nags ni nyes pa'i gnas/ /ma smad pa yi las la 'jug byed cing / /'dod chags las log khyim nyid dka' thub tshal/ /sems kyis
[\[133a.3\]]chos ni bsrung bar bya/ /rig pa dag ni sbyor bas srung / /gzugs ni byi dor gyis bsrung zhing / /rigs ni ngang tshul dag gis bsrung / /rtag tu sbyin pa gtang bya ste/ /skye bo bkren par mi bya'o/ /'byor ba spyad pas mi zad kyang / /skal ba zad bas zad par 'gyur/ /sbyin pas zad bar
[\[133a.4\]]mi 'gyur zhing / /ma spyad pa yis 'phel mi 'gyur/ /gzhan du sngon chad bsags pa yi/ /legs spyad zad pas zad par 'gyur/ /byin zhes mi smra'i nor ci rung / /ster ba na yang 'phel 'gyur te/ /khron pa las chu blangs gyur kyang / /nyin re chu ni mang por 'gyur/ /gang la chos yod
[\[133a.5\]]bde ba ste/ /gang la chos med smad bya zhing / /chos ni 'jig rten la rtogs pas/ /nor gyi don du de mi spang / /skye bo bkren pa nor 'dod pas/ /sdug bsngal gang zhig byas gyur pa/ /de yis gal te chos don gnyer/ /slar yang nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra dag ni thams
[\[133a.6\]]cad las/ /nor gyi gtsang sbra khyad par 'phags/ /gang 'dir nor yod gtsang sbra yin/ /sa dang chu gtsang gtsang ma yin/ /bden pa'i gtsang sbra sems gtsang sbra/ /dbang po dul ba'i gtsang sbra dang / /sems can la brtse'i gtsang sbra dang / /chu yi gtsang sbra lnga pa yin/ /bsgul pas 'gul
[\[133a.7\]]bar mi 'gyur zhing / /brnyas pas 'khrug par mi byed la/ /khro med skyes bu zhes bshad de/ /'di ni dam pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /skyes bu dbul po rnams kyi tshig /mkhas shing snyan par smra ba dang / /dus su smra zhing phan smras kyang / /su yang nyan par mi byed do/ /bsngags
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]dang stobs dang rtsod pa dang / /shes dang skyes bu'i rtsol bas kyang / /dngos gang rnyed par ma gyur pa/ /de la su zhig gdung bar byed/ /bde ba'am yang na sdug bsngal dag /thob par byed pa ma thob cing / /bgrod par bya ba ma bgrod la/ /rnyed par bya ba ma rnyed las/ /don gcig grub par
[\[133b.2\]]gyur na ni/ /de la gdung byar ci zhig yod/ /gang du 'chi bdag yod der 'chi/ /gang na dpal gnas der phun tshogs/ /rang gi las kyis khrid nas ni/ /de dang der ni bdag nyid 'gro/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams ni/ /sngon chad byas pa gang yin pa/ /sngon tshe ji ltar spyad pa bzhin/ /
[\[133b.3\]]byed pa po yi rjes su 'brang / /skye bo ngan pa gzhan gyi skyon/ /yungs 'bru tsam la rtog byed kyi/ /rang skyon bil ba tsam yang ni/ /yod du zin kyang mi mthong ngo / /gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal te/ /rang dbang thams cad bde ba yin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis mtshan nyid/ /mdor na
[\[133b.4\]]'di dag yin zhes bya/ /bde ba'i rjes la sdug bsngal zhing / /sdug bsngal rjes la 'ong bde ba ste/ /mi rnams kyi ni bde sdug dag /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor/ /gang zhig song ba de 'das zin/ /gang zhig ma 'ongs de thag ring / /gang zhig gdung bar mi 'gyur bar/ /de ltar byung ba
[\[133b.5\]]gnas bar gyis/ /tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las le'u drug pa'o// //'ga' yang su yi mdza' bo'ang min/ /su yang gang gi'ang dgra bo min/ /mdza' bo dang ni dgra bo yang / /rang gi nus pa nyid las byung / /mya ngan dgra skyed 'jigs las skyob/ /yid ches
[\[133b.6\]]gnas gyur snying du sdug /mdza' zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis/ /gang gis rin chen 'di sprul 'gyur/ /gal te rtag tu mdza' 'dod na/ /pho nya nor gyi khe spogs dang / /de min chung ma la lta ba/ /nyes pa gsum po spang bar bya/ /rlung shugs mi bzad ldang ba dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i dpa'
[\[133b.7\]]rlabs dag /'byung ba dgag pa nus srid kyi/ /rjes chags sems ni de lta min/ /me dang chu dang bud med dang / /blun po sbrul dang rgyal po drug /'phral du srog 'phrog byed min pas/ /rtag tu bag dang chas pas bsten/ /gzhan gyis rang skyon mi rtogs pas/ /rang gi skyon yang shes
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]par bya/ /rus sbal yan lag sbed pa ltar/ /rang gi yon tan sba bar bya/ /gzhan gyi rang bzhin ma brtags na/ /rngon pa'i glu yis ri dgas ltar/ /bcos ma'i tshig gis slu byed pas/ /gzhan gyi rang bzhin shes par bya/ /dma' bar rtsa dang chu sngon po/ /dul bas slob ma brid
[\[134a.2\]]byas pa/ /dka' thub kyis lha nor bu med/ /yon tan gyis ni thams cad bsdu/ /mdza' bo lag yos rnyog pos chos/ /gzhan la gnod pas sbyor ba dag /rtsub pas bud med bder reg pa/ /gang zhig 'dod de mkhas pa min/ /gang zhig rgan po'i gros mi nyan/ /bstan bcos shes pa'i
[\[134a.3\]]skye bo med/ /ma brtags par ni spyod 'gyur ba/ /de yi bya ba mod la 'jig /bgrod dka' bar ni gnas gyur kyang / /mi yis gnas thub rang dbang 'gyur/ /phye bar gyur bas 'khrug pa ni/ /g.yul gyi bu bzhin mya ngan skye/ /dka' thub lus ni 'jam pa dang / /dpa' bo rma ni med pa dang / bud
[\[134a.4\]]med dam pa chang 'thung dang / /rgyal po chos med yid mi ches/ /mdza' bo min la yid mi brtan/ /gal te mdza' bo khros gyur na/ /gsang tshig thams cad smra bar byed/ /byed pa po la ma ltos par/ /bya ba ci yang mi 'grub pas/ /bya ba kun la 'jug na yang / /blo ni brtan pa nyid du bya/ /bu
[\[134a.5\]]lon dbul po'i dug yin te/ /rgan po'i dug ni gzhon nu ma/ /blo ngan gyi ni rig pa dug /ma zhu zas za dug yin no/ /lkog ma mi bde glu la dga'/ /dmangs rigs stan mtho la dga' dang / /dbul po gtang ba la dga' zhing / /rgan po gzhon nu la dga' byung / /chu mang 'thung zhing stan srab dang / /
[\[134a.6\]]lus zungs zad dang shugs bkag dang / /nyin par gnyid log mtshan gnyid med/ /drug po 'di rnams nad skyed byed/ /sha skam dang ni bud med rgan/ /chang gsar zho ni chags ma thag /nad par 'khrig spyod nyin gnyid log /drug po 'phral du srog 'phrog yin/ /chang rnying sha dang mar
[\[134a.7\]]gsar dang / /bud med gzhon dang 'o ma 'thung / /chu tshan dang ni bsil grib dag /'phral du srog ni ster byed yin/ /khrus byas 'o ma chu spyod sha /'phral du stobs skyed gsum yin no/ /gos ngan so yi dri ma 'jog pa dang / /mang du za zhing brlang pa'i tshig smra dang / /nyi ma 'char dang nub
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ba'i tshe na nyal/ /de yi dpal ni nyams pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mgo bo byi dor bzang byas rkang legs bkrus/ /bud med mchog bsten kha zas nyung du za/ /gcer bu mi nyal dus tshigs 'dod pa spyod/ /drug po yun ring dpal nyams slar skyed byed/ /gang dang gang gi me tog ni/ /mchog tu dkar
[\[134b.2\]]bar gyur pa dag /mgo la bzhag par gyur na ni/ /byur ni rab tu 'jig par byed/ /mar me tha ma'i grib ma dang / /mal khri yi ni grib ma dang / /khrus mkhan gyi ni chu ngogs gang / /der ni dpal min gnas pa yin/ /rang mi la drang skye bo gzhan la g.yo/ /skye bo dam pa dang mdza' mi srun spong / /
[\[134b.3\]]dgra la dpa' zhing bla ma la gus pa/ /'di dag gang gis shes de dus shes yin/ /gzugs ldan rigs mtho mkhas par gyur pa dag /rigs ldan ldan zhing bstan bcos mang thos la/ /gal te yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan kyang / /gos ngan skye bo mdzes par snang ma yin/ /bud
[\[134b.4\]]med rgyal po sbrul dang ni/ /kha drag dgra dang grogs po dang / /longs spyod nyid dang tshe la ni/ /nam yang yid brtan mi bya'o/ /dgra bo dag dang sngums byas nas/ /bag phebs nas ni bder nyal ba/ /de ni shing rtser nyal gyur pa/ /sad nas lhung bar 'gyur dang mtshungs/ /'jam pos
[\[134b.5\]]'jam po 'joms byed cing / /'jam pos rtsub mo'ang 'joms byed de/ /'jam pos mi 'grub ci yang med/ /de bas 'jam nyid rnon po yin/ /shin tu drang por mi bya ste/ /nags su song la ltos shig dang / /der ni shing drang gcod byed kyi/ /yon po lus par gyur pa yin/ /'bras
[\[134b.6\]]bu dang ldan shing 'dud cing / /skye bo mkhas pa dul ba yin/ /shing skam dar ni blun po dag /'dud par mi byed dul ma yin/ /shes dang bye brag shes med cing / /blun po rnams ni rtag tu dga'/ /shes pa'i lcags kyus dbang byas pa'i/ /mkhas pa rtag tu sems 'dul
[\[134b.7\]]byed/ /ri yi rtse mor char 'bab cing / /bud med mdza' bo ngan la dga'/ /dpal ni blun po la gnas shes/ /mkhas pa phal cher dbul por yod/ /tsa na ka'i rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las le'u bdun pa'o// //chung ma ngan dang mdza' bo ngan/ /rgyal po ngan dang bshes ngan
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]dang / /'brel ba ngan la brten pa ni/ /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ /yul 'jigs pa dang rigs zad dang / /chung ma gzhan sems phrogs pa dang / /bu ni log pas phongs la gnas/ /gang zhig ma mthong de skal ldan/ /ngan pa'i yul du su zhig sdod/ /bu
[\[135a.2\]]ngan pa la su zhig dga'/ /mdza' bo ngan la su yid rton/ /rgyal po ngan la srog yod min/ /gzhan gyi zas dang gzhan gyi gos/ /gzhan gyi yul dang gzhan bud med/ /gzhan gyi khyim du gnas gyur na/ /brgya byin yin yang dpal nyams 'gyur/ /dregs pas dpal ni nyams 'gyur zhing / /
[\[135a.3\]]khro bas dka' thub nyams par byed/ /las ring gis ni stobs nyams byed/ /bram ze gtsang sbra med bas nyams/ /smad rigs rtsod pa nyid gyis dga'/ /dam pa 'dum pas dga' ba yin/ /mi mchog go 'phang bstod 'dod de/ /go 'phang bstod pa nor gyi mchog /bud med tshogs spyod bran
[\[135a.4\]]gyur nga rgyal che/ /smad 'tshong snyan par smra par byed pa dang / /dka' thub chos gzob nor med 'dod la gdung / /lnga po 'di dag tshul min spyod pa yin/ /gtong dga' dbul zhing ser sna can nor ldan/ /rang la mi skur bu ni bsgo mi nyan/ /gzhan la phan byed sngon dga' che thung ba/ /lnga po skye
[\[135a.5\]]dgu'i bdag pos nyes spyad yin/ /chung ma dang bral rang mis brnyas pa dang / /bu 'on lhag ma skye bo ngan la brten/ /dbul por gyur nas skye bos rgyab kyis phyogs/ /lnga po me med par yang shin tu sreg /rigs pas don byed bu ni bsgo ba nyan/ /nad med pa dang dam pa dag dang 'grogs/ /
[\[135a.6\]]rang dbang yod cing rjes 'jug chung ma brten/ /lnga po sdug bsngal rtsa nas 'byin byed yin/ /zhum dang mdog ngan zengs pa dang / /gos ngan rang nyid 'ongs pa ni/ /lnga po 'di dag phur mi yis/ /mchod sdong yin yang mchod mi 'gyur/ /tshe dang las dang sems dang ni/ /mdza' bo dang ni
[\[135a.7\]]nor rnyed de/ /lnga po 'di dag lus can rnams/ /skye ba'i rjes la rjes su skyes/ /ri bo la 'dzegs chu dang ni/ /ba lang khyi dang 'thab pa dang / /'gyel ba las ni slong ba ste/ /be rga'i yon tan lnga ru bshad/ /'jig rten na ni srog mi brten/ /nor dang lang tsho brtan ma yin/ /mdza'
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bar rtsom pa mi brtan te/ /chos dang grags dang snyan pa brtan/ /mi rnams tshe ni rab thung las/ /de phyed mtshan mos 'das par byas/ /nad rgas nyon mongs phongs pa yis/ /phyed po de yang tshang ma yin/ /'gro'am 'dug par gyur pa'am/ /gnyid ma log par nyal ba na/ /gang zhig gzhan

[\[135b.3\]]gnod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas rgyal po rnams la brten bya yi/ /lto 'grangs 'ba' zhig tsam zhig su zhig byed/ /mkhas shing rtsal dang grags ldan sma ma bab/ /mis bkur 'tsho ba skad cig gang yin pa/ /de ni gson po yin zhes dam pa 'chad/ /khwa ni yun ring 'tsho yang gtor
[\[135b.4\]]zar zad/ /chu chung grog po dgang sla zhing / /byis pa'i snyim pa dgang sla la/ /skye bo ngan pa mgu sla ste/ /ngan ngon gyis kyang mgu bar byed/ /sprin gyi grib ma rtswa yi me/ /blun po la brten skam sa'i chu/ /smad 'tshong chags dang mi srun mdza'/ /drug po 'di dag chu bur mtshungs/ /nyam
[\[135b.5\]]chung dpung ni rgyal po yin/ /byis pa'i dpung ni da mo yin/ /glen pa'i dpung ni mi smra yin/ /rkun ma'i dpung ni brdzun tshig yin/ /ji lta ji ltar skyes bu yis/ /bstan bcos legs par rtogs gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar shes pa yis/ /khyad par nges par skye bar 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar
[\[135b.6\]]skyes bu yis/ /blo yis dge ba'i las byed pa/ /de lta de ltar don rnams kun/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /brkam chags bag med yid ches pas/ /gsum pos skyes bu slu bar byed/ /de bas brkam chags bag med dang / /yid ches su yang mi bya'o/ /lkog na bya ba nyams
[\[135b.7\]]byed pa/ /mngon sum du ni smra byed pa/ /dug bum kha na 'o ma can/ /de 'dra'i mdza' bo spang bar bya/ /skye bo ngan dang 'dres pa yis/ /skye bo ngan pa'ang rlag par byed/ /chu ni shin tu dang pa yang / /'dam gyis rnyog pa can du byed/ /gang zhig mthon mchod lhag mar gyur de zas/ /gang
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]zhig sdig pa mi byed de shes ldan/ /gang zhig lkog tu phan de mdza' bo yin/ /gang zhig g.yo med pas byed de chos yin/ /gang zhig rgan med ba de 'dun sa min/ /gang zhig chos ldan mi smra de rgan min/ /gang la bden med de ni chos ma yin/ /gang zhig slu ba
[\[136a.2\]]dang 'brel de bden min/ /gang du sems dang dga' ba bkra shis de/ /gang zhig gzhan la mi rten de 'tsho ba/ /gang zhig rang mi dang spyod de bsags pa/ /gang zhig dgra bo zil gnon de nga rgyal/ /gang zhig nga rgyal bral de des pa yin/ /gang zhig sred pas ma rmongs de dpal yin/ /gang
[\[136a.3\]]zhig bag phebs gyur ba de mdza' bo/ /gang zhig dbang po dul ba de dpa' bo/ /rgyal po med par 'dug mi bya/ /bud med gtso bo byed pa dang / /gtso mang yod bar gnas mi bya/ /rgyal po mkhas yod gnas par bya/ /gzhon nu'i tshe na phas bsrungs la/ /lang tsho'i tshe na khyos bsrungs shing / /rgan
[\[136a.4\]]pa'i tshe na bus bsrungs pas/ /bud med rang dgar gnas ma yin/ /gcer bu'i khrus dang glang po myos/ /ba ni dang po be'u skyes pa dang / /chu med pa yi sbal pa dag /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ /nor gyis gdungs la gnyen med bshes kyang med/ /'dod pas gdungs la 'jigs med ngo tsha
[\[136a.5\]]med/ /bkres pas gdungs la stobs med mdangs kyang med/ /nad kyis gdungs la gnyid med bde ba med/ /rigs ni spyod pas ston par byed/ /yul ni skad kyis ston par byed/ /brtse bar rtab rtab byed pas ston/ /kha zas lus kyis ston par byed/ /gang zhig yid dang mthun gyur
[\[136a.6\]]pa/ /ring na gnas kyang gam na 'dug /gang zhig yid du mi 'ong ba/ /gam na gnas kyang thag ring yin/ /mi ni smra spobs zhan pa'i rig pa dang / /bstan bcos skyes bu ngan pa'i lag gnas pa/ /long ba'i chung ma gzugs bzang lta bu ste/ /lus can dga' ba skyed bar byed ma
[\[136a.7\]]yin/ /nor ni ri brags kun na med/ /mu tig nya rnams phal la med/ /nags tshal kun la tsan dan med/ /dam pa kun na yod pa min/ /rkang gnyis pa la mngon bum phyugs/ /blun po yongs su spang bar bya/ /mi mngon pa yi tsher ma ltar/ /tshig gi zug rngus gnod
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pa skyed/ /mkhas pas rtag tu bu dag ni/ /rig pa sna tshogs la sbyar bya/ /mkhas shing blo ni phun tshogs dan/ /rtag tu mchod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig gzhon tshe rig mi slob/ /pha dgra ma ni zhes dgra yin/ /ngang pa'i nang na chu skyar ltar/ /mang po'i nang na mdzes ma yin/ /

[\[145b.6\]]brgyan pa'i lag pa yin/ /shin tu lag pa chung ba 'bangs por 'gyur/ /lag pa'i ri mo g.yon du 'khyil ba ni/ /thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyas pa yin/ /pha rol grags pa'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur/ /lag pa'i ri mo g.yas su 'khyil ba ni/ /rtag tu skyes ba sdug bsngal 'gyur ba

[\[146a.1\]]gyen du langs pa yi/ /ri mo gang la yod pa bu gsum 'gyur/ /gang du srang gi ri mo yod gyur pa/ /lag pa'i rting par nya'am rnga ma 'dra/ /gang la yod pa sgrub pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /de ni bu mang bdag po byed par bshad/ /mthe chung srin lag rtsa ba'i tshigs gsum gyi/ /'og ma'i
[\[146a.2\]]dkyil du ri mo snyoms pa gsum/ /nan tar gsal ba yod na lo brgya 'tsho/ /lag pa gur 'chang lta bu mdog can ni/ /gser dang nor mang bdag po byed pa yin/ /gzhan yang rig pa 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /lag pa'i dkyil lam yang na gnas gzhan du/ /hom gzar lta bu gang la yod pa de/ /
[\[146a.3\]]kun gyis bkur ram mchod sbyin bdag por bshad/ /lag pa'i ri mo mang po yod gyur na/ /bram zer gyur na rig byed bzhi la mkhas/ /dbyug pa gdugs dang chu bum lta bu yi/ /ri mo gang la yod pa bram ze'i rigs/ /de yi rkang la rgyal po'i mgo bos 'dud/ /rdo rje rtse gsum shak+ti 'dra ba dang / /
[\[146a.4\]]dgra sta'i ri mo ral gri 'dra ba'i gzugs/ /de rnams yod pa de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /dung dang gdugs dang lcags kyu mtshan ldan dang / /gang la yod pa mi yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /ri mo dod snyoms snum pa 'khor lo 'dra/ /gang la yod pa de yang rgyal por 'gyur/ /ri mo chad pa rdul can nyung ngu gson/ /
[\[146a.5\]]ri mo ri dang shing sdong lta bu dang / /sor mo ring po zlum po snyoms pa no/ /dud 'gro mang po'i bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /ri mo gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'khor lo dag /gang la yod pa rgyal po nges par thob/ /'gro'am 'dug dang nges par bde bar son/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bcu gcig
[\[146a.6\]]pa'o// //lag pa mtho ba zlum po sha dang bcas/ /de ni sde chen bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /mgrin pa ring ba rnga mo lta bu ni/ /pha rol nor la rlom sems byed par 'gyur/ /mgrin pa snum pa ki ra lta bu dang / /glang chen lta bu yod na rgyal por 'gyur/ /bza' btung longs spyod mang po 'thob par
[\[146a.7\]]byed/ /gdong ba zlum po chos dang tshul khrims ldan/ /gdong pa sha dang bral ba zha kyog can/ /pha rol don rnams mang po smra par byed/ /mang po smra ba de ni rkun mar bshad/ /don rnams rdzogs par smra ba rgyal por 'gyur/ /ra dang spre'u'i skad dang gdong pa ni/ /pha rol grags pa nor rnams
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]mang par 'gyur/ /'gram mgo pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu la/ /de yi mgrin pa longs spyod mang sor ldan/ /yam chu dmar bsrab pa mi ye bdag /ya mchu mthug par gyur pa rmongs par 'gyur/ /nan tar skams na sdug bsngal mang po can/ /bim pa'i mchu can bza' btung mang bar bshad/ /
[\[146b.2\]]so rnams ku tu ta ltar dkar ba ni/ /mchog tu bzang po mi yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /blang chen bong bu'i so can snum po rnams/ /bde bar 'tsho ba bzang po'i mtshan ma yin/ /dom dang spre'u lta bu ltogs par 'gyur/ /rdo ba lta bu gdol can 'khyog pa ni/ /sdug bsngal thob pa so yi
[\[146b.3\]]mtshan ma yin/ /g.yas pa'i so gnyis sbom pa dpon por 'gyur/ /stobs dang longs spyod mang po ldan pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i so gnyis sbom pa pha ma 'chi/ /so bzhi 'khyog pa sdug cing pha ma 'chi/ /dkar po rno ba legs pa sa yi bdag /ring zhing rno ba mkhas pa'i mtshan ma
[\[146b.4\]]yin/ /sum cu so gnyis so can rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ /sum cu yod na bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /sum cu so dgu'i so can sdug cing gson/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa ni bde bar 'tsho/ /des ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod mang po rnyed/ /ya so ma so mnyam pa
[\[146b.5\]]nor gyi bdag /dmar smug lce can sdig pa byed pa yin/ /mthug ba rdul can lce ni mi bzad ster/ /dkar po lce can spyod pa gtsang ba yin/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i ring ba ni/ /shin tu srab pa ma yin mthug pa min/ /rgyal por 'gyur ba'i lce yi mtshan ma yin/ /snum dang dmar ba rig pa
[\[146b.6\]]'dzin par byed/ /dmar smug dkar can rigs rnams nyams par byed/ /des ni nor med sdug bsngal mang po 'thob/ /ser nag dmar smug can gang bzang po min/ /seng ge glang chen lta bu mi yi bdag /ngang pa 'brug gi gdangs can nor dang ldan/ /glang ngam bong bu'i skad can sdug bsngal
[\[146b.7\]]che/ /rta dang bong bu bya rog sgra can sdug /tsheg gtam zer ba sdig can yin par bshad/ /nyung du smra zhing bden pa rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bcu gnyis pa'o// //glang chen rta yi rna can rno ba ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pa byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /ne tsho'i
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]mchu can de yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rna gong mtho ba longs spyod ldan/ /sna chus chos pa tshul khrims gtsang ma bsrung / /sna gong 'khyog pa sdig pa byed pa can/ /sna rtse sbom pa mthug pa'ang sdig pa byed/ /sna rtse sbom pa sna gong leb pa ni/ /de yang sdug bsngal mang po 'dzin par byed/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa

[\[147b.1\]]pa yin/ /gsum du 'dzums ba bde bar byed pa yin/ /lan bzhi 'dzums pa ltogs par gnas pa yin/ /de ni tshe thung sdug cing bkren par bshad/ /dpral ba skams pa rdul dang bcas pas sdug /gnyer ma lnga pa lo brgya 'tsho bar bshad/ /gnyer ma bzhi pa dgu bcur gson par bshad/ /gnyer

[\[149b.1\]]sha yis gang la bkra shis mtshan ma can/ /dpon po'i chung ma nor gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /spu med dkar por gnas ba zangs kyi mdog /snum pa de yang bde bar 'tsho ba'i mtshan/ /sen mo gas pa rdul can bu gas gang / /spu dang bcas pa de ni sdug par 'gyur/ /lag pa bkra

[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan brgyad pa'o// //lce mdog dmar po nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /srab mthug snyoms pa'i lce yang de bzhin no/ /mchog tu srab ba dkar ba nad dang bcas/ /shin tu mthug pa'i lce yang de bzhin no/ /de ni kun dang 'khon par byed pa yin/ /
[\[150a.2\]]ring bar sleb cing dmar ba snum pa ni/ /de yis bde ba chen po thob pa yin/ /rkan gyi kha dog dkar ba ltogs pa yin/ /rdul can rkan ni chos la rton par 'gyur/ /ser mo mchog tu sdug bsngal chen po 'thob/ /pad+ma'i 'dab can bde ba thob cing mchod/ /chu bya'i skad can ngang pa khu byug gi /gdangs
[\[150a.3\]]can rgyal po'i btsun mo byed par 'gyur/ /'gram 'og snum ba sha rgyas bde bar 'gyur/ /skams pa rdul can shub mdab dang / /rtsa yis gang ba sdug bsngal mang po thob/ /de la bu dang 'bral ba rgya mtshos bshad/ /sna gong ring ba khro bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nan tur chung na g.yog por

[\[153b.1\]]'jig rten dbang phyugs grub pa thob pa'i lo rgyus bzhugs// @##/ /na mo lo ki shwa rA ya/ sngon rgya gar lho phyogs na bstan pa dar ba'i tshe gtsug lag khang chen po gcig na paN+Di ta ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa thob pa cig snga dro rang gi brang khang sgo bsdams te ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/

[\[154a.1\]]mi shes pas bcom ldan 'das la zhu dgos zhes gsungs te/ nang par chos thon pa'i rjes la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bdag gis sdig de las thar ba'i thabs bdog na thugs rjes gzung bar zhu zhes gsol bas/ thabs gzhan med ma shi ba la nga'i yi ge drug pa 'di sgom

[\[154a.3\]]pas/ der dge bsnyen gyis slob dpon la gdams ngag rdzogs par zhus te/ de sdig pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu 'jigs skrag pas lho phyogs dpal gyi ri'i nags gseb shin tu dben par phyin te/ shing ma la'i sdong po'i logs la bug pa khong stong yod pa'i nang du bsdad de shing de'i pags

[\[154a.7\]]shes kyis bltas pas de las byung bar shes te/ des bza' btung phun sum tshogs pa khyer nas de'i drung du phyin te drangs pas/ 'di mi 'dod de nga las ngan pa bsags pa'i gang zag yin/ de ring 'di zan nang par ci bzhes gsungs nas ma bzhed/ klu rgyal gyis nang bar nas kyang bdag
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gis nyi ma re re zhing 'dren bas cis kyang gsol bar zhu zhus pas/ der zos te klu'i rgyal po yang dga' bzhin du log ste/ nang par nas nyi ma re re zhing bza' btung mang po bu mo la bskur te gnyis ka yang slob dpon kyi drung du 'ong ngo / /de nas klu'i bu mo de slom dpon la chags te pha

[\[159a.4\]]lag brgyad dang bcas/ /rta yi tshe yi rig byed mchog /ma lus 'di ni tshangs pa che/ /zhal bzang bzhi dang ldan pas byin/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gnas dang po las tshe'i rig byed byung pa'i tshul bstan ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

[\[160b.1\]]'gyur/ /dam pa'i lam la gnas na ni/ /grags dang bsod nams tshe ring dang / /chos don 'dod pa ma lus pa'i/ /dpal mchog 'bad pa med par 'thob/ /de skad brjod nas slob ma yis/ /khas blang de rjes slob dpon gyis/ /dus shis pa la ma yengs par/ /slob

[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]'gyur/ /mngal du ji ltar 'tsho ba lags/ /rte'u pho mo ji ltar 'gyur/ /mtshan mi ldan dang ma ning dang / /rte'u pho gnyis sam rte'u mo gnyis/ /skye ba'am g.yang gsham nyid 'gyur ba'am/ /rte'u pho mo skye ba'am/ /phra dang rags pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /
[\[168a.2\]]'dug pa dang ni nyal ba dang / /mngal du zhu dang skams pa dang / /shin tu dgye dang mthug pa dang / /bslab sbyang so sor shes pa dang / /de bzhin zas dang rno dang bul/ /lho dang zhi ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /dpal dang mi 'jigs blo ldan dang / /stobs che mgyogs pa phun tshogs dang / /
[\[168a.3\]]bul dang blo ni zhen pa dang / /sbegs dang nyams dang ldan pa dang / /ngang tshul mdangs ldan nad med dang / /phor skyes don med ci lta bu/ /tshe ring ba dang tshe thung nyid/ /bkra shis bkra mi shis gzugs bzang / /mdog ma 'dres dang mdog 'dres dang / /sna tshogs dbye ba
[\[168a.4\]]ji ltar 'gyur/ /mtshan dang rlig pa lce dang ni/ /spu dang rngog ma dag dang rkan/ /so dang rmig pa mig mi sdug /kha dog mi sdug ji ltar 'gyur/ /sgur dang ma ning yan lag nyams/ /gzugs dang mjug ma yo ba dang / /bems po 'dra dang lkugs dang 'on/ /rna yon kha ni che ba
[\[168a.5\]]dang / /mi sdug pa yi nad bu can/ /gzhan gyi dbyibs 'dra 'khu ba med/ /si si can nam khyi rdo can/ /mngal du gnas tshe ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ltar blo ldan gyis dris tshe/ /sha li ho tras smras gyur pa/ /ji ltar las dang nyon mongs las/ /sems can rnams ni 'byung
[\[168a.6\]]'gyur pa/ /yid blo dbang po zhes bya ba/ /rnam shes dang ni 'dus gyur nas/ /mngal du chags par gyur pa na/ /las kyi tshul la gnas pa yin/ /sems can 'byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /khong khrag rlung la brten pa yin/ /gang tshe rta pho rgod ma ni/ /zla mtshan ldan la 'jug
[\[168a.7\]]gyur pa/ /de tshe 'bar bar gyur pa yis/ /rnam shes mngal du gnas pa yin/ /des ni khu ba khrag blangs nas/ /mngal gyi gnas su 'dren par 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i sdong bu'i rtsar/ /skyes bus chu ni blugs pa ltar/ /de bzhin mngal gyi gnas su ni/ /khu ba rlung
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]gis 'dren par byed/ /de ni rtsol ba thams cad kyis/ /khrag gis lus ni 'phel bar byed/ /ji ltar me grogs du ba ni/ /shing las byung bas gyen du 'dren/ /de ni bar snang la gnas nas/ /gzugs can du ni gnas par byed/ /de bzhin mngal na gnas pa'i rlung / /
[\[168b.2\]]khu ba khrag tu byung ba rnams/ /de ni mngal chags gyur pa na/ /rnam shes dang ni bcas pa las/ /sems med gyur pa'i dngos po yang / /sems dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas lus su tshor 'gyur zhing / /rang gi gnas su 'byung las skye/ /mngal gyi khu ba khrag
[\[168b.3\]]dang rlung / /'dus pa las ni mngal chags 'gyur/ /rnam shes dang ni 'dres gyur la/ /khrag gis gsos par gyur pa las/ /snying stobs dang ni 'dres 'gyur pa/ /de ni mngal chags shes par bya/ /legs thos gyis ni slar smras pa/ /bdag la the tshom 'di
[\[168b.4\]]skyes te/ /khu ba zla ba'i bdag nyid can/ /khrag ni me yi rang bzhin yin/ /de gnyis 'dus par gyur pa na/ /ji ltar mngal nas zags ma gyur/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang / /sha li ho tras smras gyur pa/ /de ni rnam shes kyis zin pas/ /drod kyis khu bar 'gyur
[\[168b.5\]]ma yin/ /ma yi nyis pa'i dbang dang ni/ /tshe yang yongs su zad na 'jig /sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang / /khu khrag skyon med gyur pa las/ /de tshe yon tan dang ldan par/ /mngal ni 'dzin par 'gyur pa yin/ /de ni nga yis bshad bya yi/ /rim gyis khyod kyis shes
[\[168b.6\]]par gyis/ /nam mkha' rlung dang me dang ni/ /chu dang de bzhin sa rnams te/ /'byung ba chen po de dag las/ /mngal ni skyon med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /skye ba de ltar 'byung pa yin/ /gzhan bshad gzhung yang mang mod kyi/ /kho bo de ltar
[\[168b.7\]]mi 'dod do/ /pha dang ma las byung ba dang / /las dang de bzhin snying stobs skyes/ /de ltar sems can thams cad ni/ /mngal du chags par shes par bya/ /ji ltar 'byung ba bshad bya ste/ /la la mgo bo sngar skye zer/ /kha cig gis ni dang por snying / /
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gzhan dag rgyu ma skye zhes zer/ /de lta mod kyi mngal du ni/ /ming can cig car skye bar 'dod/ /khu ba khrag dang rnam shes dag /'dres kyang brgyal bar gyur pa las/ /zhag bdun nas ni rlung dag gis/ /bskams las nur nur por 'gyur ro/ /zhag
[\[169a.2\]]bcu na ni mer mer po/ /zla ba gcig na gor gor po/ /rdza bum gser las chu blugs pa/ /kun du gsher bar byed pa ltar/ /ma yi kha zas yon tan gyis/ /mngal du chags pa gso bar byed/ /nur nur po la sogs pa'i che/ /yan lag mi gsal nyid du
[\[169a.3\]]bshad/ /zla ba gnyis na rkang lag ni/ /so so'i char ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dus ni dus kyi khyad par gyis/ /yan lag gsal zhes bzhad pa yin/ /sngar ni mi gsal de rjes la/ /gsal ba nyid du snang ba yin/ /ji ltar sman gyi sa bon la/ /thams cad mi gsal nyid du
[\[169a.4\]]'dod/ /der ni byed pa po mi snang / /sa bon la rta de bzhin no/ /dper na 'o ma mar yod pa/ /de la snang bar 'gyur ma yin/ /de ni bsrubs par gyur pa na/ /thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin ma chags rang bzhin ni/ /phra bas mngon par mi 'gyur la/ /
[\[169a.5\]]de nyid 'phel bar gyur pa yi/ /dus gzhan du ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar a mra'i sa bon la/ /shun pa la sogs mi snang gi /dus gzhan zhig na gsal bar snang / /mngal du chags pa de dang 'dra/ /gang tshe gsal bar gyur nas ni/ /mngal du slar yang 'phel
[\[169a.6\]]'gyur te/ /yan lag nying lag chags gyur pa/ /zla ba gsum lon la sogs nyon/ /lus dang rgyab dang brang dang spu/ /pags pa bu ga rked pa lto/ /mid pa dpung pa rmig pa dang / /rkan mchu nu ma kha 'gram sogs/ /nam tshong brang dang rtsib ma rnams/ /zla ba gsum na skye
[\[169a.7\]]bar 'gyur/ /zla ba bzhi par pho mtshan ni/ /rtsa rgyus bcas pa skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhi dang gas sra sha 'phel dang / /mjug ma rngog ma rus pa skye/ /zla ba lnga par rkub dang ni/ /long ka dag kyang skye 'gyur zhing / /snying dang glo ba mtsher pa dang / /mchin pa mkhal ma gzhang
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]dang na/ /rgyu ma gnye ma sogs pa 'byung / /zla ba drug par yan lag kun/ /rgyas shing rtsa phran rtsa chen dang / /rus pa kun dang tshigs rnams 'byung / /zla ba bdun pa'i tshe na ni/ /ma yi nu ma g.yos 'gyur zhing / /dbang po drug ni tshang ba dang / /dbugs ni dman pa nyid kyis
[\[169b.2\]]rta/ /dbang po'i yon dang bya ba la/ /nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de phyir zla ba bdun pa na/ /rgod ma dbugs rngub bder mi nus/ /de tshe yan lag rgyas shing brtan/ /rtsa sogs bdun brgya gsal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zla ba brgyad pa la/ /mngal du lus de cher 'phel zhing / /
[\[169b.3\]]lus rgyas ro drug tshor ba dang / /stobs dang ldan zhing dbang po gsal/ /dbang pos don ni gsal byed cing / /ma yang bde bar dbugs mi rngub/ /tshags tshigs mnyen zhing brtan 'gyur zhing / /rgod ma'i lto ba ci zhig na/ /zla ba dgu par rgod ma ni/ /mtshan dang de
[\[169b.4\]]bzhin nu ma skrangs/ /'byung ba gsal ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /yan lag nying lag rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu'am ni bcu ba'am/ /zla ba bcu gcig pa dag la/ /nye bar btsas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgod ma nad dang bcas par ni/ /bu btsas pa ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bu
[\[169b.5\]]yi lte ba dang 'brel ba'i/ /mngal na rtsa sbubs yod pas na/ /de las dngas ma rgyu ma yi/ /mngal ni 'phel bar gyur pa yin/ /mngal na gnas pa rtag par ni/ /mgo bo gyen du bltas nas gnas/ /mngal na gnas pa'i gcin rtug ni/ /skye ba'i dus na 'byung
[\[169b.6\]]'gyur la/ /zla ba bcu bar de 'phel te/ /de ni sha ma la gnod byed/ /de ni gcin rtug la gnas pas/ /yid mi bde phyir sgyur bar byed/ /mgo ni thur du sgyur byed cing / /go bzlog par ni gnas bas na/ /rgyu ma dkrugs bar gyur pa'i phyir/ /ma yin da ni mi bzad
[\[169b.7\]]skyed/ /de ltar thur du bsgyur bas na/ /de bas rgod ma'i kha zas ni/ /rjes su mthun pa nyid du bya/ /rgyu des zla ba bcu na ni/ /legs par bcas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni bzung bar byed pas na/ /dang po mgo bo 'byung 'gyur te/ /de nas lus ni rim gyis 'byung / /
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]de ltar na ni btsas par bshad/ /de yi rjes la sha ma ni/ /mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /pho la sogs pa mngal du ni/ /chags par byed pa'i rgyu nyon cig /khu ba mang zhing khrag nyung pa/ /rlung gis 'dres par byas nas ni/ /der ni

[\[170a.3\]]dus su ni/ /pha ma dag kyang nyam chung zhing / /dbang po'i stobs kyang zad gyur pa/ /de gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni/ /khu ba khrag kyang cha mnyam na/ /ma ning du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /nyes pa de dag gnyis dang ni/ /pha ma nad gzhir bcas gyur na/ /zla mtshan nyes pa cher

[\[170a.5\]]skyed mi byed/ /khu ba stong par gyur pa na/ /rlung gis gnyis su phye ba las/ /khrag dang 'dres par gyur pa ru/ /rnam shes gnyis ni zhugs pa na/ /rte'u mtshe mar skye 'gyur la/ /khu ba mang na pho gnyis te/ /khrag ni mang bar gyur pa las/ /rte'u mo'i mtshe mar skye bar
[\[170a.6\]]'gyur/ /de las gzhan yang mngal gyi ni/ /nyes pa bzhi bo mnyan par gyis/ /rlung nad gnod kyi nyes pa yis/ /mngal du zhu bar gyur pa yin/ /de la bad kan lhags gyur na/ /mngal na nyal ba zhes byar 'gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen pas/ /mngal

[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ma yi ni nyes pa dang / /kha zas rtsub pas rlung bskyed cing / /grang bas bkag cing gnod gyur bas/ /de ni mngal du gzugs thung 'gyur/ /gang tshe dus tshigs nyes pa la/ /rgod ma'i nad gzhi dang phrad par/ /mngal du chags par gyur pa na/ /de tshe nad bu can du
[\[170b.2\]]'gyur/ /ro ni mi mnyam nyes pa dang / /de bzhin dus ni go log pas/ /mngal gyi rlung 'khris bad kan gyi/ /nyes pa nye bar 'khrug par 'gyur/ /rlung gis lce yi rtsa dag tu/ /rjes su rgyu bar byed pa na/ /nad gzhi de ni 'khrugs gyur na/ /de las rta ni lkugs
[\[170b.3\]]par 'gyur/ /rna ba'i bu ga 'gags pa las/ /'on pa nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /mid pa'i rtsa ni 'gags pa las/ /bems po 'dra bar skye bar 'gyur/ /mngal du mig gi rtsa dag la/ /gnod gyur pa yis khebs pa las/ /rte'u dmus long dag tu ni/ /

[\[170b.5\]]rengs dang yo ba dang / /ma ning yan lag ma tshang dang / /gzugs ni sdug dang yan lag nyams/ /yan lag phra dang lhag ma rnams/ /de ni rlung gi gnod las gyur/ /de ltar ji skad bshad pa dang / /de las lhag pa'i smad bya ba/ /snang na rta de rlung gi ni/ /nad kyis
[\[170b.6\]]nyen par shes par bya/ /rta ni gseb dang phrad gyur tshe/ /yid la gang zhig 'dod gyur pa/ /de yi bu ni de 'dra par/ /skye bar 'gyur ba kho na yin/ /de bzhin spyod lam dag dang tshang / /mdog dang gzi mdangs 'gros dang ni/ /pha dang ma ni ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra phal

[\[171a.1\]]pa'am/ /rngog ma srab par 'gyur ba yin/ /pags pa spu dang rnga ma yi/ /skyon gang yod de rlung las gyur/ /bad kan mkhris pa las gnas pa'i/ /so yi rtsa bar gnas gyur la/ /bad kan mkhris pa shas che las/ /so mi sdug par 'gyur pa

[\[171a.3\]]tshe thung 'gyur/ /gseb sbyar tshe na skar ma ches/ /byed pa la sogs bzang po dang / /yid 'ong gzhan yang mang po yis/ /bkra shis dang ni mchod byas te/ /rta ni mchan ldan rgod ma ni/ /shis pa dang ni sbyar bar bya/ /lha dang bram ze mchod byas la/ /rol mo sems
[\[171a.4\]]can gzhan gyis bskor/ /ro tsa gtsang ba'i kha zas dang / /khu bcud bzang po dag kyang sbyin/ /de ltar byas na bzang 'gyur te/ /gzhan du byas na bzang mi 'gyur/ /gzi mdangs nyams dang snying stobs rtsal/ /gzugs dang nad med dpa' ba dang / /'jigs med pa
[\[171a.5\]]dang blo ldan pa/ /'og nas rgya cher bshad par bya/ /rdzas bcud nus pa smin pa las/ /rta rnams mngal du chags pa'i tshe/ /bad kan pags par khyab gyur na/ /rte'u dkar por skye bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi kha dog sngo bsangs 'gyur/ /mkhris pa yis ni nag por skye/ /

[\[171b.7\]]mi sdug cing mi srun dang / /yan lag mi tshang blo chung dang / /'jigs skyen stobs chung sems nyams shing / /'dus dang las kyi dbang dang ni/ /nad gzhi rnams kyi rang bzhin las/ /mngal du skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /ci lta bar ni yongs su bshad/ /legs

[\[172a.1\]]thos thos dang ldan pa yis/ /tshul bzhin yongs su dris ba na/ /sha li ho tra dka' thub ches/ /dris lan de ltar smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las mngal du chags pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// //rta skad las

[\[172b.1\]]'dor zhing 'bros byed dang / /grang ba la ni dag 'gyur pa'i/ /rta ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can/ /spu mdog snum zhing stobs che la/ /sgra snyan dal gyis 'tsher ba dang / /rta dang de bzhin mi rnams la/ /rang bzhin zhi ba ston pa dang / /'dul sbyong sla zhing bslabs la brtan/ /

[\[172b.4\]]bshad/ /rlung dang bad kan rang bzhin can/ /bar ma dag ni yin par bshad/ /mkhris pa bad kan rang bzhin can/ /rta ni rab mchog yin par bshad/ /nang med lus zungs mnyam gyur cing / /bad kan can gyi rta bsngags so/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /
[\[172b.5\]]rta'i rang bzhin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //legs thos thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /bu la sha li ho tras smras/ /bzang po sman dang ri dgas dang / /'dres pa'i mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis/ /stobs chen mdog ni snum pa dang / /dul ba'i gzugs can

[\[173a.1\]]gnas yin/ /bkra shis mtshan nyid ldan mod kyi/ /cung zad smad pa yod pa dang / /bslab pa myur du lobs na yang / /myur du brjed par gyur na yang / /mtshan mo'i dus su lus phung ste/ /gnyid ni log par byed pa dang / /rta la zhe sdang che ba dang / /'khrig

[\[173a.3\]]can le lo can/ /lto che sbegs cing 'khyam pa dga'/ /de bzhin kun du dog pa can/ /nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo'ang rung / /yan lag ma lus brkyang nas ni/ /rtag tu gnyid ni log pa dang / /rta la 'tshe bar byed la dga'/ /lcag gis gzhus la mi tshor zhing / /myur

[\[173a.7\]]rigs bzhi shes dga' bas/ /de ni nga yis go bar bya/ /rigs bzhi rnam par dbye ba ni/ /skye gnas dang ni gzugs byad dang / /tshul spyod dang ni dul ba dang / /skad gdangs dbyibs dang kha dog dang / /dri nyid las ni nyer shes bya/ /gang zhig de las go bzlog ste/ /

[\[173b.1\]]de yi khyad par smra ba ni/ /nyon la rnam par dpyad par gyis/ /gzugs bzang dpal dang ldan pa dang / /spyod pa dul zhing bsngags par 'os/ /blo ldan ngang tshul bzang ba dang / /'dul sbyong mkhan gyis byas pa nyan/ /rjes su mthun zhing nus pa ldan/ /gtsang zhing
[\[173b.2\]]gtsang sbra dag la brten/ /bkres dang skom la sran che zhing / /khro ba chung zhing blan par sla/ /gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan/ /las rnams kun gyi rjes su 'jug /btung dang kha zas bza' bya yi/ /lhag ma dang ni mi gtsang dang / /rta spangs dang ni de bzhin

[\[174a.1\]]zhig 'jigs pa med pa dang / /glang po'i tshogs ni chen po dang / /dril bu rol mo'i sgra rnams dang / /ca co 'don pa'i sgra rnams dang / /rta gzhan 'tsher bar gyur pa dang / /dung dang rnga chen sgra dang ni/ /rol mo'i sgra dang rdza rnga'i sgra/ /gdugs dang

[\[175a.1\]]gnyid log na ni bag med pa'i/ /rta ni rigs 'dzin rgyud yin no/ /bram ze'i rigs mor rje'u rigs zhugs/ /de ni ma ga da zhes bya/ /snying stobs zhan zhing khur stobs che/ /lam du chas tshe 'tsher zhing 'gro/ /rngog ma 'chol bar skye ba dang / /gang

[\[176a.1\]]snang / /mnyen zhing 'jam la gnod pa med/ /rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /mtshul pa drang zhing dbyibs mdzes la/ /skyon med par yang gang gnas dang / /drang zhing zlum la 'jam zhing mnyen/ /yon tan dag gis brgyan na bzang / /

[\[177a.1\]]zlum/ /tshigs sam tshigs ni mi mngon dang / /mdzes zhing rtsa ni mngon pa dang / /'gro tshe gug par bde na bzang / /che drang ring zhing shin tu zlum/ /shin tu sha srab ma yin ma 'khregs/ /rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon la/ /nad med pa ni rta la

[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]yin/ /ong do mnyam zhing zlum pa dang / /dbyibs ni legs bar gyur pa dang / /mjug do shin tu rgyas min zhing / /ha cang zhum pa yang ma yin/ /rgyab gzhung bas ni mthon bzang / /sra zhing zlum la rgyus mi mngon/ /gsal zhing rim gyis mdzes par gnas/ /
[\[177b.2\]]shin tu thung dang ring ba min/ /gdong gi tshad dang mnyam pa dang / /mjug ma dang legs 'brel ba bzang / /rta yi rnga ma spu ring zhing / /mnyam sa kha dog gcig pa dang / /mnyen zhing snum par gyur ba ni/ /rta la shis bar bshad pa yin/ /mjug tsos shin
[\[177b.3\]]tu mtho ma yin/ /shin tu gyes dang 'bus pa'ang min/ /lus dang rjes mthun tshad dang ldan/ /de lta bu dag bsngags pa yin/ /rkub ni zab cing zlum pa dang / /dbyibs legs phyi rol gnyer ma med/ /gang gis rta sbangs legs gtod pa/ /de ni rab
[\[177b.4\]]tu bsngags pa yin/ /brla nad shin tu yangs min zhing / /dog par gyur pa min na bsngags/ /rlig pa do mnyam legs 'brel skyes/ /spu ni med par gyur pa dang / /dbus ni bil ba tsam zhig ni/ /shin tu ni 'phyang gyur pa bsngags/ /mtshan ni rtsa
[\[177b.5\]]sdom rim gyis phra/ /'jam zhing myur du ldang ba dang / /spubs yangs pas ni g.yogs pa dang / /kha zhing shin tu phye zhing zlum/ /gting ring kha dog gcig ldan pa'i/ /rta ni bsngags par 'gyur ba yin/ /dpyi mgu la mnyam zhing dbyibs legs la/ /
[\[177b.6\]]pags srab spu ni legs pa bzang / /rkub tshos sra zhing legs par 'brel/ /rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon bzang / /dbyi ni legs par 'byor pa dang / /legs par rdzogs gyur pa dang / /yangs shing dkyus ni ring ba dang / /pags pa srab la sha rgyas
[\[177b.7\]]bzang / /rje dar snyoms shing dbyibs legs dang / /rim gyis phra bar gyur pa dang / /shin tu phra ba'i rus pas khyab/ /rta ni bsngags par 'gyur pa yin/ /che drang pa sogs lus stod ni/ /ci 'drar ro smad de bzhin du/ /mtshan nyid thams cad bshad
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bar bya/ de yi 'og tu rgod ma yi/ /lus kyi phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dag /gang dag yin pa bshad par bya/ /de yi mtshan ni mnyam che gsal/ /legs par bltams shing legs par 'dzag /bu ga che zhing grwa mtshams che/ /ring zhing mtshan ni
[\[178a.2\]]rgya phyed la/ /mngal gyi nyes pa dang bral ba/ /de yi mo mtshan de 'dra bsngags/ /nu ma zlum zhing rgyas pa dang / /shin tu 'phyang ba ma yin dang / /'o ma skyon med legs par rgyas/ /rgod ma rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /nu sor mnyam zhing zlum pa dang / /bu ga legs
[\[178a.3\]]shing 'o ma rgyas/ /shin tu 'dus min gyes pa'ang yin/ /mthug cing brtan la legs par skyes/ /shin tu 'byar min rab 'phyang min/ /rte'us 'o ma btung bde bsngags/ /lhag ma rgod ma'i yan lag kun/ /rta pho dang ni 'dra par bsngags/ /de lta mod kyi
[\[178a.4\]]gzugs mdzes pas/ /rgod ma'i gzugs ni bzang bar bshad/ /lus ni sbom por gyur pa yod/ /phra ba lta bur mngon pa yin/ /lus srab par ni gyur na yang / /rgod ma spu mdangs yod pa mngon/ /de 'dra'i tshul gyis lus kyi ni/ /dbyibs kyi bye brag shes par
[\[178a.5\]]bya/ /rgod ma rta pho 'dra ba dang / /rta pho rgod ma 'dra ba ru/ /gal te phyin ci log ci snang / /dgos pa'i 'bras bu 'byin mi 'gyur/ /lus che mdangs ni bzang ba dang / /legs par skyes zhing tshad dang ldan/ /gzi brjid yan lag dbyes pa dang / /yan lag
[\[178a.6\]]cha ni snyoms pa dang / /gtsug 'khyil dge zhing gzi mdangs dge /dri bzang yan lag mi sdug med/ /lus rgyas 'gros ni bzang ba dang / /'jigs med gnas gsum yangs pa dang / /tshad mnyam dbyibs ni legs pa ste/ /gang zhig de 'dra'i lus ldan
[\[178a.7\]]pa/ /bdag po'i grags dang rigs dang nor/ /rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yon tan phyin ci log ldan pa/ /bdag po'i don rnams nyams byed yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las yan lag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dka' thub bsam gtan chen po yis/ /gzi byin gsal gyur drang srong la/ /blo dang ldan pa lags thos kyis/ /sngar bshad pa ni dris gyur pa/ /khyod kyis phyogs bstan gsungs mod kyi/ /bshad pa dag ni ma gsungs pas/ /bstan pa rnams kyi bshad
[\[178b.2\]]pa ni/ /legs ldan gsung bar mdzad ba'i rigs/ /bstan pa bshad pa dang bcas pa/ /bu yis bskul bas smras pa ni/ /mid pa srol gong dang 'brel bas/ /ro 'dzin lcer ni shes par bya/ /de yi steng ni rkan yin te/ /ma rkan lce 'og yin par bshad/ /'gram
[\[178b.3\]]so 'gram pa las skyes pa/ /ldang ba'i so ni yin par bshad/ /de las gzhan pa mdun gyi so/ /bcu gnyis mtshan mar ldan pa yin/ /de rnams kyi ni dbugs gnas pa/ /steng 'og bzhi ni mche ba yin/ /steng 'og gi ni so 'gebs pa/ /gnyis po mchu ni
[\[178b.4\]]yin par bshad/ /mchu mtha' yi ni ngos gnyis na/ /'gram pa'i dbus chung kha 'gram yin/ /ya mchu'i steng na sgros yod de/ /de yi steng gi mchu lhag yin/ /ma mchu'i 'og ma ko sko ste/ /de ltag 'gram pa yin par bshad/ /sna gong mig gnyis bar mtshams
[\[178b.5\]]gdong / /gdong gi yan lag sna khung gnyis/ /gdong gi ngos gnyis mkhur tshos yin/ /de bar dma' ba mchi ma'i stan/ /de dag rnams kyi gong na mig /mig 'bras 'gegs pa mig mchu yin/ /mig mtha'i dkar po mig sprin yin/ /de dbus la zlum nag
[\[178b.6\]]mthong mig yin/ /mthong mig nag po zlum po'i dbus/ /phra zhing dang ba mig rgyal bong / /mig ltag gnyis ni mig gi skyu/ /de steng smin ma gnyis yin no/ mig gi rgya ba ni mig zur te/ /nang gi mtshams ni mig phugs yin/ /smin ma gnyis re dpral ba
[\[178b.7\]]ste/ /dpral ba'i steng gi dpral mtshams yin/ /de steng spyi bo yin par bshad/ /rna ba'ang gnyis par glad pa ste/ mig zur mig 'gram bar mur gong / /mur gong rna ba'i bar mur 'gram/ /mkhur tshos gnyis kyi rgyab za yung / /de gnyis phyi rol
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]'gram glad yin/ /'gram pa srol gong gnyis kyi bar/ /lkog ma zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang rgyab/ /rna ltag dang ni rna mchan yin/ /mgo dang phrag so'i bar ske mgrin/ /ske mgrin phrag so'i ltag ske rtsa/ /de steng rngog
[\[179a.2\]]g.yab yin par bshad/ /rngog mtha' rna ba'i bar phum phum/ /rngog g.yab mtha' ni ze'u ltag ste/ /de yi rgyab ni dang ru yin/ /dang ru'i 'og ni nam tsong zhes/ /rta rnams la ni bshad pa yin/ /ze'u ltag ni 'og ma nyid/ /ze'u yin par shes par bya/ /ze'u'i rjes
[\[179a.3\]]thogs kho na la/ /sga 'og yin par shes par bya/ /de phan cad na sgal tshigs dang / /rgyab nyid yin par shes par bya/ /ze'u'i so gnyis phrag so ste/ /phrag so'i rtsa ba dpung mgo yin/ /lkog ma dang ni srol gong bar/ /mid pa'o de 'og srol mdud yin/ /mid
[\[179a.4\]]'og lag par brang yin te/ /de rjes lag 'og bar snying ga /de 'og dpung sna dpung pa yin/ /dpung pa'i nang ni mchan khung phan/ /rgyab kyi cha ni dpung rgyab yin/ /de 'og pus mo gnyis kyi ltag /pus gong dang ni lag ngar gnyis/ /pus mo'i 'og tu chig grang
[\[179a.5\]]ste/ /de 'og chig grang phra mo yin/ chig grang sdom pha'i bar na ni/ /chig grang nang ste de ngog gi /mdun gyi cha ni tshe'u gdong yin/ /rgyab ni tshe'u spur shes par bya/ /de'i ltag de ni sgrog mkhar yin/ /de'i yang 'og na yod pa yi/ /tshe'u che zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /
[\[179a.6\]]de'i 'og rmig pa'i mtshams yin la/ /de yi 'og tu rmig pa yin/ /rmig pa'i mtha' ma rmig sgros yin/ /rmig ba'i 'og ni rmig mthil te/ /rmig mthil nang mtha' sbal pa'i mtshams/ /rmig mthil dbus ni sbal pa yin/ /dpung mtha'i mgo na snying yod de/ /
[\[179a.7\]]de yi ngos ni rtsib logs yin/ /rtsib logs 'og tu dku yin la/ /de yi steng ni sga 'dab yin/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni cha dag gi /mtshams ni ro smad yin par bshad/ /rus pa gsum ni 'dus pa yi/ /sum mdo 'jug do yin par bshad/ /mjug do'i 'og tu ong
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]do ste/ /de rjes rnga rtsa yin par bshad/ /de yi ngos gnyis dbyi steng yin/ /dpyi steng 'og ni ri hi ni/ /bar na rnga ma rnga snying bcas/ /de gnyis 'og ni brla dpyi'i mtshams/ /rnga rtsa'i 'og ni rkub yin la/ /de yi ngos gnyis rkub tshos yin/ /de yi 'og ni 'breg
[\[179b.2\]]yin la/ /de dag bar ni mjug srub yin/ /brla yi yang na rlig pa ste/ /rlug pa dang 'brel mtshan yin no/ /de gnyis mdun na rmong kha ste/ /rmong kha snying de'i dbus lte ba/ /dku yang bar na gnas pa yin/ /dku na lte ba'i bar na rgyu/ /rgyab dar dku yi bar ran
[\[179b.3\]]'dra/ /ran 'dra'i 'og ni sdu gu mig /de yi pha rol dpyi yin te/ /de yi 'og na brla yin no/ /de yi yang 'og brla phra mo/ /de yi 'og ni rje rang yin/ /de 'og sre long chig grang yin/ /lhag ma ro stod rjes 'brangs te/ /thams cad nye bar dbye bar bya/ /sha
[\[179b.4\]]li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las bstan pa rnams bshad pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// //rta yi tshe yi rig byed mkhan/ /drang srong mgyogs 'gro'i gnyen gyur pa/ /sha li ho tra dbang thul la/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis yongs dris pa/ /rta yi tshul gyi de nyid
[\[179b.5\]]mkhyen/ /tshad ni rnam pa du ru bshad/ /mi sdug gzhal min gang zhig lags/ /sdug cing gzhal bzod gang zhig lags/ /yan lag nying lag shes pa dang / /grangs nyid kyi ni bye brag rnams/ /bdag cag blo gros zhan pas na/ /legs ldan khyod las
[\[179b.6\]]mnyan par 'tshal/ /de skad smras tshe slob dpon gyur/ /drang srong dam pas slar smras pa/ /ji skad bstan pa 'di mnyan nas/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis bzung bar gyis/ /sgur zhing gdong dang ske pa zhum/ /'khums dang shin tu rgyas drags dang / /'dug dang dbang po
[\[179b.7\]]yul gyi gnas/ /de bzhin brang ni 'phyugs pa dang / /rked pa skrongs bar gyur pa dang / /zhin tu dma' dang shin tu mtho/ /gang zhig lus stod shin tu che/ /de bzhin rgyab ni lhag par dma'/ /lus ni shin tu mi snyug dang / /de bzhin rked pa zhum pa ste/ /mi sdug
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rta ni bcu po 'di/ /gzhal min yin par shes par bya/ /stobs ma nyams shing mdzes pa yi/ /lus ldan rta ni bco lnga pa/ /lus kyi chu zhing legs gnas shing / /gnas kyi cha ni ma 'phyugs pa/ /tshod shes pa yi gzhal bya yin/ /
[\[180a.2\]]gzugs ngan nam yang mig zhal lo/ /ske mgrin lus ni cha mnyam zhing / /rnga snying mgo dang mnyam pa dang / /ong do dang ni brang zheng mnyam/ /pus mo'i tshe'u mnyam pa dang / /dpangs dang zhing gi tshad dang ni/ /legs pa snyoms par gyur ba'i rta/ /de 'dra'i tshad dang ldan
[\[180a.3\]]pa dag /cha mnyam yin par shes par bya/ /rta ni lus kyi cha mnyam pa'i/ /tshad ni rnam gsum mnyan par gyis/ /rta mchog gi ni dpral ba la/ /sor ni bcu gnyis yod par bshad/ /rna ba sor drug yin zhes bya/ /so dag sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /mig ni sor
[\[180a.4\]]gsum shes par bya/ /mche ba'i dbangs ni sor gnyis yin/ /mgo bo sor ni nyi shu brgyad/ /phum phum gnas ni dpangs sor gsum/ /rta mchog gi ni chu ru ni/ /sor brgya rtsa bzhi nyid yin no/ /ske mgrin sor ni sum cu ste/ /ze'u ltag sor ni drug yin la/ /
[\[180a.5\]]rgyab ni sum cur shes par bya/ /or do gdong pa dag dang mnyam/ 'breg ni sor ni bcu yin te/ /'di ni chu yi tshad du bshad/ /rlig pa bil ba bzang po yi/ /tshad tsam yod par shes par bya/ /rta mchog gi ni mtshan dag la/ /sor ni bcu drug yin zhes bya/ /
[\[180a.6\]]phrag so sor ni nyi shu drug /dpung mgo nyid ni sor bcu yin/ /dpung pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /pus mo'i tshigs ni sor drug pa/ /tshe'u spu sor drug yin zhes bya/ /chig grang dkyus su sor bcu drug /tshe'u tshe sor ni drug pa yin/ /rmig pa'ang de dang mnyam pa yin/ /
[\[180a.7\]]rked pa'i dbus kyi zheng gang yin/ /dpangs ni de dang mnyam pa yin/ /tshad ni rta mchog dag gi yin/ /de nas bar ma'i bshad bya ste/ /dpral ba'i tshad ni sor bcu yi/ /gdong pa sor ni nyi shu drug /mig la sor ni phyed dang gsum/ /phum phum gnas kyang de dang
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]'dra/ /so la sor gcig bzhi cha gcig /mche ba sor gcig bzhi cha gsum/ /rna ba'i dpangs su sor lnga ru/ /rta ni bar ma'i yin par bshad/ /ske mgrin nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /bstan bcos rtogs par shes par bya/ rngog mtha' sor ni lnga ru bshad/ /rgyab ni ske mgrin
[\[180b.2\]]dag dang mnyam/ /'breg la sor ni bdun yin te/ /ong do nyi shu rtsa drug yin/ /bar ma 'di yi chu ru ni/ /sor ni dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yin/ /mgo bo sor ni nyi shu drug /'di yi rnga snying de dang mnyam/ /bar ma rlig ba'i tshad dag ni/ /bil pa 'bring po tsam yin no/ /
[\[180b.3\]]bar gyi mtshan gyi tshad dag ni/ /sor ni bcu bzhi yin par bshad/ /dpangs su sor ni bcu dgu dag /'di la bsngags bar gyur pa yin/ /phrag sor sor ni nyi shu lnga/ /dpung mgo sor ni brgyad yin no/ /dpung pa sor ni nyi shu gsum/ /pus mo tshe'u dang mnyam pa
[\[180b.4\]]yin/ /chig grang sor ni bcu bzhi ste/ /tshe'u spu sor ni lnga pa ste/ /tshe'u tshe'ang sor ni lnga pa ste/ /rmig pa'ang de dang 'dra bar bshad/ /rta yi tha ma dag gi tshad/ /dpral ba sor ni brgyad yin te/ /mgo bo sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /mig ni sor gnyis yin shes bya/ /
[\[180b.5\]]phum phum gnas kyang de dang 'dra/ /mche ba sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /so yi dpangs su sor gcig yin/ /rna ba'i dpangs ni sor bzhi ste/ /skra 'gram nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /rngog mtha' sor ni bzhi yin no/ /rgyab ni ske ba nyid dang mnyam/ /'breg gi tshad ni sor bzhi
[\[180b.6\]]ste/ /ong do sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /chu ru sor ni brgyad cu yin/ /mgo bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /rnga snying dag kyang de dang mnyam/ /rlig pa bil ba chung ngu tsam/ /pho mtshan sor ni bcu gnyis yin/ /rta ni tha ma'i dpangs su ni/ /sor ni brgyad cu yin par bshad/ /phrag
[\[180b.7\]]so sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /dpung mgo 'di yi sor drug yin/ /dpung pa sor ni nyi shu gnyis/ /pus mo sor ni bzhi yin la/ /rta ni tha ma'i chig grang gi /dpangs ni sor bcu gnyis yin no/ /tshe'u spu'i gnas ni sor bzhi ste/ /tshe'u tshe'i rmig pa de dang 'dra/ /de ltar
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]chu yi tshad bshad pa/ /chu ni ci bzhin gzhag pa yin/ /ro stod kyi ni dpangs gang yin/ /'og nas rngog mtha'i bar du gzhal/ /ro smad mjug do'i mtshams nas ni/ /'og nas steng du de bzhin gzhal/ /de ltar dpangs su gzhal nas
[\[181a.2\]]ni/ /bstan bcos mkhas pas bya ba yin/ /rnga snying rtsa nas mig zur gyi/ /bar du chur ni gzhal bar bya/ /dpyi steng mjug to dpyi mgul dang / /brla dpyi'i mtshams ni gang yin pa/ /mchog dang bar ma tham la'ang / /phrag so dang ni mnyam pa yin/ /rje ngar daphyi yi
[\[181a.3\]]ba ha las/ /sor gcig gis ni chung bar bshad/ /spu ra pus mo'i tshad las ni/ /sor gcig lhag par shes par bya/ /chig grang la sogs sngar bshad pa/ /phyi rkang gi yang de 'drar ldan/ /nas rgyas kyi ni ltog shibs pa'i/ /zheng ni sor du shes par bya/ /
[\[181a.4\]]la la mthe bo'i tshigs kyi zheng / /sor yin par ni 'chad par byed/ /gzhan dag skyes bu ran pa yi/ /lag sor gyi ni gung mo yi/ /tshigs ni dbus ma'i nang dag la/ /sor min par ni 'dod pa yin/ /rta gzhan gang dag yod pa dag /tshad 'di yis sna gzhal
[\[181a.5\]]bar bya/ /de ltar mchog dang bar ma dang / /tha mar gyur pa'i rtag sum la/ /tshad ni rnam pa gsum dag gis/ /gzhal bar 'di ni bshad pa yin/ /de ltar chu zheng tshad ldan pa'i/ /lus dang ldan pa gang zhig yin/ /lus dang 'tshams par sha rgyas shing / /rkang pa
[\[181a.6\]]sra la mtshan dang ldan/ /yan lag gsal zhing mnyan pa dang / /lus snyoms sha ni mkhregs pa dag /bkra shis dbal skyed dge ba dang / /'dod pa thams cad sbyin byed yin/ /sha yi ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las tshad gzhal ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //
[\[181a.7\]]de nas gzhan yang yan lag bcu'i/ /cha yi le'u bshad par bya/ /dang po'i gnas ni dpral ba yin/ /mthar thug tshad du bshad pa yin/ /gnyis pa dpral ba'i steng gi ni/ /glang ba la ni brten pa yin/ /gsum pa ske 'grin phrag so yi/ /lus kyi phyogs ni yin
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]par bshad/ /nam tshor ze'u'i ltag ze'u/ /dpung mgo bzhin phrag so dang / /sog pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa/ /bzhi pa dag ni yin par 'dod/ /lus kyi ro stod cha mnyam dang / /dpung sna la sogs lnga bo yin/ /snying ga lag 'og rtsib logs dang / /sga 'og dang
[\[181b.2\]]ni rgyab nyid ni/ /rta yi gnas ni drug pa yin/ /sgal tshigs dang ni lto ba dang / /mtshan gyi nye 'khor gang yin dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin rnams/ /gnas ni bdun pa dag tu bshad/ /ong do'i phyogs na gang yod dang / /brlag nyis dang ni bcas pa dag /de
[\[181b.3\]]dag gnas ni brgyad pa yin/ /dpung pa dpung rgyab pus mo dang / /rkub tshos dpyi mgul dpyi mtshams dang / /rje ngar dang ni bcas pa dang / /gnas ni dgu pa yin par 'dod/ /pus mo rje ngar man chad ni/ /gnas ni bcu ba zhes bya'o/ /dge ba'am yang na mi dge
[\[181b.4\]]ba/ /thams cad kyang ni mtshon par bya/ /gnas skabs cha yi 'bras bu dag /de yi rtag tu brjod bya min/ /de bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yi/ /rta yi tshad la sogs pa'ang bshad/ /gnas shes ba yi gnas rnams ni/ /rtogs par byas la'ang 'bras bu brjod/ /
[\[181b.5\]]tshe dang na tshod cha rnams ni/ /gnas las shes par byas te bstan/ /mtshan nyid ldan na 'bras bur bcas/ /go bzlog pa ni 'bras bu med/ /mtshan nyid gnas ni 'khrugs pa las/ /'bras bu khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /mdog dang gzi mdangs snying stobs dri/ /
[\[181b.6\]]ci bzhin dus su 'bras bu ster/ /lus kyi 'gros dang skad dang ni/ /rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin pa yin/ /thig le dang ni gtsug gi ni/ /gnas skabs cha ni 'di las byung / /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las yan lag bcu'i cha dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
[\[181b.7\]]legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ /sha li ho tra la dris pa/ /mi sdug ci ltar shes par gyis/ /ji bzhin sdug pa ji lta bu/ /dman dang de bzhin mi dman dang / /yan lag tshang dang mi tshang dang / /gzhal bya nyid dang gzhal min dang / /gso sla gso dka' ji lta bu/ /
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]de ltar bu yis dris pa dang / /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /so so'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ /de dag khyed la bshad par bya/ /gang yang lus kyi dbyibs legs shing / /rtsa rgyus snang bar mi 'gyur dang / /chu zheng tshad dang ldan pa dang / /sha ni gnas
[\[182a.2\]]dang 'tshams par skye/ /lus snyoms gsum pa chung ba dang / /yid dang mig ni dga' byed pa/ /ro smad mnyam zhing zlum pa dang / mdzes shing dbyibs ni legs gnas dang / yan lag nying lag rdzogs pa dang / /yan lag kun gyi dbyibs legs dang / /nying lag
[\[182a.3\]]rnams ni mi sdug dang / /mgyogs shing mnyam dang ldan pa dang / /des shing stobs dang ldan pa dang / /na tshod gzhon zhing 'gros che dang / /ske mgrin phrag so brang gi phyogs/ /sha rgyas tshad dang ldan la sogs/ /'di dag gzhal bya cha mnyam dang / /gso sla mi sdug
[\[182a.4\]]med pa yin/ /de las bzlog par gyur pa'i rta/ /gzhal bya'i las dag ma yin no/ /de lta'i mi sdug la sogs dang / /ldan pa'i rta ni gang yin pa/ /shing rta lam dang khal dang ni/ /rtsed mo'i gnas dang g.yul dag tu/ /las dang 'tsham pa ma yin pas/ /de phyir
[\[182a.5\]]de ni spang bar bya/ /de phyir bzang po shes byas la/ /de lta'i rta ni blang bar bya/ /de ltar blang 'os blangs nas ni/ /lhag ma spang bya rnam par spang / /tshong pa rnams la rta dag ni/ /bzang po blang bar gyur pa dang / /spris ma bshugs pa'i zho lta bur/ /lhag ma

[\[192a.1\]]mdongs yod bdag po rgyal srid thob/ /bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gi dga' ba 'khyil 'dra ba'i/ /rus sbal rad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra yi/ /mdongs yod bdag po nor mang rnyed/ /gang zhig rgyal mtshan sogs dbyibs 'dra/ /mdongs

[\[196b.1\]]lha yi rta ni de 'dra 'byung / /de yi rgyal po rgyal byed cing / /dgra rnams thul bar byed pa dang / /g.yul du rtag tu shis pa dang / /nor dang bu dang tsha bor ldan/ /gang zhig skyes pa tshun tshad ni/ /rnga rngog skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /bdag po rigs ni brlag byas nas/ /de yi

[\[196b.3\]]bu'am/ /lag sor lta bu'i rwa dag ni/ /sbom po'am yang na phra mo dag /rid dang thung dang rtsub dang ljang / /sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung / /rna rtsa'am skra mtshams tha ma'am/ /dpral pa yang na spyi bo'am/ /de las gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu/ /de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod
[\[196b.4\]]pa/ /gang byung de ni rwa can de/ /bdag po yul 'khor 'jig byed yin/ /yul phyogs gang na rta de yod/ /yul de rlag par 'gyur ba yin/ /des na de ni dgra bo yi/ /yul du bskyal la rjes zhi bya/ /rta ni gang gi kha la ni/ /sha khra yis ni kun du khyab/ /de bzhin rkub dang rlig
[\[196b.5\]]pa dang / /rna ba dag dang mig tu byung / /rta de sha khra can zhes bya/ /mi shis sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /rta bres su ni mig gzhug cing / /bkra shis 'dod pas reg mi bya/ /mig gi nyes pa bshad bya yi/ /khyi mig dom dang byi ba'i mig /sbal mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang / /byi ba
[\[196b.6\]]'ug pa nya mig can/ /phag dang khyu mchog lta bu'i mig /bya rog lug dang khra mig can/ /khra yi mig can smad pa yin/ /mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang / /mig ser ba yang spang bar bya/ /des ni bdag po mi bde zhing / /rigs zad pa yang byed pa yin/ /g.yul du bdag
[\[196b.7\]]po pham dang gsod/ /rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang / /dbyibs kyi 'bras bu nga yis bshad/ /ge sar nag po lta bu yi/ /thig le gang la khyab gyur pa/ /des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis/ /nor zad ge sar lta bu yis/ /'gags
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]na mi shis gyur pa yin/ /rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang / /dmar par gyur na bsngags pa yin/ /shin tu mdar zhing cher khyab la/ /rtsub mo med la'ang 'bras bu che/ /snum chung dmar pa'i sha chung ba/ /'bras bu chung bar shes par bya/ /rkan
[\[197a.2\]]gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang / /so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni/ /mtshan nyid dag nas dang bzhi las brtag /rlig 'bras gcig pa bdag po gsod/ /rlig 'bras gsum pa bu gsod byed/ /rlig 'bras dmar ser nor nyams byed/ /rlig
[\[197a.3\]]'bras shin tu 'phyang ba dang / /g.yul du bdag po gsod par byed/ /rlig pa spu ni che ba'am/ /yang na ser skyar gyur pa'am/ /de bzhin zhu par gyur pa yang / /da yis bdag po gsod byed yin/ /kha dog gzhan dang ldan pa las/ /pus mo gnyis ni nag gyur cing / /
[\[197a.4\]]sre long nag por gyur pa ni/ /bdag po gsod byed shes par bya/ /lus kyi ka dog gnyid las ni/ /rnga ma'i kha dog gzhan gyur pa/ /'bar ba'i rnga ma can zhes bya/ /rta de rtag tu spang bar bya/ /rnga ma'i rtse mo mdog gzhan gyur/ /yul 'khor yang ni rlag par byed/ /rta ni
[\[197a.5\]]mdog dkar gyur pa la/ /nag po cung zad yod mi shis/ /rna ba dang ni rngog ma nas/ /rnga rtse nag por gyur pa ni/ /de ni rna nag yin zhes bya/ /las rnams kun la shis pa yin/ /g.yul dang lam zhugs kha la bkal ba/ rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin/ /rngam
[\[197a.6\]]'bar bzhes bya dang / /rnga rtse nag pa ma gtogs pa/ /rta ni kha dog nag pa la/ /dkar po cung zad yod pa shis/ /lham bu chu shel mdog 'dra zhing / /gang gi mgo ni dkar gyur pa/ /rta de dpal yon can zhes bya/ /rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin/ sha li ho
[\[197a.7\]]tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'dres pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //kha ba can gyi ri bo'i mchog /'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /shin tu mtho zhing rtse mo che/ /kun nas rlung ni mi ldang zhing / /rtse mo kha bas rnam par g.yogs/ /mi'am ci yi glu
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sgras khyab/ /bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing / /ri dgas sna tshogs rnams kyis 'dzes/ /sna tshogs shing gis kun du khyab/ /mkha' la rgyu ba rtag tu dga'/ /rig 'dzin chogs ni legs gnas shing / /dri za'i tshogs kyis bsten par ni/ /sha li ho tra legs
[\[197b.2\]]gnas la/ /legs thos kyis ni yang dris pas/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /drang srong chen pos bdag la gsungs/ /rgyal po'i rta ni ci lta bu/ /de yi nges pa bdag la gsungs/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang / /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /yon tan skyon
[\[197b.3\]]dag rgyal po la/ /'jig rten 'byung ba ci 'dra bar/ /de ltar tha ma mi rnams la/ /'byung mi 'byung bar gzhung las bshad/ /de bas rgyal po'i bzhon pa yi/ /mtshan nyid 'bad pas brtag par bya/ /ci nas nyes pa mi 'byung bar/ /rnam pa kun du bya ba yin/ /tshad dang stobs dang
[\[197b.4\]]snying stobs gzi/ /stobs dang lus kyi me drod ldan/ /gtsug 'khyil bzang zhing mdangs rab snang / /'gros na phun sum tshogs pa dang / /skal bzang dri ni zhim pa dang / /de bzhin skye gnas bzang ba dang / /rig ldan dang tshul phun sum tshogs/ /dul zhing mthong na dga' ba dang / /
[\[197b.5\]]bad kan rang bzhin can mchog dang / /de bzhin bzang po'i skye gnas dang / /smad ba'i mtshan nyid med gyur cing / /kun nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan nyid bzang po phun tshogs pa/ /rab tu 'bad de brtag par bya/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /rgyal po'i
[\[197b.6\]]rta zhes bya bar bshad/ /gang zhig gzhan kun med pa yi/ /brtan pa'i gtsug ni bcud dang ldan/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /ma li ka dang 'dra ba'i mig /mdog snum rab tu dkar ba'i rta/ /zla ba'i lha dang ldan pa yin/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /sa steng
[\[197b.7\]]dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /ne tsho mdog can nyi ma'i rta/ /rgyal po'i g.yul ngor zhon na ni/ /de yi don rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sa yang dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i mdog dmar rta/ /rnam thos sras kyi lha can te/ /de la bzhon nas rnams ni/ /ma
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]lus dbang byed the tshom med/ /sngo bsangs lha dbang rta yin te/ /mdangs snum ldan la rgyal po ni/ /zhon na sa ni ma lus las/ /rtag tu rgyal bar nges pa yin/ /gnag cing 'tsher ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /rta mchog de ni chu lha'i yin/ /de la zhon na rgyal
[\[198a.2\]]po ni/ /myur du nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur/ /mdog dkar rna ba sngo ba dang / /rngog ma dang ni rnga ma gnag /chu lha'i rta ni gnyis pa ste/ /de rnyed pa ni ma lus 'thob/ /lham bu chu shel ltar snang ba/ /rta ni nor lha'i yin par bshad/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /myur du nor mang
[\[198a.3\]]bdag por 'gyur/ /ba so'i mdog 'dra rdam gnag /kun nas mdangs ni snum dang ldan/ /chos kyi lda nges se zhon na/ /rgyal po mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur/ /lung tang snum po dang 'dra ba/ /rta mchog de ni gshin rje'i yin/ /rgyal po de la zhon gyur na/ /myur du dgra kun
[\[198a.4\]]las rgyal 'gyur/ /rma bya'i mdangs dang 'dra ba yi/ /ri mos khyab par gyur pa'i rta/ /sna tshogs lha'i yin te zhon na/ /'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin ma rgad bcag pa yi/ /mdog ltar shin tu dmar pa'i rta/ /khyab 'jug rta ste de zhon na/ /myur du sa ni
[\[198a.5\]]dbang byed 'gyur/ /de bzhin gser dang 'dra ba la/ /'tsher bas rnam par brgyan gyur pa/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rta zhon na/ /dgra rnams dbang du 'gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin shel dang 'dra ba ru/ /dang zhing mdangs bcas lus yod pa/ /rnyed na mchod sbyin dam pa yi/ /skal
[\[198a.6\]]brnyed par 'gyur pa yin/ /gang zhig nag la mgo bo dang / /rkang pa bzhin ni dkar gyur pa/ /shes ldan rta de rnyed na ni/ /nad kyis zil gnon mi 'gyur ro/ /lham bu chu shel 'dra ba la/ /sngar zhing yan lag lnga dkar ba/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams
[\[198a.7\]]cad thob/ /lus kyis mdog ni gzhan 'dra zhing / /mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa li/ /tha skar bu yi rta rnyed na/ /rta ni mang bo rnyed par 'gyur/ /dkar dang gnag pa'i tshul gyis khra/ /g.yas logs dkar ba'i shas che la/ /g.yon pa khru bor gyur pa li/ /rta ni khra bor rnyed
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]gyur na/ /rta de'i lha ni ngan sbong ste/ /'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub yin/ /lham bu chu shel 'dra'i mdog la/ /ne tsho'i mdog 'dra'i 'khor ling can/ /drag po'i rta de rnyed na ni/ /'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi rgyal ba'i rta/ /rgyal po yi ni rtag tu bya/ /
[\[198b.2\]]de yi gnas ni rta gzhan dag /gang dang yang ni gcig mi bya/ /ngo mtshar mdog dang ldan pa'i rta/ /dmod pas sa steng skyes pa yin/ /dri za'i bur ni shes gyis la/ /rab tu 'bad de bsnyen bkur bya/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rgyal po'i bzhon pa'i rta'i mtshan
[\[198b.3\]]nyid brtags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rta yi mig gi mtshan nyid do/ /gang zhig baiDUr+ya 'dra'i mdog /de bzhin shel gyi mdog 'dra dang / /phug ron gyi ni mig 'dra dang / /ka la ping+ga'i mig 'dra dang / /glang chen
[\[198b.4\]]rma bya rnga mo dang / /sreg pa'i mig dang 'dra ba dang / /gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba nyid/ /de yi mig ni shis pa yin/ /skyon med pa yi chig la ni/ /rdzi ma phra mos khyab pa dang / /mig 'bras legs shing ma snang la/ /thur du bltas par ma gyur pa/ /mdog ni bzang po
[\[198b.5\]]dang ldan zhing / /mig gi mdangs dang ldan pa'i rta/ /de ni g.yul las rgyal byed pa'i/ /rgyal ba yi ni bzhon par 'gyur/ /yangs shing snum la mnyam pa dang / /me tog ma li ka 'dra dang / /tham ring mo yong gyur cing / /dbus na yongs su mdzes pa dag /rta de ma
[\[198b.6\]]li ka'i mig can/ /mig zur cung zad gnag pa yin/ /de yis mdza' bo 'phel 'gyur zhing / /rta dang mdzod kyang rgyas par 'gyur/ /dkar ba'am mdog rjes dkar gyur la/ /mig la skyon med mthong mig nag /rdzi ma mig dkyus nag gyur ba/ /gang la yod pa
[\[198b.7\]]der nor skyed/ /mig ni shel du 'dra ba la/ /rgyal mo'i rtsa ba gnag gyur cing / /mig gi rgyal mo rdul med pas/ /de ni shel mig can zhes bya/ /mig dang lus kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /mig gi mdog can zhes bya dge /kha dog lus dang tha dad kyang / /gang gi mig
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]ni bzang gyur cing / /mi sdug pa dang ma tshang med/ /de ni mig bzang nor 'phel byed/ /kha dog lus dang tha dad cing / /smad par bya pa'i mig yod pa/ /mig ngan pa yi rta gang yin/ /las rnams kun la smad pa yin/ /de bas dbyibs
[\[199a.2\]]dang tshad ldan zhing / /dpe dang legs bar 'dra ba dang / /rdzi ma'i kha dog snum pa yi/ /mig gang yin pa de bsngags so/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las mig brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //bsgrub dang grub ba'i rig 'dzin gtso/ /drang srong
[\[199a.3\]]gzi brjid chen po la/ /yon tan nges kyis yongs dris pa/ /rta so'i rig byed mkhyen lags sam/ /de skad dris tshe drang srong mchog /sha li ho tra'i slang smras ba/ /rta so'i rig byed shes lags so/ /bu khyod kyis ni nyan par gyis/ /mdun so thams cad thags
[\[199a.4\]]bzang snyoms/ /sra zhing mtshan ma rab tu gsal/ /snum pa'am sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rta yi so ni bsngags pa yin/ /mche ba so dang mdog 'dra dang / /'gram so rnams kyang de dang 'dra/ /so rnams gting rid srab pa dang / /ri mo phra zhing shin tu 'jam/ /gos

[\[199a.6\]]bzhin so ni ma tshang ba/ /bdag po chung mar bcas brlag /so yis kha ni khengs gyur ba/ /rigs rlag byed pas spang bar byed/ /so rtsa so dang bcas pa ni/ /mi shis pa yi gzugs ldan zhing / /log las byung bar gyur ba dag /gtsigs pa de ni rigs rlag byed/ /
[\[199a.7\]]rta yi so ni gnag gyur ba/ /bdag po'i nor ni rlag byed yin/ /mtho dman khyer dang sbom phra khyer/ /de bzhin phred ni rnam par sbangs/ /mi mnyam med ces bya so de/ /bdag po'i bu ni gsod byed yin/ /rtse mo nang du grub pa yi/ /so ni nor rnams 'jig byed yin/ /
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]thams cad dbyung ba'i chag pa'am/ /gang zhig so ni sngon du 'dus/ /de ni shin tu nyes chen skyed/ /mdog dang dbyibs ni nya phyis 'dra/ /so de nya phyis can zhes bya/ /nya phyis so can rta yis ni/ /zas dang sgom la gnod pa skyed/ /'og so shin tu gyis gyur na/ /bdag
[\[199b.2\]]po ltogs ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung / /ya so shin tu gyis gyur na/ /bdag po dgra las pham par 'gyur/ /zur gsum rtse mo rno ba'i so/ /sga dang nor ni 'phrog byed yin/ /sa dang bcas par skyes gyur na/ /de ni thams cad zad byed yin/ /de dag las no go bzlog
[\[199b.3\]]pa'i/ /so bzang 'bras bu shis pa yin/ /mche ba dang ni 'gram so yi/ /'bras bu de bzhin shes par gyis/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las so brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //me dang nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /dka' thub can de sdig pa
[\[199b.4\]]med/ /thub mchog sha li ho tral/ /mja' las rgyal gyis yang dris pa/ /brtan pa'i gtsug ni dur shes bya/ /glo bur bas ni du zhig yin/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po yis/ /gtsug rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni/ /gang du ji ltar gnas pa yin/ /gtsug rnams
[\[199b.5\]]kyi ni dbyibs gyur pa/ /rnam pa dur ni 'gyur ba gsungs/ /gtsug gi tshad ni ji tsam zhig /shes dang smad pa'i grangs ni du/ /thams cad gnas las 'phro ba dang / /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dang / /stabs pa dang ni sman pa yi/ /'bras bu 'od zer ci ltar
[\[199b.6\]]'gyur/ /gzhan yang lus kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /brtan dang mi brtan ji lta bu/ /lus las skyes pa'i gnas rnams ni/ /gnas kyi gang zhig gnas skabs dang / /rkan gyi kha dog bye brag gi /glo bur byung ba'i 'bras bu dang / /srab dang mthug pa'i spu rnams ni/ /
[\[199b.7\]]gtsug la ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /de skang thub mchog 'dris tshe/ /sha li ho tras khu la smras/ /'di na brtan dang mi brtan dang / /yan lag rnam pa brgyad yin la/ /'bras bu 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mtshan nyid rab tu shes par bya/ /shis dang rma bya'i mtshan
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]nyid ni/ /thams cad lus la brten pa yin/ /lus las 'byung bar gyur pa ni/ /lus dang yan lag rnam pa gnyis/ /dge ba'i gnas su shis pa'i gtsug /rgya che ba yi 'bras bu ster/ /mi shis gnas ni ngan pa 'byung / /shin tu mi shis skal
[\[200a.2\]]chen 'gyur/ /tshad dang ldan zhing gsal bar byung / /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i 'bas bu che/ /tshad mi ldan zhing mi gsal ba/ /de'i 'dras bu chung bar 'dod/ /gnas dang dbyibs kyi bye breg las/ /mtshan nyid 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /sor gnyis las lhag nya phyis
[\[200a.3\]]te/ /sor gnyis pa ni lhag ces bya/ /shing lham 'dra dang rkang brgya pa/ /sor ni phyed dang gnyis pa yin/ /shing lham phyed ni nas drug zhing / /'dres pa sor ni brgyad pa yin/ /de yi cha gsum phri ba ni/ /'khyil ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ bzhi cha pri par gyur pa ni/

[\[200a.6\]]rkub lhag gnyis gnyis te/ /bcu po de dag ldan par bshad/ /kun nas rdzogs shing shin tu gsal/ /gtsug ni g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / /chung ba ma yin che ba min/ /gser ltar mdangs snum 'od dang bcas/ /dbyibs ni legs par skyes pa dag /las rnams
[\[200a.7\]]thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas/ /drang srol de la slar smras pa/ /ji ltar bcu po nyid ldan gyi/ /gzhan dag de ltar ma yin bshad/ /rta rnams skyes zin gyur nas ni/ /gtsug de nam yang mi skye la/ /skyes pa 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gnas las 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes tshe lhan cig skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad bstan pa yin/ /legs thos tshig ni thos ba dang / /de rjes drang srong gis smras pa/ /ji ltar phyogs der skyes gyur pa/ /de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa/ /pha mang yod dang med gyur kyang / /cig
[\[200b.2\]]shos la ni dbang ba yin/ /phal cher gnas bcu dbang gyur gyi/ /de ltar gzhan du mi snang ngo / /de bas bcu po bstan par bya/ /des pa nyid du zung bar gyis/ /'di dag la med nges 'byung ba/ /gzhan dag de ltar min par bshad/ /brtan dang ma brtan gang yin kyang / /'bras
[\[200b.3\]]bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /gnas ni dgu bcu rtsa drug yin/ /dbyibs ni rgyal po nyid yin no/ /'dres dag kha 'bus 'khyil ba dang / /rkang pa brgya dang lhag pa dang / /shing lha ma dang 'dra shing lha ma phyed/ /nya phyis 'dra ste rnam pa brgyad/ /smad pa'am de sngags pa'i gnas

[\[200b.5\]]gtsug 'khyil de ni 'dres pa'am/ /'dus pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /spu ni 'gro tshe me tog dag /kha 'bus ltar snang lhag pa yin/ /zlum po'am yang na zur bzhi ni/ /shing lham dbyibs 'dra shing lham can/ /brad ba'am yang na rting
[\[200b.6\]]pa'i gnas/ /byed 'dra shing lham phyed pa yin/ /me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra ba/ /de ni rkang brgyad bar shes bya/ /dbyibs las mi mthun gyur pa ni/ /gzhan dag kyang ni snang mod kyi/ /de ni spu yi 'gyur ba yin/ /gnas las shis dang mi shis 'gyur/ /gtsug kyang

[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pa'am/ /smad pa'i gnas su g.yas 'khyil dang / /bsngags pa'i gnas su g.yon 'khyil ba/ /mtshan nyid ngan pa yin zhes bya/ /des ni tshe thung skyed par byed/ /gtsug gi gnas ni dgu bcu drug /yod pa bshad pa de rnams ni/ /shis dang smad bar
[\[201a.2\]]bya ba ste/ /rnam pa gnyis su bsdu bar bya/ /de las gzhan ni nyi shu zhig /shis pa yin par shes par bya/ /bdun cu rtsa drug smad bya ste/ /de ltar dgu bcu rtsa drug yin/ /kha 'gram la gnyis dbral bar bzhi/ /dpral mtshams la gcig kho na yin/ /rna rtsar
[\[201a.3\]]gnyis te lkog mar gcig /mgo po'i mthar ni gnyis yin la/ /brang du gsum ste dpung par gnyis/ /mid pa gcig ste de bzhin du/ /rgyu dang long bu gnyis gnyis su/ /gtsug ni 'byung bar shes par bya/ /de ltar shis par gyur pa'i gnas/ /nyi shu yin
[\[201a.4\]]par rnam par bshad/ /gtsug ni 'di rnams gnyis la ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun grangs su 'gyur/ /mur 'gram mur gong mchi stan dang / /mkhur tshos sna phor smin ma dang / /rna rtsa lce'u ldang rtsi'u chung dang / /mchan khur dku dang 'gram sre long / sna rtse pus mo

[\[201a.6\]]'og ste/ /de ltar gnas ni de dag tu/ /gtsug ni bcu gsum 'byung ba yin/ /tshe'u spu de bzhin tshigs grangs dang / /tshe'u tshe gcig phra mo yi/ /gnas ni bcu drug 'di dag tu/ /gtsug kyang bcu drug nyid yin no/ /an dang ru dang ske ba'i rtsa/ /rmang kha rnga mar gnas
