[\[210a.7\]]dang / /rgyab ngan bzhon bar mi bde dang / /goms stengs 'jog nyes bul bas 'gro/ /de ni yongs su spang par bya/ /dbugs rgod slar bsdu dka' ba dang / /lam ni thung ngus rtag tu dub/ /snying stobs chung ste rta mkhan gyis/ /dgra yi bsam pa 'grub de spang / /rta gang mgo bo
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'degs pa dang / /rmig pa mtho bar 'degs pa dang / /bdag po dga' bar 'gro byed pa/ /'gros de mchog ni yin par bshad/ /mgyogs shugs mda' ltar rgyug byed cing / /lus kun dub pa med pa dang / /sdud cing ring du snyob byed pa/ /'gros de mchog ni yin par
[\[210b.2\]]bshad/ /rkang 'jog lhag chad mi snyoms shing / /de bzhin myur ches bul ches pa/ /shin tu 'dus dang shin tu skye/ /'gros kyi nyes pa 'di drug yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'gros kyi bzang ngan shes par bya ba ste le'u sum cu so gcig pa'o// //sha li ho
[\[210b.3\]]tra yid gzhungs pas/ /tshangs pa me yi rgal 'dra la/ /lus kyi 'phel ba'i bya ba ni/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis yang dris pa/ /thog ma tha ma bar mar ni/ /lus 'phel bar ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'gros dang 'gros gzhan bcas par ni/ /'di dag shes par 'tshal lags so/ /
[\[210b.4\]]rta ni ji ltar rgyu ba dang / /rten du ji ltar gyur pa dag /'di dag shes par 'tshal lags so/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang / /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /'di na nam mkha' sa dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams snang gi /sems zhes bya ba drug pa dang 'dres pa rgod ma'i mngal du zhugs shing
[\[210b.5\]]gcig tu 'gyur ba lus su 'brel pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dus yongs su smin cing tshor ba na/ /mngal gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i tshul gyis skye zhing 'byung ba na/ sha ma'i dri mas lus la gos shing / lus dang sems nyon mongs pa las lus bde bar gnas pa
[\[210b.6\]]na grang ba dang tsha ba dang phrad pa'i tshor ba bde sdug bdag nyid kyis mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyu gang gis 'byung ba chen po lnga dang nang gi bdag nyid drug po phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa ste/ sa bon dang 'bras bu'i tshul du nyams pa med par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rta de de ltar byung
[\[210b.7\]]ba na shing ltar rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur zhing yon tan du ma dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sred pa'i dbang gis dang po yul la 'jug par zhus pa dang / rlung 'thor bas dbus na phan tshun du khyab pa na/ lus kyi 'gros dang gom pa'i shugs rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]'gros gang dang gang gis dang por ma'i rjes su 'brang zhing zas 'dod par gyur pa de ni lus 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin dug gcig bu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gros kyis 'gro bar byed pa dang / rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa na yang / lus dang rjes su mthun pa'i stobs dang /
[\[211a.2\]]'gros dang / rgyug pa dang / rtse ba dang / mchong ba dang / dkyu ba dang / 'gros dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de ni dang po gcig tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'breng ba zhes bya'o/ /de la rkang pa 'jog ba'i 'gros ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste spo zhing 'gro ba dang / bzhag pa mnyam pas rjes su 'gro ba
[\[211a.3\]]dang / /gzhogs dud cing 'gro ba dang / spyod pa gcig gis rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /de dag ni rang bzhin gang yin pa de nye bar bshad par bya'o/ /snga ma gnyis dang phyi ma gnyis/ /rkang ba mnyam par 'gro byed cing / /rang gi lus ni spo ba dag /de ni spo ba'i 'gros yin no/ /rtsib logs
[\[211a.4\]]gnyis ni mnyam gnas shing / /res kyis nye bar gnas byed la/ /rim gyis rlig pa nye bar 'degs/ /de ni gzhogs mnyam 'gro ba yin/ /mig sprug 'khrul pa med par ni/ /lus ni dad cing rgyu byed la/ /spyod pa gcig gis mi 'gro ba/ /gzhogs dus 'gros ni de yin
[\[211a.5\]]no/ /gang zhig yan lag res mos kyis/ /'jog cing 'degs par byed pa dang / /rkang pa gsum ni shas cher bdegs/ /rta ni spyod pa gcig 'gros yin/ /de bzhin du ri dgas dang / /ma he dang / byi la dang / khyi dang / dom dang / stag dang / ne'u le dang / glang po che dang / khyu
[\[211a.6\]]mchog dang / rnga mo dang / dre'u dang / bong bu dang / ra dang / lug dang / e ne ya dang / sa la dang / sbyang ku dang / gzhan yang de lta bu'i rnam pa dag kyang lus mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i dbye ba'i tshad kyis rkang bzhi ba rnams kyi lus 'phel ba'i rnam par dbye ba bshad pa yin no/ /
[\[211a.7\]]sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las lus 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bu ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o// //thub mchog sha li ho tra'am/ /legs thos kyis ni yang dris pa/ /legs ldan rgyug pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mnyan pa ru ni 'tshal lags so/ /'dir ni skyon gang yon tan gang /
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]'di rnams rnam pa du ru grags/ /mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa dag /'di dag thams cad shes par 'tshal/ /de skad smras tshe drang srong mchog /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /khyed kyi yid la gang gnas pa/ /de ni bshad kyis mnyan bar gyis/ /rgyug pa med bar rta rnams ni/ /rtsig
[\[211b.2\]]pa shing 'dra bems po yin/ /rgyal po'i ste tshoms gsum po ni/ /sgrub la de ni gtso bo yin/ /de bas rgyug pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bzhi bcu dag tu shes par bya/ /dang por gtang ba'i don du ni/ /nyes pa nyi shu lnga shes bya/ /yang dag gzhag par bya ba yi/ /yon tan bco lnga nyid du
[\[211b.3\]]bshad/ /de lta bu yi rgyug pa ni/ /zlum po dag tu nye bar sbyar/ /rang bzhin legs par shes bya ste/ /gzhan du de ni don med 'gyur/ /brdeg na lan byed dang po ste/ /rdeg byed gzhan la dogs pa dang / /ske ba gcu dang rnga ma bskyod/ /mi sbug lta zheng 'bru tshugs lta/ /mgo mdud
[\[211b.4\]]rna ba mi mnyam dang / /sdigs dang rdeg par gyur na yang / /mgo ni mi brtan gyur ba dang / /'du shes mi gsal de las gzhan/ /dbyig pa la sdangs rko byed dang / /so ni sgra dang bcas par 'cha'/ /gom pa dud dang 'khyor ba dang / /bcing dang khro ba de las gzhan/ /gzhan yang
[\[211b.5\]]bcings pas rmongs pa dang / /ske skyod brtan par mi gnas dang / /dogs bcas yan lag 'khyor pa dang / /yan lag rengs dang yan lag chung / /lus ni brtan par mi gnas dang / /de bzhin gom pa mi brtan dang / /dbyibs mi mnyam dang dbyibs mi sdug /'di dag rta ni
[\[211b.6\]]ngan par bshad/ /'di dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /bshad pa nga las bzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig rdeg na slar rdeg pa/ /rdeg na lan byed yin shes bya/ /gang zhig rdeg par byed pa la/ /dogs 'dod 'dog pa can zhes bya/ /ske ba rang dag 'jog pa ni/ /ske gcu rta yi tha ma
[\[211b.7\]]yin/ /rnga ma brkyang dang sprug byed cing / /yang yang bskyod pa rnga sprugs yin/ /rtag tu rdeg par 'dod pa ni/ /mi sdug rta zhes de bshad do/ /gang zhig bslabs kyang cung zad tsam/ /mi stong sems kyis stong par 'dug /de ni blta bar sdug pa ste/ /des na 'bru chugs lta zhes bshad/ /
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gang zhig rtag tu sa la blta/ /mgo dud pa ni yin zhes bya/ /brdegs sam gzhus bar gyur pa na/ /khros pas rna ba 'chol bar 'jog /de ni rna ba mi mnyam yin/ /rang bzhin gyis yod ma gtogs so/ /gang zhig spyi po rtag tu bskyod/ /de na mgo mi brtan zhes bya/ /
[\[212a.2\]]gang zhig rta ni mi dran pa/ /de ni 'du shes mi gsal yin/ /lcag la sogs pa gcig gis kyang / /gnod med dbyig pa la'ang sngangs yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyis sa rkob/ /de ni rko byed zhes bshad do/ /khro bas so ni 'cha' byed pa/ /so sgra 'cha' zhes bya bar bshad/ /
[\[212a.3\]]rta gang 'dul bar byed pa yi/ /rjes su cung zad mi 'jug cing / /gom pa la lar sdud pa dang / /la lar yang ni 'khyor byed pa/ /mi mnyam ba yi 'gros can te/ /gom pa sdud cing 'khyor ba yin/ ro stod ro smad gdong ba'am/ /yid na lus kyi bar dag tu/ /gang zhig bcings na
[\[212a.4\]]myur du 'khrug /bcings na khro ba'i rta ru 'dod/ /gang zhig thag pas bcings na ni/ /bcings pas blo gros rmongs gyur yin/ /ro smad kyi ni lus byed 'gul/ /bskyod pas rked pa skyod byed yin/ /'dis ni bdag la rdeg snyom ste/ /'dul sbyong mkhan la sngar rdeg byed/ /de ni
[\[212a.5\]]dogs pa can zhes bya/ /ra ro ba ltar yan lag kun/ /phan tshun 'chol bar 'gro byed pa'am/ /gzer bcas lta bu byed pa'i rta/ /de ni yan lag 'khyor zhes bya/ /yan lag kyang ni 'khyor byed cing / /yang dang yang du rengs pa dag /de ni yan lag rengs yin pa'am/ /
[\[212a.6\]]yang na rtag tu lus mi 'gyur/ /gang gi yan lag rab sra zhing / /brdeg kyang tshor ba med pa dang / /dga' bas bya ba la 'jug pa/ /yan lag rtsub par de bshad do/ /gang gi lus kyi dbyibs dag ni/ /tshul gcig du ni mi mngon zhing / /lus kyang spugs par byed gyur pa/ /de
[\[212a.7\]]ni brtan mi gnas zhes bya/ /rta gang dang por gzhan du 'gro/ /de yi rjes la'ang gzhan 'gro ba/ /'gros ni gtan nas med pa'i phyir/ /de ni gom mi brtan zhes bya/ /gang zhig lus ni 'dzum pa'am/ /gang zhig lus ni mi mnyam pa/ /de ni dbyibs mi mnyam zhes bya/ /lam du 'jug
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]byed 'os ma yin/ /rgyab ni shin tu ring gyur cing / /lus ni rnga mo dang 'dra ba/ /dbyibs mi sdug par shes bya ste/ bslab dang mdzes pa med pa yin/ /'di dag skyon can yin pas na/ /mkhas pas skyon ni shes par bya/ /da ni yod tan bstan pa yi/ /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad
[\[212b.2\]]bya ste/ /rna ba mjug ma rgal tshigs rnams/ /yon tan che zhing yid gzhungs las/ /yid gzhungs sems ni de nyid la/ /nges par sbyor ba nyid yin no/ /lus la yengs ba med nyid dang / /yon tan kun dang ldan pa dag /yengs ma dag dang bral ba nyid/ /ma yengs zhes bya gnyis
[\[212b.3\]]pa yin/ /ro stod mchog tu thel ka che/ /shugs kyis yongs su rgyug byed cing / /lte bar lta bar byed pa 'di/ /yon tan gsum par shes par bya/ /mkha' la 'gro ba ltar byed cing / /rgyug pa la ni mdog dga' la/ /bar 'tshams med po ltar rgyug pa/ /yon tan chen po

[\[212b.5\]]pa yin/ /gang zhig dang por zhon pa na/ /drang por gzhu 'dom brgyar 'gro zhing / /shugs kyis myur du rgyug byed pa/ /yon tan de ni bdun par bshad/ /rkang pa 'dor ba mkha' la ni/ /'gro bar mang du snang byed cing / /sa yi cha ni cung zad snang / /yon tan de ni brgyad par 'dod/ /
[\[212b.6\]]rta ni gang zhig yan lag la/ /reg pa tsam gyis rgyug byed cing / /bskul ba tsam gyis sems shes pa/ /yon tan dam pa dgu pa yin/ /gang gi dang ni tshad ldan par/ /mdzes par byugs na'ang snang gyur 'dra/ /srab ni legs par 'tsho gyur pa/ /de ni bzhin bzangs
[\[212b.7\]]yin zhes bya/ /ma 'tshol bar ni 'gro byed cing / /mkha' la 'gro ba ltar snang ba/ /mtshan nyin gang yin ma zhen pa/ /de ni yon tan bcu gcig pa/ /bya ba la bskul tshe na ni/ /myur du ldang zhing 'jug byed la/ /tshig gis myur du go byed pa/ /yon tan mchog ste bcu
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gnyis pa/ /nga rgyal med par ldang byed cing / /'bad pa med par ldog pa dang / /yon tan gang gi yon tan dang / /ldan zhes bcu gsum pa yin no/ /'phangs mkhan bya ba dag gis ni/ /mnga' yis bsnun par gyur na yang / /zhum pa med par 'gro byed pa/ /yon
[\[213a.2\]]tan bcu bzhi pa yin no/ /yon tan gang gi shugs kyis ni/ /bya dang 'dra bar 'gro byed cing / /shugs kyi rgyun gyis rgyug byed pa/ /yon tan 'di ni bco lnga pa'o/ /de ltar yon tan yang dag bshad/ /mtshan nyid cung zad ldan pa'ang rung / /yon tan 'di dag yang dag
[\[213a.3\]]ldan/ /rta mchog gang zhig thog mthar ni/ /yon tan rtag tu mi 'gyur zhing / /legs par rgyug pa byed pa yi/ /rta de rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /khyed la rgyug pa de ltar bshad/ /gzhan dag dris pa ci zhig bya/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rgyug pa brtag pa'i le'u ste
[\[213a.4\]]sum cu so gsum pa'o// //legs ldan gra ma can zhes pa/ /'di ni gang zhig rgyu gang lags/ /mtshan nyid gang gis de shes bya/ /de yi gso ba ji lta bu/ /de ltar bu yis dris pa na/ /sha li ho tra drang srong ches/ /don gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig /gra ma can mtshan
[\[213a.5\]]nyid 'di smras/ /gra ma rtser byar 'os pa ste/ /de na ngo tsha 'jig sogs yin/ /de rnams gang zhig byed pa ni/ /gra ma can zhes de bshad do/ /de bas 'jigs med tshul ngan dang / /brtse med rtsub cing mi srun ba/ /'bras bu'i gra ma dang 'dra ba'i/ /nyes ba 'dzin pas de skad
[\[213a.6\]]bshad/ /de bas nyes pa 'di ldan pa'i/ /rta yang gra ma can zhes bya/ /rta gang gtum zhing mi srun pa/ /khro bar gyur pa gang zhig yin/ /de kun gra ma can yin te/ /de ni rang dbang 'gyur ma yin/ /chas na 'khrug cing rdzas mthong skrag /'gyur zhing mi srun byed pa dang / /zhon
[\[213a.7\]]du mi btub pa dang ni/ /zhon nas 'phag par byed pa dang / /'khrug cing ring nas sos 'debs la/ /za zhing ltung bar byed ba dang / /lcag gis gzhus kyang 'dug byed cing / /'phra ba yang dang yang du brdeg /'dul sbyong mkhan yang skyur byed yin/ /'gre ba lta bur byed pa dang / /

[\[213b.1\]]khal ni legs par bkal gyur kyang / /sa gzhir skyur bar byed pa dang / /'dul sbyong mkhan la gnod bya'i phyir/ /mgal me bskor ba lta bur 'khor/ /rgyab ni glang po ltar bskyur zhing / /yang dang yang du sprugs pa dang / /so dang lag yab dag gis 'debs/ /shing yang
[\[213b.2\]]ltung bar byed pa dang / /g.yang du yang yang skyur byed de/ /bgrod bya las ni gzhan du rgyug /dogs pa med par ldog pa dang / /lan 'gas gzhan du'ang 'gro bar byed/ /ra dang ri dgas ltar mchong zhing / /bar bar du ni 'dul byed skyur/ /chu ngogs shing dang khron pa dang / /
[\[213b.3\]]grogs srol du yang rgyug cing 'byor/ /rta khyu'i nang na mi 'dug cing / /dpung gzhan gyi ni nang du'ang 'gro/ /bar tu 'bad pas kha bsgyur yang / /zlog par nus ba ma yin la/ /rta bres las ni mi 'byung zhing / /byung dang 'jug tu mi 'dod la/ /srog 'phrog las ni gang dang
[\[213b.4\]]gang / /yid du mi 'ong las gang yin/ /de dag lhag par byed 'gyur zhing / /brdungs kyang phan pa med pa ni/ /de ni gra ma can zhes bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid 'di nyon cig /khur tshad khur ni yo ba dang / /kha dang pho mtshan yo ba dang / /rta gang 'phral ba mgos 'dra dang / /rlig
[\[213b.5\]]pa shin tu 'phyang ba dang / /ri mo chen po yod pa dang / /ya mchu na gcing rkan yang nag /gang zhig mchu ltag zhom pa dang / /ser skya dmar ser mdog can dang / /gang gi mche ba mi mnyam zhing / /gdong la gnyer ma yod pa dang / /mig nag ser ba nyid dang ni/ /mig sbom
[\[213b.6\]]khra yi mig 'dra dang / /bya rgod mig 'dra ma khur tshos chung / /gang gi ya mchu thung ba dang / /mgo bo rna ba rab tu che/ /'gram pa yang ni zhum pa dang / /sbal pa byi la'i mig 'dra zhing / /ri bong mdog 'dra mdangs rtsub dang / /rlig pa gcig ni dkar ba'am/ /yang na rlig pa
[\[213b.7\]]gsum dkar la/ /bshad pa'i mdog 'dra du ba'i mdog /phrag so la ni gnyer ma chags/ /'di dag dang ni gzhan mang ngo / /mtshan ldan gra ma can du 'dod/ /de bas 'di dang rigs can rta/ /gnas dang slob sbyong bya ba dang / /de bzhin rgyug pa'i bya ba rnams/ /rte'u
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]nas brtsam pa so sor bya/ /bya ba'i khyad par gzhan yang ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/ /rlung med gnas na rab dben pa/ /spyod yul bde bar gzhag bar bya/ /de rjes reg na bzos gyur la/ /de nas bya ba gzhan dag bya/ /bdag po ras dang skom bcas
[\[214a.2\]]dang / /sman rnams cho ga ci bzhin bya/ /gan+d+ha b+ha dra pu shel tse/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog ni/ /'o mar bcas dang ka lang tha/ /bskol ba der ni til thal ba/ /ko ke lak+Sha swa rdzi ka'i/ /thal ba dang ni bcas par gzhug /bskol ba dang ba dang bcas par/ /nyi ma bdun gyi bar du
[\[214a.3\]]gzhag/ /'di ni 'di la zhag bdun par/ /cho ga bzhin du btung ba sbyin/ /de ltar btung bas dbang gyur na/ /rta ni reg pa la sogs bzod/ /bdag gcin dang ni rgod ma'i gcin/ /yungs kar de bzhin rna spabs dang / /pi pi ling rtsa nag tshur bcas/ /ha re na ka tsha ba gsum/ /
[\[214a.4\]]tsan+dan dang ni ldan pa ru/ /btags te dben par spang bar bya/ /'di yis zla tshigs dag tu ni/ /rta la mig sman bsku bar bya/ /de ni rang bzhin gyis gso dka'/ /gra ma can ni zhi bar bya/ /dom dang gzig sder khyi'i rus pa/ /ba lang 'gram pa yungs kar dang / /rma bya'i mkhris pa
[\[214a.5\]]ldan par ni/ /gdug pa gram can sel yin/ /rta bres su ni rtag pa ru/ /gdug pa 'di ni gdul bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /khyad par du ni bdug pas bdug /des na reg dang sgra dang ni/ /gzugs ni bde bar brten bzod 'gyur/ /gang dang gang ni byed
[\[214a.6\]]du bcug /de de rjes su mthun par byed/ /rkan dang kha 'gram dpral pa dang / /ma rkan smin ma'i 'og dang ni/ /rta yi mig la'ang pi pi ling / /rtsa ba tsha ba gsum gyis bsku/ /'di yi lus ni thams cad kyang / /ba yi lci bas yang yang bsku/ /'di yi yan lag nang grol
[\[214a.7\]]ni/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni kha ras bsku/ /e la u shir pra rtsi pog /ru rta tsan+dan a ka ru/ /nA ga ge sar til mar bcas/ /bdug pas rta la rab tu bdug /rta ni nyag bar gyur pa na/ /bdug bas yang yang bdug na ni/ /sgra dang reg dang gzugs dag ni/ /nges par bzod par
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]'gyur ba yin/ /ji srid nges par zhi gyur par/ /cho ga 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /de tshe 'khrugs par mi byed cing / /rta rdzi la ni gnod mi byed/ /gang na gnas la mi ldang zhing / /khro ba med par rtswa rnams za/ /rna ba 'jums par mi byed cing / /'dul sbyong mkhan la mngon par dga'/ /
[\[214b.2\]]lam du zhugs par chas pa na/ /'dor zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur la/ /khrid na sems ni dul 'gyur zhing / /tshig gi bsdigs na'ang 'jigs par 'gyur/ /ci dga' bar ni khyer na yang / /log par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gzhan la brdegs na yang / /de ni 'jigs
[\[214b.3\]]pa skye mi 'gyur/ /de ltar gra ma med pa'i rta/ /bzod pa can du bshad pa yin/ /dmod pa gdon gyi nyes ba dang / /rta yi rlung nad nyes pa dang / /yul gyi nyes pa btang snyoms gzhag /me srun 'grogs pa dag las kyang / /rta ni sems shes mi 'gyur las/ /gra ma can
[\[214b.4\]]du 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas nyes pa 'di rnams la/ /zhi ba'i thabs 'di yin par 'dod/ /gang la cho ga 'di dag ni/ /byas kyang gra ma ma zhi na/ /de tshe 'brog stong dag tu yang / /de la ltos par mi bya'o/ /gang tshe mi'am rta gzhan gyi/ /phyi nas snyeg par byed par 'gyur/ /
[\[214b.5\]]de'i tshe rlig pa chung ba yis/ /'di yi sems 'khrugs zhi bar byed/ /gra ma can ni legs dul yang / /g.yul du gzhug par mi bya ste/ /gal te 'di yis rang bzhin nyid/ /las kyi dbang gis gsal byed srid/ /gang zhig gra ma can zhi nas/ /la lar mi srun byed gyur na/ /
[\[214b.6\]]dang po de ni byed tshul gyis/ /nye bar legs bar sbyar bar bya/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las gra ma can brtag pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bu sngon nga ni rta bres su/ /gnyid log pa na rta der btab/ /nga ni khro ba ches khyab pas/ /de la dmod pa btab
[\[214b.7\]]par gyur/ /bkra mi shis dang rnam kun du/ /spang bar bya ba nyid gyur cing / /bdag po chung mar bcas pa'i yang / /rigs ni rlag pa nyid gyur cig /nga yi dmod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /nyes pa che dar ldan par ni/ /rta rnams 'gyur ba nyid yin la/ /'di yi ming ni shes par

[\[215a.1\]]gyis/ /shis pa gzhan dang ldan gyur kyang / /rta yi tha chad de spang bya/ /so yis kha khengs kha dog nag /de bzhin so ni mi mnyam lhag /yo zhing 'gul la chag pa dang / /so gyes pa dang mi tshang dang / /nya phyis 'dra dang zur gsum dang / /

[\[219b.1\]]bab kyang sa rnams kyi/ /khyad par dag gis bzang ngan gyi/ /ro ni sna tshogs mang por 'gyur/ /de bzhin tshangs pas tshul gcig par/ /rta rnams sprul par byas mod kyi/ /lha rnams la ni bgos pa las/ /lhag pa gang yin sa gzhi 'dir/ /rgyal po rnams la byin
[\[219b.2\]]gyur pa/ /rta de sa yi khyad par gyis/ /rigs dang skye gnas ming dag ni/ /khyad par mang por gyur pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rigs brtas pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //sha li ho tra rta bres na/ /'dug cha dri za'i rgyal po
[\[219b.3\]]dang / /mja' las rgyal ba gnyis ka ni/ /dul dang ldan pas dris gyur pa/ /lags ldan rta ni bzang po yang / /spyod pa ngan pa snang ba dang / /mtshan nyid mi shes ldan gyur kyang / /kha cig rang bzhin bzang bo mchis/ /der ni rgyu dag gang lags pa/ /yang

[\[219b.5\]]ldan pa/ /tshul ngan rang du gyur ba yin/ /la la lus ni gtsang kyur kyang / /snying stobs mi nyams gyur pa yis/ /phyin ci log gi snying stobs can/ /lus ni gtugs par ston par bshad/ /de ni shes rab dman ba yi/ /skye bo phal cher rmongs par 'gyur/ /

[\[219b.7\]]par mnyan pa nyid du gyes/ /dbyibs legs pa dang dba' ba dang / /gzi mdangs stobs dang ma yengs dang / /'phel ka che zhing sems bzang la/ /dar la ba bcings mdangs bzang la/ /dbang po brtan zhing dga' ba dang / /snying stobs mgyogs byed ldan pa yi/ /de 'dra

[\[220b.1\]]na/ /rta la'ang ston ka pa zhes bshad/ /rang bzhin de 'drar gyur pa yi/ /ston ka rnam pa bzhi ru mthong / /rang bzhin la gnas de bzhin sbom/ /phra dang dmar ba'i ston ka pa'o/ /rang bzhin la gnas mchog yin te/ /phra dang sbom dang gzhan pa yin/ /rte'u ston ka

[\[253a.1\]]ri mo gyen du lta zhing mnyam/ /snum pa bzhi ni gang la yod/ /rta de lo ni bcu dgu na/ /gcig 'gag pa yis dus byed 'gyur/ /ri mo nyams shing ring ba lnga/ /gang gi mchu ltag mnyam yod pa/ /de yang lo ni nyi shu na/ /mgo nad kyis ni 'chi bar

[\[257a.1\]]de lta bu yi rta de ni/ /srog zad par ni shes par bya/ /gang zhig rna bas mi thos shing / /dbang po nyams par snang gyur la/ /rtswa yang nyung du za byed pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba rengs nas ni/ /shin tu 'greng bar snang
[\[257a.2\]]ba dang / /yang dang yang du 'dug byed cing / /dran pa'ang yang dang yang du ster/ /mig kyang ling thog dag gis ni/ /khebs pa lta bu snang gyur pa/ /shin tu lhod par snang ba dang / /rnam par bskyed par mi shes la/ /rnyog can tshad ni chan por snang / /de yang
[\[257a.3\]]myur du ma rungs 'gyur/ /gang zhig shin tu skrag pa lta/ /rgyas bsdus 'gugs par snang ba dang / /lce yang skrang zhing rings gyur pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /skrangs par gyur pa ma yin yang / /shin tu skrangs par ltar snang la/ /rta ni gang la snang bar gyur/ /
[\[257a.4\]]de ni yun ring 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig pad+ma dkar 'dra bas/ /mig ni rnam par khyab ltar snang / /rab rib yod kyang mthong gyur pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mdo la stobs dang ldan gyur zhing / /spyod pa la yang thag thogs med/ /de nas myur du lus
[\[257a.5\]]zhum pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig khrus ni byas mod la/ /dang po snying ga skams 'gyur zhing / /lus kun rlon par gnas gyur pa/ /de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho/ /gsos kyang rtas par mi byed kyi/ /'grib pa tshab cher snang gyur la/ /stobs dang

[\[261b.3\]]raN+Da'i sa bon/ /ra sna bca' sga yungs kar dang / /thang shing a dza mo da dang / /nas tshig 'khus thal lan tshwa rnams/ /phye mar byas pa mar dang ni/ /til mar dang bskol dam pa 'di/ /rta ni rlung gis nyen pa la/ /'jam rtsi btang na stobs skyed yin/ /phye ma 'di dang

[\[261b.5\]]ma'o// //byi dang ga dang ser mo gnyis/ /lce myang tsha dang tsal ru tsha/ /pa tha pa to la'i 'o ma/ /pi pi ling dang bca' lga rnams/ /phye mar btags pa 'di sbyin na/ /snying nad khong pa'i srin bu sel/ /me drod skyed cing smin byed yin/ /nad
[\[261b.6\]]kun rnam par zhi byed cing / /bad kan dang ni mdze nad sel/ /rta ni me drod nyams pa la/ /lus kyi me drod stobs 'phel byed/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las byi dang ga la sogs pa'i phyi ma'o// //'bras bu gsum dang ser po gnyis/ /de bzhin
[\[261b.7\]]tsha ba gsum po dang / /gla sgang te dzo ba ti dang / /mur pa ha ri pi pi ling / /yungs kar pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /ba la ka dang bu tse shel/ /byi tsher sro lo kru trug tres/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon dang / /pi tsu mar da pa to la/ /dra ban ti dang dur byid dang / /br-i sh+tsi ka li zir
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba thang shing dang / /g.yer ma dang ni byi dang ga /shing kun ru rta shi kru dang / /a pa ma rga bi sha la/ /shu dag dang bcas phye ma sbyar/ /sman gyi sbyor ba 'di nyid ni/ /rta la bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /rlung dang bad kan nad rnams dang / /
[\[262a.2\]]de bzhin rlung khrag 'dres pa dang / /de bzhin nad khrag can dang ni/ /g.yan pa bkra ba sel ba yin/ /khyad par du yang snying nad dang / /lud pa me drod nyams la bsngags/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i phye ma'o// //
[\[262a.3\]]g.yer ma shing kun a ru dang / /ma nu dang ni lan tshwa brgyad/ /nas bskol khu ba dang sbyar sbyin/ /nad gzhi gsum skyes gzer rnams 'joms/ /gnas brgyad pa las gzer 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i phyi ma'o// //bi cu mar da pa to la/ /ka N+Da ka ri br-i ha ti/ /sle
[\[262a.4\]]tres dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /g.yer ma chu dang lhan cig bskol/ /de bcags pa yi khu bar ni/ /mu dag legs par btso bar bya/ /de ni legs par tshos pa dang / /thab nas slar yang phog nas ni/ /der ni tsha ba gsum po dang / /lan tshwa dag kyang tshad tsam
[\[262a.5\]]gzhug /mar dang til mar zhag sbrang rtsi/ /de dag thams cad gcig tu bsre/ /tsha yi phye ma dag dang ni/ /mung ga'i khu ba sbyar bar bya/ /de nas tsha ba'i kha zas te/ /nya la cho ga bzhin du sbyin/ /des ni bad rlung sel byed cing / /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /
[\[262a.6\]]snying nad zhi bar byed pa dang / /skrangs pa dag kyang sel bar byed/ /'go ba'i nad dang rna nad rnams/ /nges par sel bar byed pa yin/ /lkog nad rnam par sbyong byed cing / /mchog tu me drod nyams la phan/ /gnas brgyad pa las tsha ba'i phye ma dang bsres ba zhes bya ba ste
[\[262a.7\]]phye ma'i le'u'o// //til mar de bzhin mar cha mnyam/ /zhag dang rkang ni ci rnyed dang / /de bzhin skyur yang ci rnyed dang / /'dir ni zho ni bzhi 'gyur gzhug /der ni sman ni 'di dag rnams/ /lde gu btags pa gzhug par bya/ /shu da gar sna shing mngar dang / /'tsho byed dang ni dzi ban
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ti/ /a shu ma ti 'di dag ni/ /ba la ba sgi ba sbru ba/ /'di dag dang bskol snum chen po/ /stobs dang nad med skyed par byed/ /rlung las skyes pa'i nad brgyad cu/ /'di yis sel bar the tshom med/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las snum chen po'o// //kaN+Da ka ri
[\[262b.2\]]rtsa'i rtsa dang / /'bras bu bsres pa srang brgya ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang / /de las bre gang lus pa ru/ /mar ni bre gang dang bsres bskol/ /go rims bzhin du bshad pa yi/ /sman gyi lde gu 'di yang gzhug /pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga /ha ti pi ling
[\[262b.3\]]tsi tra ka /nas tshig 'khus thal kha ru tsha/ /ra sna shu dag tsha ba gsum/ /'di bcu mar gyi dud pa lnga/ /sel zhing legs par gso bar bya/ /nad kun sel bar byed pa yin/ /snum de bde ba skyed byed yin/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las kaN+Da ka ri'i sman mar ro// //
[\[262b.4\]]yung dang skyer ba shu dag bcas/ /nim pa byi tsher par ba ta/ /sle tres dang ni kyi lce ba/ /bu tse shel ni cha mnyam byas/ /de la 'bras bu gsum dang ni/ /tig ta tsan+dan pi pi ling / /dug mo nyung dang ga dur dang / /ri sho ba gnyis dzi ba ka /lde gur btags pa dang bsres
[\[262b.5\]]ba'i/ /mar bskol gyur pa de yis ni/ /rta yi mkhris pa sel byed cing / /gzhang 'brum khong tsha zhi bar byed/ /rdo dang g.yan pa rnams dang ni/ /me dpal dang ni rims la yang / /'di ni rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /dbyar tshe rta la rtag tu phan/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas
[\[262b.6\]]de brgyad pa las tsha ba'i sman mar ro// //a shwa gan+d+ha'i rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu yal ga srang brgya ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /de nas sman khu de dang ni/ /mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya/ /til mar mar dang mnyam pa dang / /'o ma bzhi 'gyur de ru gzhug /tsan+dan
[\[262b.7\]]dang ni bca' lga dang / /a ga ru dang shug pa dang / /rgun 'bru pad rtsa 'bras bu gsum/ /sna ma'i lo ma sha ri ba/ /ka N+Daka ri br-i ha ti/ /nA ga phu sh+pa pa spru ba/ /sa la kr-i sh+Na par+Ni gnyis/ /shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / /pad+ma ge sar lde gu ni/ /btags pa der ni gzhug par bya/ /'di
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]yis rta ni sbeg pa dang / /rlung gis nyam thag gyur pa dang / /zad byed kyis ni btab pa dag /sha skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las a shwa gan+d+ha'i sman mar ro// //bong dmur ba bu tse shel/ /
[\[263a.2\]]gla sgang shing tsha pa to dang / /sa p+ta r+Ni pa to la/ /bi tsu mar da byi tsher ma/ /phar ba ta dang 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang dra ban ti/ /tsan+dan dmar po ma du ka /rtsa mkhris dang ni pi pi ling / /nye'u shing shug pa bu shel tse/ /dong ga dang ni sle tres rnams/ /dug
[\[263a.3\]]mo nyung gi sa bon bcas/ /srang re cha mnyam sbyar lde gu/ /nim pa pa to la dang bcas/ /kan+Da ka ri ba sha ka /srang ni lnga yi tshad du byas/ /skyu ru ra ni bre gang bcas/ /cho ga bzhin du bskol nas ni/ /sman khu mar khu dang bsres la/ /me ni chung dus btso bar bya/ /
[\[263a.4\]]tig ta chen po zhes bya ste/ /'di ni gu gul dang bcas pa'am/ /yang na 'ba' zhig sbyin byas na/ /yon tan bdun rtsi dag dang mtshungs/ /lus kyi me drod skyed par byed/ /gzi mdangs stobs ni 'phel byed yin/ /mdze dang khrag mkhris nad rnams sel/ /lus
[\[263a.5\]]rgyas par yang byed pa yin/ /sha skyed mdog ni bzad byed cing / /nad kun sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las tig ta chen po'i sman mar ro// //rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis nim ba/ /sle tres a ta ru sha ka /dong ga dang
[\[263a.6\]]ni ba to la/ /'bras bu gsum ni cha mnyam bya/ /cham chom brdungs la chu nad bskol/ /sman khu bzhi cha lus pa ru/ /de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar dang / /sman ni 'di rnams dang bcas bskol/ /kyi lce ba dang par pa ta/ /sha ri ba gnyis tsan+dan dang / /tig ta dang
[\[263a.7\]]ni pu tse shel /ba tha dang ni bcas pa dang / /bal bu dang ni pu shel tse/ /u t+pal sngon po shug pa dang / /bi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga /te dzo ba ti ci tra ka /bong nga ha ti pi pi ling / /dug mo nyung shu nas khon dang / /ser po gnyis dang pi pi ning / /na yi sham dang
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bca' lga dang / /thang shing zhes bya thams cad ni/ /cha mnyam der ni gzhug par bya/ /me chung gis bskol tshos pa dang / /shin tu sbyangs pa'i snod du gzhug /tig ta chen po'i sman mar 'di/ /rta yi sman gyi mchog tu bshad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde dang mdze/ /la ba
[\[263b.2\]]'bras kyi phreng ba dang / /bad kan gyi ni nad rnams dang / /de bzhin rna rnag gyur pa dang / /bad kan nad ni gzhan dag la'ang / /'di ni shin tu bsngags pa yin/ /'di ni nad kun sel byed cing / /gzi mdangs stobs ni skyed pa dang / /brtan zhing lus ni sra bar byed/ /dbang
[\[263b.3\]]po gsal bar byed pa dang / /yid kyang dga' bar byed pa yin/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel byed cing / /gcong chen rims dang lud pa 'joms/ /pags pa la snad nad rnams dang / /gang yang khrag la gnas pa dang / /rus pa rkang la zhen pa rnams/ /mar 'di yis ni
[\[263b.4\]]sel bar byed/ /nad kyi rgya mtsho rgal 'dod la/ /gzings dang 'dra ba mar 'di yin/ /tig ta chen po'i sman mar gnyis pa'o// //shri sha dang ni yan lag lnga/ /cha mnyam srang ni brgya ru bya/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang / /de rnams sman khu de dang
[\[263b.5\]]ni/ /mar ni bre do bskol bar bya/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyi ni/ /lde gu der ni gzhug par bya/ /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /br-ish+tsi ka li 'bras bu gsum/ /shu ti dang ni thang shing dang / /spang spos dang ni ba lu dang / /bya kra na ka shri ka ta/ /tsi tra ka dang na ku li/ /btsod dang dzi ba
[\[263b.6\]]ni ya dang / /ha ti pi pi ling tsan+dan/ /gan+d+ha b+ha dra ru rta rnams/ /lde gur byas bcug me chung bskol/ /rta gang rlung nad can dang ni/ /de bzhin mkhris pa'i nad yod dang / /bad kan snying gar 'khyil gyur pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sman mchog yin/ /shri sha la sogs sman mar 'di/ /
[\[263b.7\]]nad kun sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las shri sha la sogs pa'i sman mar ro// //shri sha yi ni lo ma ni/ /chu bskol de yi khu ba dang / /mar ni tshad bzhin bskol ba ru/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /de bzhin ha ti pi pi ling / /
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]lde gur sbyar ba dang bsres bskol/ /mdze yi nad ni thams cad dang / /dug sel me drod skyed mchog yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang / /khong tsha khrag gi nad rnams sel/ /dbyar gyi tshe na byin gyur na/ /'di ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /shri sha la
[\[264a.2\]]sogs pa'i sman mar gnyis pa'o// //mur ba dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /tsi tra ka dang shu dag dang / /bca' lga dang ni ser po gnyis/ /ba tha shing tsha bar ba ta/ /na le sham dang gla sgang dang / /de bzhin nA ga ge sar dang / /tsan+dan dang ni sha ri ba/ /rgya spos dang ni ma lu ka /
[\[264a.3\]]bo dang ha ti pi pi ling / /dan da dang ni dra ban ti/ /ro hi ni dang tsi tra ka /dbyi mo dUr ba kyi lce ba/ /cha mnyam sbyar te chu dang ni/ /mar dang me ni chung dus btso/ /tshos te mar ni lus pa dang / /de ni de las dbab par bya/ /'di blud rta ni mgyogs pa dang / /lus stobs rgya cher 'phel bar
[\[264a.4\]]'gyur/ /pags par gtogs pa'i nad kyi tshogs/ /rdo la sogs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /rlung dang mdze yi nad rnams dang / /mkhris pa'i nad dang lus rengs dang / /de bzhin dbugs mi bde kun dang / /nad ni sna tshogs gzhan yang sel/ /'di ni nad 'joms mchog yin zhing / /
[\[264a.5\]]bkra shis par yang byed pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las mur pa la sogs pa'i sman mar ro// //nim pa pa to la 'bras gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang pu tsi shel/ /byi tsher ba dang par ba ta/ /dra ban ti dang sle tres rnams/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam
[\[264a.6\]]byas la/ /brdungs ba chu nang bskol bar bya/ /bzhi cha lus bar gyur pa ru/ /sman 'di dag gi lde gu gzhug /tsan+dan pi pi ling lga sgang / /ri sho ba gnyis dzi ba ka /kan da ka ri tig ta dang / /dug mo nyung gi sa bon rnams/ /cha ni mnyam par sbyar byas nas/ /de bzhin
[\[264a.7\]]du ni mar khu dang / /'o ma snum dang mnyam bcug la/ /me ni chung dus btso bar bya/ /'di ni tig ta chen zhes bya/ /mdze dang rims dang me dpal dang / /'brum bu dang ni 'bras nad dang / /de bzhin pags nad gzhan dag kyang / /khrag mkhris nad rnams sel bar byed/ /sman
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]pa mkhas pas 'di nyid ni/ /rta la nye bar blud par bya/ /dpyid dang dgun gyi tshe na ni/ /sna sman 'jam rtsir btang na phan/ /dbyar gyi tshe na khyad par du/ /sman 'di rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las tig ta can gyi sman mar ro// //dur byid
[\[264b.2\]]chen po brdungs nas ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang / /de ru mar khu bre gang blugs/ /ra ma nye k+Shi ra ka kol/ /ri sho ba gnyis dzi ba ka/ /ba la a ti ba la dang / /de bzhin k+Shi ra ba dang ni/ /me da ma hA me da dang / /shing mngar dang
[\[264b.3\]]ni sha ri ba/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas kyang / /de ni lde gur btags par bya/ /mar der bcug nas dkrugs nas ni/ /me ni chung dus dal gyis btso/ /de ni tshos par shes pa na/ /de las phog ste btsags par bya/ /snum 'di rtag tu btung ba dang / /'jam rtsi yi
[\[264b.4\]]ni las la sbyar/ /rgyun du byin na mo gsham yang / /bu skyed par ni nus pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las sha ma dur byid sman mar ro// //nim pa dang ni pa to la/ /skyer pa tsan+dan pu tse shel/ /kyi lce ba dang la la phud/ /par pa
[\[264b.5\]]ta ni srang re dang / /skyu ru ra ni bre gang bcas/ /chu bal can gyi chu las ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus dang mar bre gang / /gla sgang rtsa mkhris shing mngar dang / /btsan dug dug mo nyung la phud/ /pi pi ling dang bcas bskol ba'i/ /mar gyis sna
[\[264b.6\]]mig rna nad 'joms/ /rgyu rlugs rims dang nad dang ni/ /me dpal la sogs sel bar byed/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las nim pa la sogs pa'i sman mar ro// //nim pa pa to la'i lo ma dang / /sle tres dang ni kaN+Da ka ri nyid/ /cha mnyam
[\[264b.7\]]srang bzhin nyer shur byas pa dag /chu ni sman gyi bcu drug nang du bskol/ /sman gyi khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang / /sman khu de dang mnyam pa'i mar dang bskol/ /der ni tsha ba gsum ni srang gsum dag /zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma gzhugs par bya/ /de ni legs par
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]tshos par shes pa dang / /gu gul dang sbyar rta la blud pa bya/ /yang na de dang mar bsres 'ga' zhig sbyin/ /des ni mdze yi nad kun sel bar 'gyur/ /khrag mkhris rdo dang de bzhin g.yan pa dang / /'brum bu 'brum phran de bzhin shu ba ni/ /sel
[\[265a.2\]]zhing rta yi mdog dang stobs ni skyed/ /nad kyi tshogs 'joms bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las bdud rtsi lta bu'i sman mar ro// //ka ran dza dang ba sha ka /s+phor khyim gyi dud pa dang / /ka pid tha dang dong ga dang / /yug snam
[\[265a.3\]]dang ni pad+ma dang / /ka ra bI ra bong ba dang / /ro hi ta dang sle tres dang / /br-i ha ti yi 'bras bu ni/ /ra thug gi ni gcin dang btags/ /'di dag srang gnyis sbyar ba la/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/ /mar dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma gzhug /bskol ba'i sman mar
[\[265a.4\]]stobs chen yin/ /mdze yi nad ni thams cad la/ /rtag tu bskul dang blud na phan/ /sha tshil rus pa skyed byed cing / /pags par zhugs pa'i khrag sbyong byed/ /mdze nad 'dzag par byed pa yang / /thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /
[\[265a.5\]]de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las ka ra na dza la sogs pa'i sman mar ro/ /sman mar gyi le'u'o// //de nas gzhan yang til mar gyi/ /le'u nges par bshad bya ste/ /pra sa ra ni srang brgya ni/ /chu pre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /
[\[265a.6\]]bzhi cha lus par gyur pa na/ /khu ba de ni thab las dbog /sman khu de dang mnyam pa yi/ /til mar nye bar gzhug par bya/ /kany+dzi rang sgyur nyis 'gyur gzhug /de la sman ni 'di dag gi /lde gu nye bar gzhug par bya/ /ra sna ba la gze ma dang / /lca myang tsha dang shi kru
[\[265a.7\]]dang / /pras ra na'i rtsa ba dang / /pi pi ling gi rtsa bar bcas/ /tsi tra ka dang bca' lga dang / /shu ti dang ni thang shing dang / /bse shing 'bras bu bong ba dang / /pi pi ling yang srang re ni/ /cha ni mnyam por sbyar nas kyang / /phye ma zhib mo 'thag tu gzhug /me ni chung ngu
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]dang btsos te/ /snum de snod ni bzang por gzhug /'di ni sna sman bsku ba dang / /'jam rtsi btung ba dag la bsngags/ /rta ni rlung nad kyis bcom dang / /mi'am yang na glang po rung / /lus 'theng yun ring nad kyis btab/ /nges par bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /rta gang
[\[265b.2\]]bu ni mi chags pa/ /'di yis nges par mngal skyed 'gyur/ /pho min skyes pa nyid 'gyur zhing / /mo gsham yang ni bu skyed byed/ /'di yis long ba khyab 'jug rigs/ /rabs chad bu ni yid 'ong skyes/ /pra sa ra yi til mar 'di/ /nad kun 'jig par byed pa yin/ /
[\[265b.3\]]sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las pra sa ra'i til mar ro// //pra sa ra yi rtsa ba dang / /yal ga lo ma bcas srang brgya/ /rtsa ba bcu ni de yi phyed/ /chu gre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur ba dang / /thab las slar ni dbog par bya/ /sman khu de
[\[265b.4\]]yis nyis 'gyur gyi/ /kany+dzi dang skyur gzhug par bya/ /zho yang sman khu'i nyis 'gyur ni/ /de la nye bar gzhug par bya/ /sman ni 'di rnams srang re la/ /lde gur byas la de ru gzhug /bse shing 'bras bu bca' lga dang / /tsi tra ga dang lce myang tsha/ /pra sa ra yi rtsa ba
[\[265b.5\]]dang / /de bzhin pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /thang shing dang ni shu ti dang / /me da tsa kra hA gan dang / /e raN+Da'i rtsa dzi ban ti/ /ru rta shu dgas ha tsa ra/ /po son cha ni bzang po dang / /de bzhin mang du sra ba dang / /sa bon dza na ser po gnyis/ /a shwa gan+d+ha ha pu sha/ ba ma seng
[\[265b.6\]]phrom mi rkang dang / /shre ya se ni cha mnyam gzhug /'di ni bsku dang sna sman dang / /btung dang 'jam rtsi dag la gtang / /rlung gi nad ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin gzhan kun sel bar byed/ /smyo dang 'byung bo brjed byed dang / /de bzhin gdon nad sna tshogs dang / /
[\[265b.7\]]zha bo me dbal gyis thabs la/ /til mar bsten na bde thob 'gyur/ /skam dang rus pa'i nad rnams la/ /til mar 'di ni gtang bar bya/ /rgod ma bu ni mi chags pa/ /'di blud na ni bu chags 'gyur/ /rgod ma dang ni rta pho yi/ /rlung nad brgyad cu sel bar byed/ /
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gnyer ma 'dus shing na tshod rgas/ /slar yang lang tsho thob bar 'gyur/ /pra sa ra yi til mar 'di/ /rta la phan byed mchog tu bshad/ /tshe dang stobs ni skyed byed cing / /dran pa sems gsal dpal skyed byed/ /rgyus pa chad dang rtsa chad la/ /til
[\[266a.2\]]mar 'di yis sna sman gtang / /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las pra sa ra'i til mar gnyis pa'o// //sle tres chu yi nad bskol la/ /khu ba bzhi cha'i til mar gzhug /'o ma de dang mnyam bcug la/ /sman 'di dag gi lde gu gzhug /pi pi ling
[\[266a.3\]]rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /tsi tra ha ti pi pi ling / /shu dag ru rta byi dang ga /skyer pa dang ni lce myang tsha/ /pra sa ra ni ba la dang / /ra sna gze ma ha pus pa/ /bcug la me ni chung dus btso/ /de bzhin bca' lga gzhug par bya/ /'di yis sna rengs rlig spos dang / /lus
[\[266a.4\]]rengs rked pa na ba dang / /de bzhin rgyab ni rengs pa dang / /rlung nad pa la sha dang ni/ /rlung las gyur ba'i mig nad la/ /khyad par du ni rtag tu btang / /sle tres la sogs til mar ni/ /tshangs pas sngon tshe bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad

[\[266b.1\]]byed/ /de la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni/ /'jam rtsi btang na sel 'gyur so/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las pi pi ling la sogs pa'i til mar so// //'tsho byed shing mngar ma dang / /pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /shu dag ra sna ba la dang / /bil ba nye'u shing shu ti

[\[270b.6\]]'gyur zhing / /pho ba'i nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zos pa myur du 'ju 'gyur zhing / /bde ba kho nar sbyin par byed/ /lan tshwas rta yi gcin tu dag /bde ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bde ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lan tshwa rta yi tshe yin pas/ /dus ni rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /sman

[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]tshe na lan tshwa ni/ /nim pa'i lo ma dang sbyar sbyin/ /dgun gyi tshe ni dgu thi yi/ /lo ma dang bcas sbyin par bya/ /pa to la yi lo mar bcas/ /dgun smad dang ni dpyid dus sbyin/ /sos ka dang ni ston gyi tshe/ /mar dang sbyar ba sbyin
[\[271a.2\]]par bya/ /lan tshwa yi ni sbyor ba 'di/ /bu la nga yis shes pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las lan tshwa'i cho ga'o// //tshangs ba drag po khyab 'jug ni/ /bad kan mkhris pa rlung dag cad/ /phan tshun bsten par byed pa
[\[271a.3\]]dang / /gcig la gcig ni ma 'dres gnas/ /de la tshangs pa bad kan te/ /drag po mkhris pa yin par bshad/ /khyab 'jug rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /de ltar tshul ni rnam gsum yin/ /sa la bcos mas gnas pa yin/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha
[\[271a.4\]]gsum pa'o/ /lus can rnams kyi brten pa'i rgyu/ /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /ba ru ra ste 'bras bu gsum/ /'di yi yon tan rnams dang ni/ /sbyor ba'i khyad par bshad par bya/ /rked pa brla yi nad sel cing / /lus zungs thams cad dang bar byed/ /mdog

[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]sre tres dang / /pi pi ling dang sbyar ba blud/ /mig gi nad dang rlig skrangs dang / /rma dang rgyus nad 'khums pa dang / /rdo dang g.yan ba 'brum phran dang / /'brum bu lto yi nad rnams dang / /de bzhin lto nad gzhong 'dra dang / /lkog nad 'bras kyi phreng ba la/ /zhag
[\[271b.2\]]ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bar/ /blud na bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las 'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor ba'o// //legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ /sha li ho tra la dris pa/ /a ru ra ni gang na skye/ /rigs ni du zhig ro du
[\[271b.3\]]mchis/ /skye gnas rnam pa du zhes bgyi/ /ming dang kha dog mtshan nyid dang / /rta yi nyes pa gang dang gang / /sel 'gyur thub mchog khyed kyis gsungs/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang / /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thungs ba na/ /thigs

[\[271b.6\]]ba lta bur zlum/ /'phel byed shin tu zlum pa yin/ /skem byed rus pa cha zhing dkar/ /bdud rtsi rtse mo sbom pa yin/ /'tsho byed gser gyi mdog can de/ /'jig med zur ni lnga ba yin/ /nag po zur gsum ba nyid de/ /rigs ni bdun du shes

[\[272a.1\]]rnam par rgyal bas 'khru bar byed/ /de ltar rigs dang ming dag gis/ /rnam pa bdun du bshad pa yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang / /khyad par du ni bad kan nad/ /mngon du 'phrog byed a ru ra/ /skyur bas rlung ni sel bar byed/ /mngar

[\[272b.1\]]ni ma lus 'joms par byed/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las a ru ra'i cho ga'o// //sha li ho tra thub mchog la/ /legs thos kyis ni yang dris pa/ /gu gul ji ltar byung gyur cing / /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ci 'dra lags/ /tshad dang

[\[273a.1\]]kyi ni tshad du sbyin/ /'di ni rta yi nad gzhi gsum/ /'khrugs par gyur la bsngags pa yin/ /tshigs skrangs pa dang skran dang ni/ /de bzhin rma yi nad rnams dang / /lus rengs yan lag skrangs pa dang / /skrangs dang gzhang kha'i nad

[\[273b.1\]]snum zhing brtan la ro lngar ldan/ /tsha zhing stobs ni skyed par byed/ /lci zhing ro tsha byed pa ste/ /skyur ba'i ro dang dral ba yin/ /de bas ro ma tshang ba zhes/ /drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig rlung gi shugs kyis ni/ /yan lag 'byung ngam 'khums gyur

[\[274b.1\]]tra'i gsang bu'i gnas te brgyad pa las sgog skya'i cho ga rdzogs so// //sha li ho tra drang srong mchog /nyi ma dang ni gzi mnyam pa/ /rta khang na ni 'dug pa na/ /legs thos kyis ni yang dris pa/ /rta la go cha bskon pa ni/ /ci 'dra ba zhig bgyi ba gsungs/ /de bzhin yan lag

[\[275a.1\]]de bzhin thag pa yi/ /tshad ni 'dir ni des ma byas/ /mdung la'ang tshad gcig yod gyur pas/ /'di 'dra gdags zhes de la smras/ /rta yi rgyab tu dgab bya ba/ /ri dgas ri'u bal shar dag /spu gzhan 'jam pa las byas pa/ /sra zhing shin tu 'jam

[\[275a.6\]]pa'o/ //de nas shing rta dang sbyar ba'i/ /nges pa nga yis bshad par bya/ /rta ni gang gi mchu ltag na/ /shin tu shis pa'i mtshan ma yod/ /ba dan bzang po'am zla ba rgyas/ /nya dang rgyal mtshan yod gyur pa/ /rta de rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /de 'dra'i mtshan nyid dang
[\[275a.7\]]ldan pa'i/ /rta ni sa rteng shis par bshad/ /ngang tshul bzang zhing bu bzang la/ /skad ni dung dang 'dra gyur ba/ /rta de rgyal po la shis pas/ /rigs mthun shing rta la sbyar bya/ /mdog dang tshad ni mtshungs gyur cing / /stobs ldan nyon mongs bzod pa shis/ /'thab pa'i
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]tshe na mo skrag cing / /'dres pa na yang mi 'then la/ /mda' dang dbyig pa mdung sogs kyis/ /brgyab pa na ni sran che ba/ /de 'dra ba yis rta dag ni/ /g.yul gyi dus su bsngags pa yin/ /rna bar bzlas pa'i tshe na ni/ /mig las mchi ma 'byin byed cing / /sna sbubs shin tu rgyas byas nas/ /
[\[275b.2\]]nyi ma la yang blta bar byed/ /rkang pa g.yas pa sa la ni/ /yang dang yang du rdebs par byed/ /'di ni skye ba dran pa yi/ /mtshan nyid dang ldan mchog tu bshad/ /de las gzhan pa'i rta ngan dag /shing rta la yang sbyar mi bya/ /legs thos rnam pa thams cad du/ /rna bar bzlas la brtag par
[\[275b.3\]]bya/ /sngon tshe de yis ji ltar thos/ /rna bar bzlas pa gang gi ni/ /rta ni shin tu rigs ldan 'byung / /don med mi 'gyur de mnyan gyis/ /shing rta yan lag kun ldan zhing / /'khor lo legs par btags pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng / /shin tu rdzogs pa nyid
[\[275b.4\]]du sbyar/ /legs par sprel zhing shin tu phyis/ /nyi ma lta bur gzi mdangs ldan/ /rigs dang mtshan nyid bzang pa yin/ /rta bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kha lo bsgyur ba bzang por bcas/ /'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /shing rta de ni legs gnas pas/ /shar phyogs su ni kha
[\[275b.5\]]bstan gzhag /g.yas su bskor zhing bkra shis dang / /shis par brjod pa legs par bya/ /de yi rna ba g.yas par ni/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /khrod ni dri za'i rigs su skyes/ /rigs sun par ni ma byed cing / /khyod ni dngul las byung gyur cing / /dpal mo'i lag tu
[\[275b.6\]]gnas na 'phel/ /me yi bu nyid khyod dran byos/ /ko tu ba li nor bu'ang dran/ /'o ma'i mtshe las bdud rtsi'i phyir/ /lha dang lha min gyis bsrubs tshe/ /dang po u tsa sra ba byung / /de las khyod skyes dran par gyis/ /shugs mchog ston de nga yis ni/ /dgra dpung ma lus las las rgyal gyis/ /
[\[275b.7\]]tshangs pa dang ni zla ba dang / /chu lha yi ni bden tshigs dang / /nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid dang / /de bzhin drang srong dka' thub dang / /stobs bzang gi ni tshangs spyod dang / /de bzhin rlung gi shugs nyid dang / /me nyid kyi ni nus mthu yis/ /rta khyod rgyal ba skyed gyur cing / /'thab pa'i tshe na rta khyod kyis/ /
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gal de log par 'gro 'gyur na/ /bram ze pha ma gsod 'dra yi/ /nyes de khyod kyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /gal te yul las rgyal gyur na/ /bdag po bde ba nyid skyed byed/ /oM na ma/ /Adid t+ya ya u ba ya ga ga ga swAhA/ /rta yi rna ba g.yas par ni/ /'thab pa'i tshe na brjod
[\[276a.2\]]gyur na/ /skye ba dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /don med nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /de 'dra'i stobs dang snying stobs ldan/ /rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rtar zhugs/ /gob gos mtshon char ldan brtson pa/ /yul 'khor 'jigs pa las bskyab bya/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las shing rta dang
[\[276a.3\]]sbyar ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas rna bar bzla bya ba/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngon gyi skye ba dran byed pa/ /shin tu nges par bshad par bya/ /bu yis mtshan nyid 'di dag ni/ /dang por rang las mnyan par gyis/ /sbrang ma nas pa s+ya bAde nas/ /soms pa tu nas tsaH oM dz+wa swa
[\[276a.4\]]tsaib su t+ya s+ya/ mA ni nam ta pa sat+ta/ /b+ha dra saM b+ha ma tsa r+ye na/ /pa b+ha nas pa len tsa sra b+ha bA n+tu ta/ /shwA sA bar+d+ha sa twaM tu raM ga maH oM ya ya ya ya/ gag gag swA hA/ /'di ni bdag nyid chen po ni/ /rta yi snying por gyur pa yin/ /g.yul gyi dus su dran bya yi/ /gzhan du nam yang ma
[\[276a.5\]]yin no/ /legs par btags shing go bgos la/ /'dra ba la rta gzhon nas ni/ /'gal zhig rang gi don gyi phyir/ /rmongs pas bdag nyid skyob byed kyi/ /legs thos rta yi lus yan lag /legs par srung ba mi byed na/ /de tshe sdig can dmyal bar ni/ /yun ring du ni
[\[276a.6\]]'tshed par 'gyur/ /rta yi spu ni ci snyed pa'i/ /dmyal bar de tshe gnas par byed/ /rta la go zhig ma bskon yang / /bdag nyid go gyon zhon gyur pa/ /mang du bshad pas ci zhig bya/ /de 'dra'i sdig pa yong ma yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rta ni legs par bsrung
[\[276a.7\]]bar bya/ /dka' thub yon tan kun gyi gter/ /rta tshe'i rig byed la mkhas pa/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /'di skad ces bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las rna bar bzlas pa bstan pa'o/ /drang srong chen po sha li ho tras yang dag par bsdus pa'i
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]rta'i tshe'i rig byang mtha' dag rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba rgyas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsA r+ya d+ha rma shrI b+ha dra dang / /bu d+g+ta shrI shAn+ti dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ldan rgyal po'i
[\[276b.2\]]rgyal po che/ /mi dbang mnga' bdag ces grags pa/ /rtsod ba'i dus su 'khrungs gyur kyang / /dam pa'i spyod pa kun dang ldan/ /khyed ni thams cad mkhyen dang cing / /khyed la bzod dang bden sogs mngal/ /khyed la yon tan kun gnas pas/ /khyod nyid bstod par 'os pa dang / /
[\[276b.3\]]khyed la mkhas dang rgyal phran gzhan/ /bram ze slong mo ba rnams kyis/ /rang re gser gyi dbang phyug tu/ /rgyal chen khyed ni gcig tu bsgrags/ /mi dbang rgyal po dgyes pa dang / /gsang dpyad kyis gzhan phan gdags phyir/ /bka' yis bskul bas gzhung rgyas 'di/ /bod kyi
[\[276b.4\]]rang skad spyod yul byas/ /chos ldan gzhung lugs la mkhas pas/ /sa rnams legs par skyong mdzad cing / /yon tan phun tshogs kun ldan pas/ /skye dgu yun ring rgyas par mdzod/ /drang srong shes pa rgya mtsho pha mthar phyin/ /mngon shes lnga ldan yon tan phun tshogs pa'i/ /sha
[\[276b.5\]]li ho tras tshangs pa las thos nas/ /rta yi tshe yi rig byed gang gtams te/ /yul mtho sa gtsang 'dzam gling dkyil sgang na/ /me rje ltas mdzad sbu rgyas btsan po'i gdung / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i rgyud du 'khrungs/ /mtha' bzhi'i rgyal po gzhan las khyad par
[\[276b.6\]]'phags/ /'khor dang steng sde gser dbyed kun la mkhas/ /sa yi bdag po seng ge'i gzi byin gyis/ /rgyal phran glang chen myos pa'i dregs 'phrog pa/ /mi dbang bkra shis lha lde btsan gyi bkas/ /gsang sngags pha rol phyin dang bden pa yi/ /
[\[276b.7\]]lung dang rigs pa'i bstan bcos kun la mkhas/ /skye 'gro dam pa mi dang mgyogs 'gro yi/ /tshe yi rig byed kun kyang zhugs slad du/ /dman la snying brtse bag yod khrel la sogs/ /gtong la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi shes
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]brda sprod sgra bsgyur lo tsA bas/ /lha mi skal ba can gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ /rin chen kun la yod kyang bzang po med/ /rin chen sngon 'gro bzang pos mtha' brgyan pa/ /gus pa sngon 'gro'i bka' yis rab bskul bas/ /
[\[277a.2\]]sgra dang tshad ma'i bstan bcos la mkhas pa/ /rgya gar mkhan po sangs rgyas zhi dpal dang / /rta dpyad sha li ho tras bsdus pa bsgyur/ /'di ni dbang po'i rdo rje bsdebs tshul du/ /tshigs bcas phyed dang bdun du byas pa'o// //oM swa sti si d+d+hiM/
[\[277a.3\]]grags pa'i 'od zer bye ba rab spro zhing / /rgyal mtshan thub bstan shar ri'i rtser son nas/ /tshogs gnyis rta ljang shugs kyis gling bzhi yi/ /mun sel nam mkha'i nor bu de la 'dud/ /khyed kyis bskal ba bye ba dpag yas su/ /rang gzhan don du
[\[277a.4\]]tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs byas/ /phul chen shugs kyis stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur/ /'dzin ma'i khyon nyul khams gsum bde mdzad bstod/ /bsod nams phul phyin stobs kyis rab bskyod pas/ /srid zhi'i dpal 'byor longs spyod gang
[\[277a.5\]]mchog dang / /gsang sngags lung rigs man ngag bstan bcos sogs/ /ma lus nyid kyi drung du 'du ba'i phyir/ /mngal bdag btsan po sde yis rab bsgrubs pa'i/ /mgyogs 'gro dpal mo'i bu yi blang dor gyi/ /gtan tshigs chen po bstan
[\[277a.6\]]bcos rab gsal ba/ /shin tu gsang zhes yang yang gdams pa 'di/ /gsang sngags zab mor spyad na dngos grub thob/ /'chol bar spyod pa mkhas pa'i tshul min pas/ /tsan+dan tshul dbang klu dbang nor bu ltar/ /nyams su don bzhes
[\[277a.7\]]dkor mjod du gzhag gsol/ /ces pa dang bcas pa 'di dag phag lo zla ba dang po'i tshes gcig gi nyin/ /thos pa cung zad 'dzin pa ma ti b+ha dras gsol pa phyogs kun du bde legs kyis gang bar gyur cig// //
